story:
What is Primo?

Primo is a premier retail boutique specializing in high-end streetwear clothing, shoes, and accessories.  Primo, which implies a sense of top quality and importance, delivers a unique yet stylish collection of exclusives that are hard to find.  Along with staying on top of the latest fashion, Primo also focuses on giving back to the community by collecting clothes and shoes for underprivileged youth throughout the DMV and Mobile, AL area.

What will the funds go towards...

All of the funds raised will go towards the capital equipment needed to open the store front.  Capital equipment includes display tables, shelves, security system/cameras, signage, furniture, office supplies, POS systems, and more.

Message from the owner:

Dear potential backers/supporters,

It has always been my intention to build something greater than myself. Whether through scholastic achievement, organizational notoriety, or personal development, I have always yearned to create something that could really speak to people on a primal and personal level.  Throughout my life, it has often been easier for my passion and devotion to shine through my actions rather than my voice.

I believe that through fashion and the building of a lifestyle brand and boutique, I can reach people on a personal level and make them feel good about themselves.  I have talked to countless mentors and professionals in the industry regarding my business endeavor and feedback has been overwhelmingly positive.  

To start a business is to put oneself out in the open for failure and success. I believe that my education at University of West Florida and Lewis University, my relationships with family and friends, and other difficult yet rewarding life situations have prepared me to run this company successfully. With my work in the past, I have acquired the tangible business, social, and leadership skills I will need to make Primo a massive success and a company that will really make a difference.


Thanks for the support,

Red Easley                                                                                               Red@primodc.com                                                                                       Primodc.com                                                                             Instagram.com/primodc

Coming Soon…                                                                                                                       Facebook.com/primodc                                                                                                   Twitter.com/primodc                                                                                           Primodc.tumblr.com



Hoodie/Tee Options-  Choose from the 3 design colors below.  If you would prefer a different color hoodie or tee, please note during payment.

Primo Sticker

It
has always been my intention to build something greater than myself. Whether
through scholastic achievement, organizational notoriety, or personal
development, I have always yearned to create something that could really
speak to people on a primal and personal level.  Throughout my life, it
has often been easier for my passion and devotion to shine through my actions
rather than my voice.
I
believe that through fashion and the building of a lifestyle brand and
boutique, I can reach people on a personal level and make them feel good about
themselves.  I have talked to countless mentors and professionals in
the industry regarding my business endeavor and feedback has been
overwhelmingly positive.  
To
start a business is to put oneself out in the open for failure and success. I
believe that my education at University of West Florida and Lewis University, my relationships with family and
friends, and other difficult yet rewarding life situations have prepared me to
run this company successfully. With my work in the past, I have acquired the tangible
business, social, and leadership skills I will need to make Primo a massive
success and a company that will really make a difference.
Thanks
for the support,
Red Easley                                                                                               Red@primodc.com                                                                                       Primodc.com                                                                             Instagram.com/primodcComing Soon…                                                                                                                       Facebook.com/primodc                                                                                                   Twitter.com/primodc                                                                                           Primodc.tumblr.comHoodie/Tee Options-  Choose from the 3 design colors below.  If you would prefer a different color hoodie or tee, please note during payment.Primo Sticker

story:
My name is Eriko Higuchi. I was born and raised in Osaka, Japan where I attained a degree in fashion design, and for the past thirteen years I have called the U.S. my home. I grew up in a family who believed passionately in crafting items for use rather than buying them, and having parents who were artists instilled in me the desire to create things which were not simply well made but also beautiful and aesthetically pleasing. Whether making my own toys as a young child or helping my father build driftwood furniture as a teenager, my life has always involved devoting myself toward creating functional pieces of art. 

A lifetime of cultivating this creative ingenuity allowed me to personally solve the problem of shoulder and back pain I previously experienced from using typical purses and bags. 

Because of this, I was inspired to create a way to carry my belongings without such drawbacks. Out of this inspiration my Saddlebags design was born, and the end result was something which proved to be comfortable, stylish, and practical. Worn like a belt, they sit securely on the hips, making your gear easily accessible with the weight evenly distributed and supported by the legs rather than the back. Although the design was initially created for my own personal use, I have received countless inquiries from friends and strangers about how others can purchase Saddlebags for themselves. This has driven me toward the goal of making my Saddlebags a product I can share with the world. With your help, I hope to be able to manufacture and distribute this product on a much larger scale so that others can enjoy the functional fashion of these Saddlebags as much as I have. 

What we need and What you get :

In order to turn this dream into reality and for Saddlebags to become something that is accessible to everyone, I need your help in funding the large scale production of my creation. The design process is complete, so all that is left to manifest is the financial backing required to put this dream into action. By contributing toward this goal, you will be making it possible for people everywhere to acquire a product that is both stylish and useful for men and women of all kinds. 

What’s great about Saddlebags?

  • Storage for your gear in a convenient location, right by your hands
  • Saddlebags are worn like a belt rather than carried like a purse or bag, so it's easy to always have your things within arms' reach. You won't feel the need to set these down or hang them from your chair.
  • Large flaps cover, hide, and protect your belongings and fasten with a magnetic closure - easy to open, easy to close
  • Unlike pockets, your stuff stays accessible in a variety of positions - no more moving or stretching to fish items out of your jeans!
  • Stylish designs for men and women sculpted from supple, high quality leather in a selection of colors

Saddlebags are also backed by a warranty. I am so confident about the quality and durability of this design that if something were to happen within the first 2 years - excluding normal wear and tear/aging of the leather or damage resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, or negligence - I ask that you would send it back to be repaired.

For all of this to become possible, I am depending on your contributions to provide the necessary funds. In gratitude, I am offering a selection of items I’ve created as a reward for your support. Whichever you may choose, each piece will allow you to support my brand and show that you are an important and appreciated part of Echowear Designs.

The Impact:

 By helping fund this campaign you will be allowing people everywhere the opportunity to own for themselves something which has already become a sought after commodity in the eyes of people who have seen the original Saddlebags I made for myself. Launching my line of Saddlebags is only the beginning, however, and ultimately by contributing to this project, you are watering the seedling of Echowear, a fashion line I envision blossoming much further.

I have been passionately designing and creating wearable art for years and making all sorts of fashion, ranging from everyday clothing to avant garde costumes for performance. I believe in the quality of my work, and my vision and attention to detail has already earned me the success and honor of working as the lead costume designer for an increasingly popular performance group known as Quixotic Fusion. I want to see ECHOWEAR flourish so that a plentiful variety of my designs can be made available to the public. In order for that dream to come alive, I am starting by humbly asking for your support in this Saddlebags campaign. Every bit of help is greatly appreciated, and whether by donating or simply spreading the word to your friends and communities, you are what I need to make this happen. 

Sincerest thanks for being part of my dream...

story:
About Me:
My name is Deborah and I live in Rome with my husband and my son.
Since I was a child, fashion has always fascinated me and I was always drawing new clothing and new logos to be included on the clothes.
A year ago, I started working on the Kissbul logo. I dreamed about the logo, and I started showing it to friends to see if, by chance, it already existed. Everyone told me that they had never seen it and that they liked it very much.
I put the logo on my son's shirt and I started to get questions as soon as I sent him to school with it to see what reaction he would get.
His companions asked him where he had bought it and mothers came to me saying that their children wanted the same shirt as Stefano.
That is when I realized that I had created something that really really appealed to people, including children.


Goals for the future:
Making a line of shirts requires a lot of money, especially because I want to create a product that is 100% made in Italy and of high quality by using a fine fabric.
The first set of white T-shirts will be produced as soon as I reach my budget of 10,000 USD.
To make the black T-shirts, I only need 5,000 USD more since the production line will have already been started up and everything will start to cost less.
If things go well, I would like to sew the logo on the clothing by hand in order to not have a simple print.
The jackets, jeans, hats and necklaces with the logo will be created only when I reach the budget of 100,000 USD .

Not only optimism:
Made in Italy fashion is highly appreciated throughout the world, and what differentiates us from the rest of the world is the quality and design. Exporting this brand throughout the world would b ea great success, not only personally but for all of those who decide to significantly invest in this project.

 

Thank you !
CIAO from Deborah ....

story:
About DIORALOP:

Andreja Bistricic and Maja Merlic are the designers behind the creative label DIORALOP. DIORALOP was recently awarded prestigious the Best young designers ELLE Magazine Style Award.

DIORALOP collections are inspired by Polaroid pictures, which were created through intentional spills of chemicals and their exposure to different temperatures. This technique yields various colours and patterns, which are digitally printed in the UK, using variety of luxurious fabrics. Inspiration is drawn from subcultures, street fashion and issues with an emotional impact. Andreja’s taste for cut and deconstruction perfectly balanced with Maja’s vision of print and textile manipulation. Every season designers like to tell stories in different ways, using ambiguous fabrics, proportion and silhouette. DIORALOP designs are for person that is uncompromising, aware and individual.

The Croatian duo met in Zagreb, which lead to the launch of their label. Andreja obtained degree at Faculty of Textile and Technology in Zagreb/Croatia. Graduated from Central St. Martins College of Art and Design in 2009 specializing in womenswear, whilst expanding knowledge interning at Alexander McQueen studio. Maja is an architect, with strong sense of texture and style.

About this project:

And here is the reason why we need your help. We have just got a great offer to showcase our work in Paris, during Paris Fashion Week.  We are self funded brand and since this collection is going international, the costs are higher. 

By pledging to this fund, you will be giving a huge helping hand to DIORALOP brand.   This opportunity is crucial for the label, but with the total production and exhibition costs reaching around 5,000 $ it wont be possible without the help of our supporters and followers. Every cent is a step closer to our goal.


25 $ perk - Limited IndieGoGo edition DIORALOP tote bag with damaged polaroid print





100 $ perk - DIORALOP printed t-shirt

100% cotton + digital print


200 $ perk - DIORALOP printed scarf

100% silk chiffon - 100 cm x 100 cm

story:
20K Stretch Goal Explained:

 

When will Sunglasses Ship:

 

Enhanced Viewing Experience 

When you put on our sunglasses you’ll be stepping into a whole new world. Every single color is more vibrant than the last. Everything you see is enhanced more than you thought a pair of sunglasses could do. Unlike anything out there!

 

Unmatched Quality

Every pair is 100% Handmade in Italy. We make sure that every single pair is checked thoroughly after each step is completed to keep the utmost quality. 

 

Beta Testing

After creating our first line we made sure that every pair was fully tested. Our beta testers took on a challenge to take the sunglasses through the most vigorous conditions to see if they would pass. They made it with flying colors!

 

Special lenses

When you put on our sunglasses you’ll be stepping into a whole new world. Every single color is more vibrant than the last. Everything you see is enhanced more than you thought a pair of sunglasses could do. 

 

Our Approach To Style

We wanted to create a sleek and minimalist style suitable for everyone. Our sunglasses are not flashy and over-the-top. They can be worn for almost any occasion!

 

We Made A Style For Everyone!

 

What's In The Box?

You will get a pair of sunglasses of your choice, a leather carrying case that folds over the top, a soft yet durable microfiber cloth to polish up your lenses whenever you need it, and all packed in a custom sliding ZOLENOS box. 

Referral Program

From now on until the end of the campaign, you can refer friends to receive rewards from ZOLENOS. Lets begin!

 

Rules are simple:
Copy your unique referral link 

• Share your unique referral link with your friends and ask them to join the ZOLENOS family by placing an order on Indiegogo.

• You’ll receive FREE referral prizes including shipping! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

See below for prizes:

Want more cloths? It only takes 1 successful tracked referral before you earn 3 of these! They are made of high quality and are great for wiping not only your sunglasses but things such as computer screens.

Earn another case for your car along with 3 high quality ZOLENOS cloths by successfully referring 3 friends to our campaign.

Be part of the ZOLENOS story and try out our products before anyone else. We’ll work closely with you to test items and roll out only the very best products in the near future!

Don’t wait around and start referring friends to earn our Mens or Women's collection. 

 

The Who:

You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

 

The How:

Log into Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools, shown below.

How to Track Your Results:

• Log into your Indiegogo account.

• Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.

• Select the “My Profile” option.

• Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

• See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.

• We’ll send you free merchandise based on the total points earned!

 

Who We Are

We created ZOLENOS because of a passion for sunglasses and desire to bring the world a fresh outlook on the sunglasses industry. We got frustrated paying hundreds of dollars for name brand sunglasses, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make. We have spent all of 2016 working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking sunglasses collection that we know everyone will love. Also we have partnered with The Foundation for Blind Children to bring awareness to the cause. $5 off every pair of sunglasses bought through our campaign will be donated to the foundation. Another reason why our lenses are the way they are is to make sure people enjoy what they see. The children at the foundation are not as fortunate as us, thats why we made sure to give back to them. 

 

Our Team:

Michael Zielinski: Founder & Owner

Filip Boksa: Investor & CMO

Matthew Bianchi: Head of manufacturing

Vivek Prajapati: CTO

 

Our Future Plan

We want a full line of different types and styled sunglasses that always stay at an affordable cost. We also want to add other items that such as suits, jackets, bags, belts, dress shoes and more that are also luxurious, and also affordable. 

So join with us on this journey and be a part of it every step of the way. We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information. We want to create a bond with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning this dream into a reality.  We are super excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for ZOLENOS.

 

FAQ'S

ABOUT US:

Product Features:

SHIPPING & SAFETY:

CUSTOMER SERVICE:

story:
Summary

I was horrified by the level of cruelty inflicted on animals prior to slaughter, I then understood that the act of killing an animal for food was cruel in itself.

I was even more shocked to discover that livestock accounted for over 50% of greenhouse gas emissions and killing billions of animals for human consumption and fashion was actually contributing to killing us in a penultimate reminder of karma.

Everything is in Balance, shift the balance and the balance will shift on you.

I want to make a difference and I need your help.

We create petitions to create change in this world but ultimately governments are making rules we don’t agree with, we need to take back control and vote with our wallets, literally. It’s time to create change. - Slow the demand and slow the trade!

Welcome to Zessoo

We have created an incredible line of accessories made from fallen leaves, cork and waste materials headed for slums. These materials are sustainable and create a demand that is an alternative to leather and other animal skins. 

We're launching with our wallets made from leaves, with your help, other materials will soon follow, oh we are not stopping at wallets either, we have a range of bags coming, shoes and other fashion accessories. 

Zessoo leaf wallets made from leaves, bonded together through natural sunlight and dyed in colours through natural vegan friendly resources. Each wallet is handmade from the moment of picking up leaves to bonding and sewing to create the final piece. Every single wallet is unique due to the nature of no 2 leaves being the same and the process of making it by hand.



We also make wallets from cork and waste material like cement and rice backs due for the slums. Each design is named after and in recognition of historic figures supporting efforts to help create change and give back to others.

The Impact

Becoming a founding backer of Zessoo will help create change, we are not stopping at wallets, we have a range of bags coming, shoes and other fashion accessories. We cannot force leading brands to stop using leather and fur but can offer alternatives that are good quality and create a positive impact on society rather than hurt it.

Why is this only available in the US??

It's not, indiegogo require us to take payment in $ but we are shipping worldwide!

What there's more!!??

Every single order made with zessoo includes a digital copy of Cowspiracy. 



Risks & Challenges

Our accessories are handmade and I don’t want to compromise on our core ethics imposed by high demand or corporate greed. Each wallet takes 6 weeks to produce and are made from fallen leaves, please bare with us as we produce them, we will supply in date order of your orders so please get them in early. Our current expected delivery date is 6-8 weeks from your order. I’m confident our community will understand and wait for their delivery. They’re also ethically sourced and we have implemented procedures that gives back to the families and communities who make them.

Frequently asked questions

How long do these last and how are they produced?
This was one of the key reasons we waited 1 entire year before bringing these to market, we ran numerous tests and extremely happy with the results during normal wear and tear. We pride ourselves on quality, not just delivering alternatives, we need to be comparable to other manufacturers and ensure we deliver the best possible product at the right price in order to help people understand that there are viable alternative to animal skins. 

Here is a zessoo card wallet over loaded with cards with everyday normal pocket use since December 2016, in fact, we treated it without proper care or consideration to test the durability. 



Are the workers treated fairly?
This is an extremely interesting point, we are not making these items in mass produced factories, they're handmade in the same villages that are used to making them. We also give back to the villages and ensure this keeps their community sustained as the demand grows. We will only produce our items in accordance to our code of ethics and strive to deliver inline with our morals and reasons for doing this. 

What is the environmental impact of shipping?
Our items are packed in recycled packaging and wrapped in zessoo paper, the paper is pulp with seeds interlaced within the seams and we encourage customers to plant it. The paper will blossom into a patch of wild flowers helping attract local bees and butterflies creating a further positive impact on society. 

We will update this section as and when more questions arise. 

Thank you
story_txt: SummaryI was horrified by the level of cruelty inflicted on animals prior to slaughter, I then understood that the act of killing an animal for food was cruel in itself.I was even more shocked to discover that livestock accounted for over 50% of greenhouse gas emissions and killing billions of animals for human consumption and fashion was actually contributing to killing us in a penultimate reminder of karma.Everything is in Balance, shift the balance and the balance will shift on you.I want to make a difference and I need your help.We create petitions to create change in this world but ultimately governments are making rules we don’t agree with, we need to take back control and vote with our wallets, literally. It’s time to create change. - Slow the demand and slow the trade!Welcome to ZessooWe have created an incredible line of accessories made from fallen leaves, cork and waste materials headed for slums. These materials are sustainable and create a demand that is an alternative to leather and other animal skins. We're launching with our wallets made from leaves, with your help, other materials will soon follow, oh we are not stopping at wallets either, we have a range of bags coming, shoes and other fashion accessories. Zessoo leaf wallets made from leaves, bonded together through natural sunlight and dyed in colours through natural vegan friendly resources. Each wallet is handmade from the moment of picking up leaves to bonding and sewing to create the final piece. Every single wallet is unique due to the nature of no 2 leaves being the same and the process of making it by hand.We also make wallets from cork and waste material like cement and rice backs due for the slums. Each design is named after and in recognition of historic figures supporting efforts to help create change and give back to others.The ImpactBecoming a founding backer of Zessoo will help create change, we are not stopping at wallets, we have a range of bags coming, shoes and other fashion accessories. We cannot force leading brands to stop using leather and fur but can offer alternatives that are good quality and create a positive impact on society rather than hurt it.Why is this only available in the US??It's not, indiegogo require us to take payment in $ but we are shipping worldwide!What there's more!!??Every single order made with zessoo includes a digital copy of Cowspiracy. Risks & ChallengesOur accessories are handmade and I don’t want to compromise on our core ethics imposed by high demand or corporate greed. Each wallet takes 6 weeks to produce and are made from fallen leaves, please bare with us as we produce them, we will supply in date order of your orders so please get them in early. Our current expected delivery date is 6-8 weeks from your order. I’m confident our community will understand and wait for their delivery. They’re also ethically sourced and we have implemented procedures that gives back to the families and communities who make them.Frequently asked questionsHow long do these last and how are they produced?This was one of the key reasons we waited 1 entire year before bringing these to market, we ran numerous tests and extremely happy with the results during normal wear and tear. We pride ourselves on quality, not just delivering alternatives, we need to be comparable to other manufacturers and ensure we deliver the best possible product at the right price in order to help people understand that there are viable alternative to animal skins. Here is a zessoo card wallet over loaded with cards with everyday normal pocket use since December 2016, in fact, we treated it without proper care or consideration to test the durability. Are the workers treated fairly?This is an extremely interesting point, we are not making these items in mass produced factories, they're handmade in the same villages that are used to making them. We also give back to the villages and ensure this keeps their community sustained as the demand grows. We will only produce our items in accordance to our code of ethics and strive to deliver inline with our morals and reasons for doing this. What is the environmental impact of shipping?Our items are packed in recycled packaging and wrapped in zessoo paper, the paper is pulp with seeds interlaced within the seams and we encourage customers to plant it. The paper will blossom into a patch of wild flowers helping attract local bees and butterflies creating a further positive impact on society. We will update this section as and when more questions arise. Thank you

story:
Our Neck Warmer 

We harvest milkweed pods in the fall and separate the floss. Like down, it is light and fluffy with the same insulating value but is less allergenic and less cruel. We use the floss to insulate our toasty, Vermont-made neck warmers. The seeds go back in the soil! Milkweed is required by monarch butterflies to rear their young. They are one of the hundreds of pollinators nurtured in the landscapes Bee the Change creates.

 

Our Mission

Habitat loss from human encroachment is one of the principal reasons our pollinators are disappearing. Our organization creates pollinator habitat in solar fields. We began in 2015 and are now working in fields across the northeast.

Why a Neck Warmer

With every beat of your heart, a large amount of blood goes to your brain and a small amount goes to your scalp, but all of it flows through your neck. The place to fight heat loss is not at the top of your head, but your neck!

 

What is FlossOFur

Our plant-based insulation, which we’ve coined “FlossOFur”, is made from milkweed floss. Many pollinators nectar on milkweed flowers, but the Monarchs require milkweed leaves to raise their young. Milkweed is disfavored for its problematic nature. We decided to change that narrative and create a plant-based alternative to goose down.

This milkweed is Solar Grown- meaning it is harvested on and around solar farms where we have created pollinator habitat. We must not waste space on the limited surface of our planet, This combination of sustainable clean energy production and thoughtful land stewardship is designed to warm the heart as well as the neck.

The Impact

Bee The Change plants habitat for pollinators in the unused spaces in solar fields. For each neck warmer sold, we will create 180 square feet of pollinator habitat. Your purchase is an investment in the future. Thank you for thinking of the pollinators!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please feel free to share this with a friend, family member, or acquaintance who cares about pollinators, the environment, or winter apparel. We appreciate your support towards the pollinators!

story:
I've been a diabetic since I was .22 months old, I will be 47 this year.  I aspired to go into the military but that was out.   I went in to veteriary medicine and worked in the field for a  few years then my vision bega failing.   Surgery saved some of it but left me impaired.   About ten years later I had a mild stroke and renal failure in the span of three months.   I regained my ability to walk but spent three years on dialysis then ended up getting a transplant.   I am reaching then end of what is considered 'averages' for the transplant to stay viable.

 

When the vision issues started I took up photography-it was under the idea that eventually I would go totally blind and could have the images described to me to bring back memories of what I once saw. and it turned out, I am pretty good.   I tend to view the world a bit differently and that allows me to see things as few others ever could unless I photo it for them.   I crawled thru the Arizona desert to photo when I was on dialysis, lived in the Pa. mountains and hobbled my way through the woods to photograph.  I travel whenever possible just to photograph.   Blood, Sweat and Tears are part of my life.

 

Unfortunately the health issues leave me uninsurable therefore unemployable, my monthly income averages what a person makes a week at an o.k. job-two weeks at a crappy job.  :lol:  But I can not afford to even cover my eeds on my own anymore.   Humiliasting.

 

It is time to replace my gear-my camera is ten years old and failing.

 

If this can be shared-it would take 5000 people at $1 each and I would be going forward again.   I try to pay it forward-giving away a lot of my photography and work to people that could not afford it but that comes at the cost of no income.

 

The best I can do...

 

http://chronart.wix.com/chronart

story:
We need your support to get this publication printed. We offer free shipping during this campaign.

APE#033
Stefan Vanthuyne, The hill that wasn't
18,5 x 26 cm, 28 pages

A pile of dirt on a farmer's land. That's all it was, really. I drove by it and I saw it. I cannot recall the exact day, except that it was somewhere in the fall. Time passed by, the seasons changed. During the winter it was bare, though there were days when it was covered in a blanket of snow. I would still occasionally drive by it and see it. In the spring it woke gently to the warmth of the sun. I would drive by it. And I would see it.
Then came the summer, and it grew lush and full. One Sunday morning, while in a sentimental mood, I didn't simply drive by it. I stopped, I walked onto the land and approached it. And then I photographed it. Two weeks later I drove by the farmer's land again. To my surprise the pile of dirt was gone.

Two years later I read a thirty year old essay by Japanese photographer Yutaka Takanashi, The "Landscape" Appears. In it he discusses a haiku by the poet Matsuo Basho, using it as a metaphor for landscape photography. 'What is up to the photographer to do with the "landscape"', Takanashi writes, 'is to encounter it, destroy it, rebuild it, and then release it.' Therein lies the pursuit of a new "landscape", the landscape of the photograph, the landscape of the haiku. One that not only relates an experience, but is an experience. Like Basho's haiku. Maybe that is what The hill that wasn't is about. I had seen the landscape many times, but it was not until that summer morning that I encountered it. And by photographing it and turning it into this book, I destroyed it, rebuilt it and released it.

www.stefanvanthuyne.be

2 of the 6 available gelatin silver prints below

story:
All you need is ONE.

The SLIM Leather Card Case by Hitsman is a single pocket top grain leather wallet. It's perfect for your every day use, traveling on the weekends, and slipping into your tux jacket on those special occasions. 

That's right, when you're living a fast-life on the go, you only need one slot to carry all the essential cards and cash. We've tested this wallet for 2 years and found that we always had exactly what we needed. The Hitsman SLIM card case is handcrafted in the USA from premium top grain leathers and is built to last a lifetime - in fact, we back it by our Lifetime Guarantee.


DESIGN

We know what you're thinking: it's simple, right? It took a few weeks of searching through various designs and making different versions for us to realize - you only need one pocket! Instead of bogging our wallet down with an intricate design, bulky money clip, and 10 pockets that no man should need, we opted for a single-pocket card case made of premium leather, professional grade thread, and good 'ol craftsmanship. 


MATERIAL  -  Durable and Buttery-Soft Premium Top Grain Leather

When designing a slim wallet, a lot of companies are temped to implement stretchy fabrics, thin mesh, or sometimes plastic. We don't believe these materials do the job. So what did we choose? The same premium leather you trust in your luxury belts, hard-working boots, and durable travel accessories. It's extremely durable and buttery-soft to the touch. 


SLANTED Pocket

In terms of the wallet's aesthetic, we chose a slanted pocket for both looks and functionality. often times with slim card cases, you might have trouble pinching out the right card from the narrow slot. To fix this problem, our slanted front panel gives you perfect access to your most used cards without giving away to many details.

CARRIES EVERYTHING YOU NEED

The Hitsman SLIM leather card case carries 7 cards and even some cash. Now that most smartphones can scan your flight passes, movie tickets, and gift cards, all you need is a wallet like our SLIM leather card case that will hold your essentials - a driver's license, credit card, and a little cash.



THINNER than an iPhone 5S and iPad 2

Our ideal slim card case wallet has always been one that is thin and minimal in design. It's not necessary to carry all that bulk in your back pocket and we're here to help. Our premium leather card case carries up to 7 cards and even some cash. That's all you need!

Slimmer than an iPhone 5S

TRIED and TESTED

The SLIM card case wallet has been tried and tested for over 3 years by our team. We've taken it overseas to 5 different countries. We've traveled through rain and snow, and we've taken our wallets with us through it all. Here's an example of just how well our leather card case holds up:


FEATURES:

  1. Single piece of premium top grain leather (light brown or dark brown)
  2. Cut by hand
  3. Stitched with industrial machine
  4. Sealed and edge-painted by hand
  5. Single card slot - hold up to 7 cards and light cash
  6. 100% handcrafted in the USA

COLORS -  Light Brown, Dark Brown, and *Special Edition* NAVY

We're making the first run of this wallet in light brown and dark brown top grain leather. Also, as a special edition Indiegogo version, we're offering a premium navy leather version. 

If we exceed our stretch goal of $6,500, we'll look at offering new colors too!


LOGO or NO LOGO - Get it the way you want it!

Whether or not you like a logo, we've got you covered. Below you'll see that we make this wallet custom just for you. 

We allow you to choose from our standard "H" logo or from a no logo wallet that will have the Hitsman brand name printed on the inside. We are also offering a laser cut Hitsman logo on the back of the wallet (small and minimalist).


What We Need ---- What You Get

We're looking to raise $3500. If successful, these funds will help us accomplish the following goals:

  • We will purchase new leathers for our current design
  • We'll be able to acquire our own machine to deboss our logo into the leather
  • Most importantly! We'll be able to start spreading our card cases to quality menswear stores near you!


GUARANTEED FOR LIFE

Here's how it works. We think products that are handcrafted in the USA should be accompanied by a warranty that stands behind the premium level of craftsmanship that goes into each product. If for any reason the stitching comes undone or the leather rips, we'll repair or replace the item for the life of the product. All you have to do is send us an email, place the item in the mail, and we'll get it fixed!


REWARDS

Early Bird Hitsman SLIM Card Case - $35   (only 150 available)

This special deal is for the early bird supporter. You'll receive the Hitsman premium SLIM leather card case in the color of your choice. Choose the logo style you desire, and you will get a card case personalized to your taste that's accompanied by a lifetime warranty.

Indiegogo Special: Navy SLIM Card Case - $44   (only 50 available)

This might be our favorite one! Our navy leather card case is the perfect style for anyone who wants their wallet to stand out. It's made from the same premium top grain leather as our other card cases and is handcrafted in the USA. It's the perfect navy color and guaranteed to last! Did we mention it's a special edition? There's only 50 available so get one before they're gone!

SLIM Card Case - $39

This deal won't last long. Our card cases will retail for $55 - $75, but we want to extend a special offer to you while we can! These wallets are handcrafted in the USA with a lifetime guarantee. Get one while you can!

YOU CAN EVEN GET TWO!   Or....

Pocket Square - $25

For the guy who already has a great wallet but still wants to support our brand. You'll get to choose one of our signature cotton print or classic pattern pocket squares. Handcrafted in the USA.


The Impact

When you pledge for this project, you're doing more than spending a few of your hard earned dollars. You're investing in American manufacturing and quality jobs for men and women in the USA. In addition to that, you're investing in the dream of a company and its passionate founders. We're determined to bring you luxury products at a price that makes sense.


How You Can Help

Make a pledge! Every pledge helps us reach our goal and grow our line with new products. We take it seriously when you invest in our creations and we're excited at the opportunity to provide you with a product and design that is well worth your pledge.

Anything else? Glad you asked! You can also help us reach our goal by spreading the word via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more!

If you have any questions, feel free to send us a message and we'll help you out!

email us at michael@hitsmanusa.com

story:
Chi preferisse vedere il video in italiano può cliccare Video in ITALIANO

Pulydog 2.0 is the first and only motorized extendable dog droppings remover that enables you to pick up dog feces while standing, with no risk of contact, in a few seconds with the push of a button.

If you own a dog – and even if you don’t – it is easy to understand that to pick up dog excrement is not the most pleasant thing to do. Of course, leaving it on the street is even worse.

Existing tools, such as clamps, bags, and similar items can help; nevertheless, they cannot prevent you from bending, using your hands, and maybe feeling some bad sensations. Moreover, the elderly can find stooping to be painful, and children can be at risk of disease through contact with excrement.

We thought there must be a better way - and thus invented Pulydog.

Pulydog 2.0 lets you pick up           dog droppings
in the most comfortable, easy, stylish, 
and hygienically safe way.

ONLY 8.5" LONG!

                    

Only 8.5” long (like a TV remote control), it is fully portable, and when needed can extend up to 27”.


                                                            

Just place it on the ground and push the button. Driven by paddles, in a few seconds the bag opens and closes around the feces.

                                  

Then, by pushing a second button the Pulydog 2.0 retracts automatically .

                                        

 

The bag has a self-closing system, and when you unlock it from the paddles it is ready for disposal. Easy, isn’t it?                                                         

                    


After use, you can put Pulydog 2.0 in its slipcase and keep it with you in your handbag or in your pocket.

                                          


It is also equipped with a strap to hang on your wrist or on the leash.

                                                                      


Pulydog 2.0 is covered by an international patent (n. PCT/IT2013/000186).

Some dog owners find it unpleasant, embarrassing, or simply uncomfortable to pick up dog droppings. However, leaving them on the street means not respecting the environment or other pedestrians. In most towns it also means the risk of a fine.

Pulydog 2.0 can be a bright solution. When needed, it can remove droppings on your behalf in a few seconds, and does so effortlessly. You just have to push a button and throw the self-closing bag away. (Waste should be disposed according to local regulations).

Cool, isn’t it?

Perhaps you do not have a dog… well, forward this to your friends who do and surprise them!

     

    No more awkward bending...

            ... with Pulydog 2.0


History

Once we came up with the basic idea, around a year ago we founded our start-up and developed the first model (Pulydog 1.0) in order to test the functionality of the tool. All tests on prototypes were successful, so we decided to build a pre-series lot of Pulydogs using our own resources to sell on the local market.

Even though this was expensive, it was very useful because it let us find two important results:

  • First, it let us select the proper production and logistic suppliers in terms of quality, affordability, and prices. We can now count on the good relationships we established.
  • Second, we gained real market feedback by analyzing hundreds of actual customer and user opinions.

Basically, the feedback from customers and users of Pulydog 1.0 was:

- very good and useful idea

-  it works very well

-  portability is not satisfying as it is too long and a little too      heavy

So we had to decide whether to improve the existing product with some minor adjustments or to make major changes. We opted for completely revising the project by reengineering a brand new model, with the same functionality but a dramatic change in the dimensions and weight.

Thanks to the experience gained from model 1.0, Pulydog 2.0 can perform the same function with almost half the length and less than half the weight. That’s an evolution of:

-  from 16” to 8.5” long, and

-  from 13oz to 6oz (project design calculation – to be confirmed after prototypes tests), batteries included.


In other words, Pulydog 2.0 is as long as a common TV remote control, which means you can easily carry it on your pocket, purse, or bag. When needed, you can extend it up to 27”, in order to let you comfortably operate while standing.

Furthermore, while the 1.0 automatically extended and manually retracted, using customer suggestions we made this the opposite for model 2.0. To avoid any risk of hurting animals while opening, the new model has to be extended by hand and can be retracted by pushing a button. Moreover, the new self-closing bag makes it easier to put on and possibly cheaper in retail price.

Other information on technical data is available below or on www.pulydog.com. 
For further questions please feel free to contact us at info@pulydog.com.

Color

In the first phase the customer can choose between these three color combinations:

   

        1. silver/blue              2. orange/black          3. light/dark green


We want our backers to be fully satisfied. If you prefer one of the other combinations below, when contributing you can indicate a second color preference. If we reach a minimum order number (1,500 pc.) for that color combination we will add it to those available and will ship your preferred color.

                   4. blue/grey                                   5. dark grey/red 


                   6. pink/purple                                7.yellow/green


Stay tuned to see the available colors evolution during the campaign and share your color preference with friends. The more popular your preference becomes the higher the probability it will be made.

Please remember that the full black combination is a specific color special edition, reserved for the best backers – see the Perks section.

The Full Black Limited Edition for Indiegogo Campaign


Tech Notes

  • Materials: most of the components are made of anti-shock, nontoxic plastic material, such as ABS, POM, and nylon.
  • Electricity supply: 2 AA 1.5 volt batteries.
  • Dimensions LxWxH: retracted 8.53” x 1.79” x 2.09” (217 x 45 x 53 mm); extended L 27.5” (701 mm). Dimensions by project design, minor adjustment are possible according to test results.
  • Weight with batteries included: 5.3oz (150 gr) – estimated by project design calculation.

For further information please contact us at info@pulydog.com.


Use of Funds

The estimated amount of funds needed is based on the experience of the first model; therefore, we are reasonably confident that every single activity could be carried out in time once we attain our target with your support.

The main cost items and their relative weight of total funds needed are the following:

  • prototypes (4%)
  • functional and stress tests on prototypes (8%)
  • design industrialization adjustment (3%)
  • pre-series lot manufacturing (5/7%, included in the following)
  • dimensional and stress tests on pre-series lot, type-approvals, certifications (5%)
  • mold making and first lot of effective production, including pre-series manufacturing (60%)
  • bags, accessories, and packaging manufacturing (10%)
  • fund raising fees, warehouse and logistic costs, other minor costs (10%)

As previously mentioned, we can count on a network of selected suppliers that will grant us a good package in terms of quality, affordable service, and competitive prices.

We firmly believe that a good idea cannot become a success by itself; it needs support from professional skills, good planning, strong personal commitment, and - most of all - good backers.

We really hope you like our idea as much as we do. We are ready to start - are you?

Thank you in advance for your support.


Timing

The above timelines were settled by prudently considering activities, in particular the tests whose duration depend on punctual results. If no major problems arise, the timing could be quicker.

However, backers will always be kept aware of the progress stages of the process. 


Meet the Pulydog Team

Stefano Revel

Founder

 .        

Stefano has wide experience in management control and as an internal auditing consultant in several multinational companies, including automotive (FCA), luxury cars (Ferrari, Maserati), and in manufacturing, financial, and logistic sectors.

According to my experience the best solutions are never too complex, and sometimes little things can make everyday life better.

The point is that there is great satisfaction in sharing the sensation of creating something new.

Moreno Masetti

Technical manager

 .

Moreno, with his own company, 2M, has engineered and designed various successful products, mostly for child health, such as Propolina and Salvaledita (ideated and patented by Moreno - salvaledita.com). His work has received several awards from the specialized press (see Gallery).

In my job, I always try to work on products that I like. When Stefano told me about Pulydog I thought this was such a case, as I think it is a very useful idea for both people and the environment.

Gianluca Revel

Multimedia manager

 .

Music maker, video maker, graphic and web designer, and dog lover, Gianluca is the artistic part of the team. He made the Pulydog website (pulydog.com) in just a few days (and some nights)!

I joined the team to counterbalance the cool economic and technical minds of the guys above with a little art… Just kidding, I like Pulydog because, like all little great ideas, it’s not only useful but it’s funny too.

And I love my dog even more than before.

Chi preferisse vedere il video in italiano può cliccare Video in ITALIANO
Pulydog 2.0
is the first and only motorized extendable dog droppings remover that enables you
to pick up dog feces while standing, with no risk of contact, in a few seconds with
the push of a button.
If you own
a dog – and even if you don’t – it is easy to understand that to pick up dog excrement
is not the most pleasant thing to do. Of course, leaving it on the street is
even worse.
Existing
tools, such as clamps, bags, and similar items can help; nevertheless, they cannot
prevent you from bending, using your hands, and maybe feeling some bad
sensations. Moreover, the elderly can find stooping to be painful, and children
can be at risk of disease through contact with excrement.
We thought
there must be a better way - and thus invented Pulydog.

Pulydog 2.0 lets you
  pick up           dog droppingsin the most comfortable, easy, stylish, and
  hygienically safe way.

ONLY 8.5" LONG!


                   



Only 8.5” long (like a TV remote control), it is fully portable, and when needed can extend up to 27”.


                                                            






Just place it on the ground and push the button. Driven by paddles, in a few seconds the bag opens and closes around the feces.



                                  





Then, by pushing a second button the Pulydog 2.0 retracts automatically .




                                        


 


The bag has
a self-closing system, and when you unlock it from the paddles it is ready for disposal.
Easy, isn’t it?                                                         



                    





After use,
you can put Pulydog 2.0 in its slipcase and keep it with you in your handbag or
in your pocket.

                                          

It is also equipped with a strap to hang on your wrist or on
the leash.

                                                                      

Pulydog 2.0
is covered by an international patent (n. PCT/IT2013/000186).
Some dog
owners find it unpleasant, embarrassing, or simply uncomfortable to pick up dog
droppings. However, leaving them on the street means not respecting the
environment or other pedestrians. In most towns it also means the risk of a fine.
Pulydog 2.0
can be a bright solution. When needed, it can remove droppings on your behalf
in a few seconds, and does so effortlessly. You just have to push a button and throw
the self-closing bag away. (Waste should be disposed according to local regulations).
Cool, isn’t
it?
Perhaps you
do not have a dog… well, forward this to your friends who do and surprise them!









     




    No more awkward bending...


            ... with Pulydog 2.0





History
Once we
came up with the basic idea, around a year ago we founded our start-up and developed
the first model (Pulydog 1.0) in order to test the functionality of the tool.
All tests on prototypes were successful, so we decided to build a pre-series
lot of Pulydogs using our own resources to sell on the local market.
Even though
this was expensive, it was very useful because it let us find two important
results:



First,
it let us select the proper production and logistic suppliers in terms of
quality, affordability, and prices. We can now count on the good relationships
we established.


Second,
we gained real market feedback by analyzing hundreds of actual customer and
user opinions.


Basically, the feedback from customers and
users of Pulydog 1.0 was:



- very good and useful idea





- 
  it works very well





- 
  portability is not satisfying as it is too long and a little too      heavy




So we had
to decide whether to improve the existing product with some minor adjustments
or to make major changes. We opted for completely revising the project by
reengineering a brand new model, with the same functionality but a dramatic
change in the dimensions and weight.
Thanks to

from
16” to 8.5” long, and

- 
from

batteries included.

below or on www.pulydog.com. For further questions please feel free to contact
us at info@pulydog.com.

story:
BEHIND VOLATILE

   Over the past few years my style has been changing. I tried many different brands and styles, and I couldn't figure out what I honestly liked. I loved the soft, pink comfy sweaters, and the black skin tight ripped skinny jeans. I loved the little floral head bands, and the white crop tops, but I also liked the combat boots and band tees. I switched through many styles, and at the end of it I liked a little of everything.

  Then, I came up with an idea. What if, I could just type in a web address and I could view many different styles at once? The term Volatile means "constantly changing", and everybody goes through theirs.

   Volatile will be located online (maybe one day moving into a building) and will hold hand designed clothes and accessories all in many different styles.

    WHAT WILL YOU USE THE   

               MONEY FOR?

   To open up Volatile I will need around $15,000. The money will be used for:

  • Manufacturing (can cost up to $1000)
  • Shipping (can cost up to $500)
  • Designing
  • Bags for clothing
  • Labels
  • Tags
  • Maintaining the site

   I am hoping to open the store with ten different items ranging from extra-small to large. 

                    PERKS

   I will be offering:

  • $1=  hand written thank you note
  • $50= $50 In Store Credit (information will be emailed)
  • $1,000= One of everything when Volatile opens

story:
the Story...

Gary and Judy Levens currently live in Dayboro, Queensland and are the proud parents of three beautiful daughters and enjoying the blessings of family and grandchildren.

They also have an truly amazing heart to reach out to people and obedience to the call of God.

For over 40 years Gary and Judy have served in church and missions work in New Zealand, Chile and Australia.  For the past 16 years Gary was the senior pastor of a church in Brisbane.  They have also been directly and actively involved in setting up and supporting christian orhanages in Africa, India and South America.

At the time when many start to consider their final work years to retirement and the security of a job they have taken a different road in response to the challenges they see around them and the call to serve.

Gary a has resigned his senior position with his former church and they have taken a step out, with no direct financial support, to establish a church in Dayboro.  Dayboro is a small regional town about an hours drive from Brisbane.  They have a venue and the first church service will be on Sunday 22 September.

Since taking the step to follow the call Gary and Judy have seen very good local responses and an initial meeting of interested people had over 20 in attendance.

Setting up any church requires money - for all the material things which we often take for granted.  Things such as children's church material, sound equipment, projectors, seats, signs, advertising etc.

A team is starting to grow.  My involvement, along with others, is in offering my time and to help personally and in other ways to do all the hundreds of things that need doing.

How can you help?

This campaign has a target of $30,000 toward the establishment costs of the church. Everything that we do collect, your individual contributions, will go to purchase the assets and equipment that will stay with the church in the various ministry areas over the years to come.

If you know Gary and Judy you will know that they are people of intergrity and worthy of your support.  That can be through a personal contribution here, small or large, or by simply passing on the word to others.

Payment options are credit card or paypal.

story:
A Different Standard of Affordable Timepieces

 

Variant, by definition means "Different from the Standard." 

This is the basis for which our company was formed.           

Simply put, we just love watches and want to create original, high-quality timepieces that are designed with a striking aesthetic and functionality at a reasonable and honest price that reflects the components and materials that have been used. We believe that style and affordability DO NOT need to come at the expense of quality.

Our first collection, the VA-01 series represents everything we love in a versatile everyday watch that can be worn dressed up or down. This collection is Unisex in style and design.

 

*Note - All photos in this project are of the pre-production prototypes of the VA-01. Refer to the notes at the bottom of the project for details on items that will be updated for the production version.

Our original timepieces draw inspiration from other watches we love and would want to wear. We wanted to create a modern watch with a timeless design that is uncluttered, yet visually interesting. Clean in design, but will stand out in the sea of "minimalist" clones on the market today.

Unlike many of the "affordable luxury" brands on the market today that choose style over substance, we don't believe you need to compromise one over the other. We've packed our VA-01 series with high-end components and features that people usually pay a premium for.

Case: Brushed and Polished Surgical Grade Stainless Steel Plated in Steel, Gold, Rose Gold, Black (PVD Matte)  

Size: 40 mm (48 mm lug to lug) / 20 mm Lug Width / 5 mm Crown / 7.7 mm Thick  

Water Resistant: 100 M / 328 Feet / 10 ATM  

Crystal: Flat Triple Layered Anti-reflective Coated Sapphire Crystal.  

Dial: Applied Indices. C1 (Blue) Lume Applied on Hands and Pips on Reflector Ring. Date Window (3'o clock) and Small Seconds Subdial.  

Movement: Swiss Made Ronda 6004.D Quartz Movement, 5 Jeweled

Battery Life: Renata Swiss Batteries, 25-40 Month Battery Life.  

Strap: Genuine Calf Leather / Stainless Steel Milanese Mesh / Easy Release Pins  

Warranty: 2 years

By offering the VA-01 collection directly via Kickstarter we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity/scarcity, and offer a $450* watch for a fraction of the price.

*What some of these companies below are charging for comparable models

SIMPLY THE BEST ACROSS THE BOARD- In comparison to comparable models

It's ridiculous that some of these companies are marking up their prices up to 100x the value for a subpar or similar product!

 Case

  • 316L Stainless Steel

Brushed and Polished finishes with a signed crown

For the case, we utilized premium surgical grade 316L stainless steel for its strength and corrosion resistance. The mixture of brushed and polished surfaces allow for the premium look and feel of our timepieces. At a 40 mm diameter (48 mm lug to lug), and 7.7 mm thickness, it is the perfect for any wrist!

7.7 mm Thin!

  • 10 ATM Water Resistant

Screw down Case back allows for increased Water Resistance

Most companies are okay with their watches being minimally water resistant with 3-5 ATM being the standard. That's cool, we're not them and believe that it's better to over-engineer our watches than to not. 

All of our timepieces are rated at 10 ATM water resistance, meaning you can go for a swim or even scuba dive in a depth of up to 100 meters or 328 feet without worry. (The leather straps are not water-proof)

Crystal

  • Sapphire

With a 9.0 on the Mohs scale, the only thing harder is Diamond

Our timepieces are equipped with triple layered anti-reflection coated Sapphire crystal which is one of the most scratch resistant materials available to ensure your view of the dial will always be unobscured and pristine.

Dial

Multi-layered dial with hand applied polished hour markers, along with a unique radial CD cut pattern help give our dial a more premium look. The small seconds subdial adds a bold contrast in the design. The date window at the 3'o clock then completes the functionality of the timepiece. 

Low Light / No Light Functionality!

C1 Superluminova lines the reflector ring as well as the hands to enhance low light to no light functionality.  

Movement

  • Swiss-Made Quartz

UNLIKE many companies that use lower end movements with plastic components to save on costs, we went with a movement made by Ronda, a Swiss company which has a long track record of creating precise, reliable movements. 

The Swiss-made Ronda caliber 6004.D is a 5 jeweled, gold plated and completely metal movement, meaning it is resilient and fully repairable should anything happen to it.

Swiss-Made Ronda Caliber 6004.D

Why Quartz?

While we definitely love our hand wound and automatic movements, there is something about the ease and efficiency of a good quartz watch. You set it, forget it, and it's good to go. 

-10/+20 secs variation a Month

Whereas some autos -10/+20 secs in variation a Day

Straps

 All straps are 20 mm wide

To keep the price affordable given the materials and level of craftsmanship we are using, we have a minimum number of watches that we need to order, and that's where you come in. By backing our project, you will help us pay for the first production run, and in exchange you will receive a beautiful watch with an impressive spec sheet at a highly discounted price!

 How we're able to offer such affordable prices. 

Cutting out the middlemen to save you money! Heard that before? We're sure you have, but hey, that's the idea! We are trying to offer you the best price without overly marking up a product more than it actually costs us to produce it. Honesty and transparency are very important to us as a company.

 

After over a year of designing, prototyping, revisions, and preparation for this campaign, we are finally at this stage. The plan from here on out will be as follows:   

With our suppliers ready to go, we need your help to place our first purchase order. Your support will go towards helping us bring our dream into reality. 

Thanks again, and please help share this campaign!

 Check out these links below to see more!

 

As noted at the beginning of the campaign, this will be where the changes for the production version will be shown.

Inverted Date Dial

1. The date dial on the all black model will be changed from white to the reverse (black with white numbering).

Lumed pips around reflector ring

2. The addition of lume pips around the hour indicators on the reflector ring, allowing for increased night/low light functionality (on all models).

 

Shipping

We will ship VARIANT watches worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen. 

Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable in your region.  

Free shipping in the US  

International shipping costs: $10  

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.  

ESTIMATED DELIVERY  

We will start fulfilling orders mid January 2018. While we do not expect this deadline to change, it is possible the estimated shipment month may be updated. We will do everything in our power to get these timepieces on your wrists as soon as possible, but not at the expense of quality. If at any time you would like an update, please either check the "Updates" section of our  campaign, or feel free to email us at hello@variantwatches.co

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help us get the word out about our campaign
  • Help us by using Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you all!

Team Variant
