Variant, by definition means "Different from the Standard." 
This is the basis for which our company was formed.           

Simply put, we just love watches and want to create original, high-quality timepieces that are designed with a striking aesthetic and functionality at a reasonable and honest price that reflects the components and materials that have been used. We believe that style and affordability DO NOT need to come at the expense of quality.


Our first collection, the VA-01 series represents everything we love in a versatile everyday watch that can be worn dressed up or down. This collection is Unisex in style and design.

 

*Note - All photos in this project are of the pre-production prototypes of the VA-01. Refer to the notes at the bottom of the project for details on items that will be updated for the production version.

Our original timepieces draw inspiration from other watches we love and would want to wear. We wanted to create a modern watch with a timeless design that is uncluttered, yet visually interesting. Clean in design, but will stand out in the sea of "minimalist" clones on the market today.


Unlike many of the "affordable luxury" brands on the market today that choose style over substance, we don't believe you need to compromise one over the other. We've packed our VA-01 series with high-end components and features that people usually pay a premium for.




Case: Brushed and Polished Surgical Grade Stainless Steel Plated in Steel, Gold, Rose Gold, Black (PVD Matte)  
Size: 40 mm (48 mm lug to lug) / 20 mm Lug Width / 5 mm Crown / 7.7 mm Thick  
Water Resistant: 100 M / 328 Feet / 10 ATM  
Crystal: Flat Triple Layered Anti-reflective Coated Sapphire Crystal.  
Dial: Applied Indices. C1 (Blue) Lume Applied on Hands and Pips on Reflector Ring. Date Window (3'o clock) and Small Seconds Subdial.  
Movement: Swiss Made Ronda 6004.D Quartz Movement, 5 Jeweled
Battery Life: Renata Swiss Batteries, 25-40 Month Battery Life.  
Strap: Genuine Calf Leather / Stainless Steel Milanese Mesh / Easy Release Pins  
Warranty: 2 years

By offering the VA-01 collection directly via Kickstarter we are able to cut out the retail channel, middlemen markups, brand exclusivity/scarcity, and offer a $450* watch for a fraction of the price.
*What some of these companies below are charging for comparable models

SIMPLY THE BEST ACROSS THE BOARD- In comparison to comparable models
It's ridiculous that some of these companies are marking up their prices up to 100x the value for a subpar or similar product!

 Case
316L Stainless Steel

Brushed and Polished finishes with a signed crown
For the case, we utilized premium surgical grade 316L stainless steel for its strength and corrosion resistance. The mixture of brushed and polished surfaces allow for the premium look and feel of our timepieces. At a 40 mm diameter (48 mm lug to lug), and 7.7 mm thickness, it is the perfect for any wrist!

7.7 mm Thin!
10 ATM Water Resistant

Screw down Case back allows for increased Water Resistance
Most companies are okay with their watches being minimally water resistant with 3-5 ATM being the standard. That's cool, we're not them and believe that it's better to over-engineer our watches than to not. 
All of our timepieces are rated at 10 ATM water resistance, meaning you can go for a swim or even scuba dive in a depth of up to 100 meters or 328 feet without worry. (The leather straps are not water-proof)
Crystal
Sapphire

With a 9.0 on the Mohs scale, the only thing harder is Diamond
Our timepieces are equipped with triple layered anti-reflection coated Sapphire crystal which is one of the most scratch resistant materials available to ensure your view of the dial will always be unobscured and pristine.
Dial

Multi-layered dial with hand applied polished hour markers, along with a unique radial CD cut pattern help give our dial a more premium look. The small seconds subdial adds a bold contrast in the design. The date window at the 3'o clock then completes the functionality of the timepiece. 

Low Light / No Light Functionality!
C1 Superluminova lines the reflector ring as well as the hands to enhance low light to no light functionality.  
Movement
Swiss-Made Quartz
UNLIKE many companies that use lower end movements with plastic components to save on costs, we went with a movement made by Ronda, a Swiss company which has a long track record of creating precise, reliable movements. 
The Swiss-made Ronda caliber 6004.D is a 5 jeweled, gold plated and completely metal movement, meaning it is resilient and fully repairable should anything happen to it.

Swiss-Made Ronda Caliber 6004.D
Why Quartz?
While we definitely love our hand wound and automatic movements, there is something about the ease and efficiency of a good quartz watch. You set it, forget it, and it's good to go. 
-10/+20 secs variation a Month
Whereas some autos -10/+20 secs in variation a Day
Straps

 All straps are 20 mm wide

To keep the price affordable given the materials and level of craftsmanship we are using, we have a minimum number of watches that we need to order, and that's where you come in. By backing our project, you will help us pay for the first production run, and in exchange you will receive a beautiful watch with an impressive spec sheet at a highly discounted price!

 How we're able to offer such affordable prices. 

Cutting out the middlemen to save you money! Heard that before? We're sure you have, but hey, that's the idea! We are trying to offer you the best price without overly marking up a product more than it actually costs us to produce it. Honesty and transparency are very important to us as a company.

 

After over a year of designing, prototyping, revisions, and preparation for this campaign, we are finally at this stage. The plan from here on out will be as follows:   

With our suppliers ready to go, we need your help to place our first purchase order. Your support will go towards helping us bring our dream into reality. 
Thanks again, and please help share this campaign!





 Check out these links below to see more!


 

As noted at the beginning of the campaign, this will be where the changes for the production version will be shown.

Inverted Date Dial
1. The date dial on the all black model will be changed from white to the reverse (black with white numbering).

Lumed pips around reflector ring
2. The addition of lume pips around the hour indicators on the reflector ring, allowing for increased night/low light functionality (on all models).
 
Shipping
We will ship VARIANT watches worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen. 
Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable in your region.  
Free shipping in the US  
International shipping costs: $10  
Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 
Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.  
ESTIMATED DELIVERY  
We will start fulfilling orders mid January 2018. While we do not expect this deadline to change, it is possible the estimated shipment month may be updated. We will do everything in our power to get these timepieces on your wrists as soon as possible, but not at the expense of quality. If at any time you would like an update, please either check the "Updates" section of our  campaign, or feel free to email us at hello@variantwatches.co

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out about our campaign
Help us by using Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you all!Team Variant

story:
INTRODUCING AIR SLING: A COMPACT BAG FOR THE 21ST CENTURY.

Backpacks are a great way to carry your stuff. When you have lots of it. But when you only need your essentials, your 24L pack isn’t going to cut it. So instead of bringing the bulk or going without, what you really need is a compact bag designed for modern life: A small form factor that holds your core gear safely and securely. A bag that helps you plan ahead so your phone never runs out of battery. A case that doesn’t sweat it when bad weather hits. All of this, while keeping you looking smooth and suave.

TWO COLOURS

A BAG DESIGNED FOR EVERYDAY & TRAVEL 

Introducing the Air Sling. A light, sleek and durable sling bag handcrafted with the toughest materials and made for everyday use. The Air Sling is packed with functional features designed for any modern adventure. 

 

PREVIOUS PRESS COVERAGE

WHAT MAKES THE AIR SLING SO GREAT?

It's cut-proof, water-proof, light, tech-ready, has a removable strap...the list goes on. In short, it adapts to your lifestyle without weighing you down.


Below you’ll see the abundance of features of this compact bag and how it supports your everyday life. You'll be surprised at what it can do.

 

Anti-Theft

Travelers can be easy targets for pickpockets. The Air Sling has integrated anti-theft features to make it theft proof.

  • Concealed zippers
  • Secure magnetic latch to prevent thieves from easily gaining internal access
  • Lockable 

 

Cut-Proof

The Air Sling's external fabric is made from an ultra-durable material that is almost impossible to slash, tear or slice. In fact, this fabric needs to be laser cut. It's that tough.

 

USB External Charging

 

Waterproof

 

Magnetic Locking System

As with all of our products, we choose to use premium materials and elements. That’s why the Air Sling comes with German Fidlocks to improve efficiency and give the bag that extra feeling of quality.

 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES

 

Reversible Shoulder Strap 

It can be worn over the left or right shoulder.

Commuter Friendly

 

Hidden Passport Pocket

 

Efficiency

Different carry styles

 

Expandable Volume

 

Quality Craftsmanship

Compatible with Quadlock  

 

WHAT EVERYDAY PEOPLE HAVE TO SAY ABOUT THE AIR SLING

 

DEEP DIVE INTO THE DETAILS

 

PERKS & PRICING

Our company exists because of you: our backers. We want to thank you by giving you access to our new products first, at a heavily discounted price. We are offering you the Air Sling at wholesale price, as we are producing these bags ourselves and selling exclusively online. This means there are no middlemen or retailers taking a profit from this sale. This way, the savings are directly transferred to you.

 

 

SHARE THE LOVE

Know someone who will love this project?

Let them know about it by clicking on the buttons below:

If you're interested in writing about this project, you can find everything you need in our Press Kit

 

WE ARE ALPAKA

We have a true passion for style, sustainability, and function. We believe combining all of these things can improve the way we live.

ALPAKA was born in 2016 after launching a successful Kickstarter campaign. We're crowdfunded and proud of it. Our foundation is bags. But we're not stopping there. Our goal is to create highly functional products that are durable and great looking.

It's been an incredible year for us, and with the support of hundreds of backers, we were able to successfully run two crowdfunding campaigns. This is our third campaign, and we chose a more compact solution after listening to our community of past backers and customers.

With your support, we'll be able to continue to bring you awesome gear to help with your everyday adventures.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

This is our third crowdfunding campaign, and we've learned quite a bit along the way. We feel confident we will be able to produce the bag and have it shipped to backers by May – 2018. We have the full support of the manufacturer and all parties involved are set and ready to go.

The funds raised are going directly into the production/manufacturing of the bag. Even though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production and fulfillment. If this were to occur, we will always be 100% transparent with you and communicate this to you right away. Our goal is to get you an awesome, high-quality bag you are excited about, and we will do everything we possibly can to make that happen

 

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Is there a power bank included in the sling?

No, the sling will be delivered without the power bank.

There is a simple connection inside the sling that makes sure that you can easily connect all power banks that are on the market (by USB plug).

This way the power bank will never be outdated and you can keep using new models to charge your devices. This bag is designed to last!

Is the lock included in the sling?

No, the lock can be added as an add-on. Hint: Scroll up for instructions on how to back the campaign.

What are the shipping costs?
Shipping varies from country to country. There is just a small surcharge applied at checkout. Simply click on the pledge and select your delivery country, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are for your selected country.

What is the content of the sling?

The Air Sling will hold up to 2.5L at full capacity.

What is the weight of the sling?

The weight of the sling empty (with the strap) is 500 grams.

Is the sling 100% waterproof?

The sling is water repellent, but not waterproof.

This means that in normal rain conditions, you should be safe and all your items will stay dry. However, the bag is not intended to protect your valuables when thrown in a pool, body of water or to be in a full rain pour for about an hour.

Is the sling washing machine proof?

The sling is not washing machine proof. However, since the whole bag is covered with water repellent material, the sling is already better protected against dirt and stains attaching to the fabric.


Furthermore, it is easily washable with a wet cloth or wipes.

What payment methods do you accept?

For this project, we can only accept payment by Credit Card, no other payments methods.
If there is a problem with the payment with your CC, please contact the customer support team of Indiegogo, as they are in charge of collecting the payments.

Can I pay extra to get an earlier delivery?

This is unfortunately not possible. It is not a matter of extra costs, but a matter of making sure that we ship out all the bags in the most efficient way as possible. However, there will be 200 sling bags (grey only) available for early delivery if you pledge for the Super Early Bird reward.

Unfortunately, we cannot make exceptions to this process as it will delay all the other shipments.

Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my order?

We will do all we possibly can to prevent this from happening, but any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer.

We have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged in your country. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your perk, please get in touch with your local post office.

There is also a handy tool online available to calculate these costs. Please note that this is an external online partner, so we cannot be held accountable for differences between the actual cost and what is mentioned on this website: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a....

The bags will be shipped from Hong Kong, this will help you to calculate the costs.

Can I get a refund if I change my mind?

For InDemand backers, Indiegogo has a 10 day period that allows backers to cancel their orders. After this period and for original campaign backers, please see our refund policies at https://www.alpakagear.com/warranty.

Where can I fill in my delivery address?

At the end of the project, we will send out a survey to all our backers. In this survey, we will collect all needed data such as your delivery address.
We will also send out an email to all backers right before we will send out all the packages to make sure this delivery address is still up to date.

Will we receive a tracking number for our shipment?

All backers will receive a personal tracking number with which they can trace their shipment.

Can I pick up my delivery?

This is unfortunately not possible. Our entire delivery process is automated to create as much efficiency as possible. This is in order to make sure that all backers will receive their package on time. A manual pick-up will disrupt this process and is therefore not possible.

story:
Elie and Natacha wanted to design a bag that combines fashion & nature,  ethics & aesthetics. From this bobobark was born.

bobobark is a handmade designer piece. A versatile backpack that carries the Parisian chic heritage all the while being comfortable and practical. Most importantly bobobark is completely sustainable!

 

 

 

bobobark fits any lifestyle, and any woman on any occasion. Designed with a womans silhouette in mind and to highlight any outfit. On the go or at the office, bobobark will be there to elevate your style.

 

 

 

A clean geometric shape that was designed to match the ergonomic shape of a womans body and to flatter the silhouette. 

 

 


 

Our bag is handmade from a premium cork skin which is collected and polished in Portugal, until the texture is as soft and supple as leather.

Cork is as resistant and durable as leather but 3 times lighter. It is completely organic & ethical. Collecting and harvesting the bark from the cork tree takes place every 7 to 9 year, and this way does not harm the trees. In fact, this method helps the trees grow and release more oxygen. 

Our craftsmen pay close attention to every little detail and every piece of the bag is attached individually to guarantee the highest quality. Our bags are made to last.
 

 

 


 

Organization is made simple & easy with bobobark.

A clamshell clasp opens 180 degrees for a wide and clear view into the bag. A large zippered pocket at the center acts as a divider of the main compartment.

 

 

We added a 13” laptop padded compartment which is accessible both from inside and outside of the bag. An easy access phone pocket for easy reach, and a port built into the pocket for a cable to keep you charged on the go. A few more well thought out zips and pockets allow you to organize your treasures the way you like.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

The Organic Cork material we use is 3 times lighter than leather which allows for added comfort. It is resistant and strong, and is completely waterproof. The more it ages the softer and smoother it becomes.

 

 

 

 

Laflore is a family story, between a father and his daughter. Elie (the father) is the, founder of one of the leading fashion houses in Paris. Elie has worked in fashion for over 30 years. Natacha (the daughter) is a young designer born and raised in a Paris surrounded by craft and the finest handbag workshops.

They share a passion for design and fashion, as well as a mutual concern for our environment’s future. Together they created the brand Laflore, which stands for luxury and sustainability, so women never again have to choose between style and ethics.

 

 

 

 

Return policy. Indiegogo is platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defected. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at support@bobobark.com

Global Shipping. We are happy to offer shipping worldwide. The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.

story:
COLOUR SELECTION
After the campaign completes, we will send you a survey where you'll be able to select the colour of the watch and the colour of the additional strap (if you've ordered a strap of course ;)

 

THE BEGINNING

The story of SVPER11 watch started in 2016, exactly on November 14th - which was the night of the largest Supermoon in 70 years.

Supermoon is an astronomical event, when the moon gets as close to Earth as possible whilst being in full moon phase.

This makes for quite an amazing sight, when the moon appears to be larger and much brighter on the night sky. It was so bright, it was actually quite hard to fall asleep.

 

THE INSPIRATION
 

I've spent this sleepless night thinking about how amazing the NASA Moon Landing mission was.

 

Supermoon sparked the idea of an object, that would celebrate one of the most amazing achievement of us as humanity - The NASA Apollo11 Moon Landing Mission.

We wanted to create something, that you could always have with you and  it would remind you that... OH MY GOD! We've actually went to the Moon! :)

 

THE DETAILS OF DESIGN
story_txt:
COLOUR SELECTIONAfter the campaign completes, we will send you a survey where you'll be able to select the colour of the watch and the colour of the additional strap (if you've ordered a strap of course ;)


 
THE BEGINNING
The story of SVPER11 watch started in 2016, exactly on November 14th - which was the night of the largest Supermoon in 70 years.

Supermoon is an astronomical event, when the moon gets as close to Earth as possible whilst being in full moon phase.
This makes for quite an amazing sight, when the moon appears to be larger and much brighter on the night sky. It was so bright, it was actually quite hard to fall asleep.
 
THE INSPIRATION 
I've spent this sleepless night thinking about how amazing the NASA Moon Landing mission was.
 

Supermoon sparked the idea of an object, that would celebrate one of the most amazing achievement of us as humanity - The NASA Apollo11 Moon Landing Mission.
We wanted to create something, that you could always have with you and  it would remind you that... OH MY GOD! We've actually went to the Moon! :)

 

THE DETAILS OF DESIGN

story:
Movitra combines the innovative patented locking system that protects the lenses from scratches with Beta Titanium for an extra thin and comfortable product, Italian Premium Acetate and High Quality Zeiss lenses to enhance your vision. 

Movitra team is back. Since the launch of TYTUS, successfully shipped to almost 900 happy backers, we’ve worked continuously in order to create a brand new product according to suggestions and feedback from our community. We've learnt a lot and we’re now determined to take them to the next level offering this new collection of crash-proof glasses. The Innovative and Unique Locking System, Top notch materials, Timeless Italian Design and Manufacturing: ALL-IN-ONE. 

According to the Vision Council research 4 billion people in the world wear glasses. This means that most of them have dealt with broken or scratched lenses at least once in their life! For this reason, we've created the crash-proof glasses with an innovative and unique locking system.

The revolutionary frame can rotate on itself, allowing the hinges to fully cover and protect the Carl Zeiss® Vision lenses, making them impossible to scratch. We’ve designed a Unique Patented® Locking System built to last, extending the lifecycle of your glasses from today to forever. 

Our Patented® Locking system requires zero maintenance and won’t loosen over time. The rotation mechanism is stress tested for over 500,000 rotations and it is Lifetime guaranteed. The gesture is very intuitive, you’ll get the hang of it in seconds! 

We’ve designed this collection with innovation, craftsmanship and style in mind adding more shapes to fit perfectly any face and more colors and materials choices to suit any style and any occasion. 

CHOOSE YOUR FRAME STYLE AND COLOR 

 • 2 frames made with Mazzucchelli Italian acetate and Beta Titanium 

• 4 colors available (Black, Crystal Grey, Havana, Ruby)

NOTE If you need prescription lenses, you can pre-order the frame only at a special price and customize them with your optician's help.

We chose Zeiss as our partner because is one of the most renowned manufacturer of optical systems in the world. And we want only the best for our products and for your eyes.

YOU CAN CHOOSE BETWEEN

• 7 tinted Zeiss Lenses 

• Anti Blue Light Lenses

• Reading lenses from +0.25 to +4

• 2 Polarized Lenses with an extra cost

 *** due to the Italians regulations we do not offer prescription lenses *** 

ZEISS DuraVision® Blue Protect is a coating specially developed for people who spend a lot of their time indoors and are exposed to blue-violet light from LEDs as well as TV, computer, tablet screens and smartphones.

ZEISS Reading Lenses help compensate for diminished vision related to presbyopia, the normal age-related loss of the ability to focus on up-close objects such as words in a book or a text message on a smartphone. They are developed for people without specific eye problems such as astigmatism or unequal prescription strength in each eye. Our premium reading lenses can be worn for extended periods and are available from +0.25 to +4.

Every TYTUS COMBO is carefully hand packed by our team and it will be equipped with a microfiber cleaning cloth for your precious lenses and our MOVITRA leaflet. Also, the Zeiss warranty is included.

TYTUS COMBO comes in two timeless styles in order to suit your stylish needs: the rounded PANTOS and the squared SQUARE available in 4 different color frames. Lightness and strength has given thanks the Beta Titanium used for the temples that act as physical barrier for the lenses.

TYTUS COMBO features 8 different tinted lenses, the reading lenses from +0,25 to +4 and the innovative Anti Blue Light lenses to improve your focus while using electronic devices — all supplied by the renowned company Carl ZEISS® 

BETA TITANIUM®

This material is commonly used in aerospace and biomedical applications. It's extremely light yet strong and it's much easier to shape and weld and even more flexible compared to Alpha Titanium®.

PREMIUM ACETATE MADE BY MAZZUCCHELLI COMPANY

When it comes to acetate, Mazzucchelli is the most relevant Italian company with over 170 years of experience in the field. The premium acetate used for the frames is a modified natural polymer derived from cotton. The company provides us a semi finished slab (size 7x17cm) that is perfectly carved using high precision CNC machines. 

SOFT RUBBER TEMPLE-ENDS AND NOSE-PADS 

The adjustable nose-pads and temple-ends are made with acetate and soft rubber inserts in order to fit comfortably when in contact with your skin. It also offers extra grip to fit perfectly on every face. 

 

The two sides of blue-violet light

• REGULATES CIRCADIAN RHYTHM

There is a body of evidence to suggest that blue light in the spectrum between 400 and 520 nm with a maximum of 460nm is important for the proper regulation of melatonin in the body, which influences circadian rhythms and general well-being

• INCREASES RISK OF MACULAR DEGENERATION

On the other hand, evidence suggests that long-term exposure to blue-violet light below 460nm, with a maximum of 440 nm, may contribute to photochemical damage of the retina, increasing the risk of macular degeneration over time (known as the "blue light hazard"). Filtering blue-violet light at 440 nm and below should have a minor impact on circadian rhythm while providing beneficial protection from potential phototoxicity. 

We care about the quality of our glasses. Basically it's our top priority. Everything from design to manufacturing (even logistics and shipments!) is made in Italy.

Every single pair of glasses are assembled and tested by expert hands and the strong connection between our designers and our suppliers is the secret for a refined yet innovative piece of art we’re proud to present to you.

MOVITRA is an Italian company founded by Giuseppe Pizzuto, Filippo Pagliacci and Diego Ponzetto in 2016 and takes its name from the Latin: “Movere” that means movement and “Vitra” that means lens. Movitra has the aim of revolutionizing the world of eyewear, combining their innovative idea of changing perspective with a contemporary vision of design, premium materials and traditional craftsmanship.

We can't say it enough… Without your support on our first campaign, nothing of this would have been possible. Thank you for believing in us once again. We can't wait to get these new amazing glasses in your hands!

story:
What are the benefits of the 3D hip seat? 

Ergonomic for baby: We specifically engineered a carrier with a built in ergonomic 3D hip seat so that no matter which position you carry your baby, whether it’s facing in, forward facing, hip carry or back carry, your baby’s hips are always in the correct M position, knees supported at hip level, legs open and not dangling. It’s literally impossible to wear your baby wrong in our carrier.  

Ergonomic for parent: The hip seat absorbs the weight of the baby so your baby will feel much lighter on your shoulders and you’ll feel less pressure on your back. Our waist belt is also the widest in the market, this provides great lumbar support and is also very flattering on the body (no more muffin tops!)

 

How is HIPSTER Smart different from our current model, HIPSTER Plus?

We have sold thousands of HIPSTER Plus around the world to happy parents and our 3D built in hip seat design has revolutionized how people carry their baby.  With HIPSTER Smart, we kept the smart built in hip seat design but added so many new features to help you stay organized when you are out with the baby.

NO OTHER CARRIER IN THE WORLD HAS ANY OF OUR NEW FEATURES.  With this carrier, we wanted to push the envelope a bit more.  We didn't just want to just make it easier for you to carry your baby, we wanted to help YOU navigate parenthood easier.  Raising a baby is overwhelming enough, let us help you stay organised so you can focus on the important things.

Don't take our word for it, here are what real parents are saying about their MiaMily baby carrier.

Our new Winter Cover is designed to be packable and light.  The outside is made with a quitted water resistant material while the inside is a soft velvet fabric that will keep your baby warm during cold winters.  The hood of the winter cover is removable.  There is also a pocket on the outside of the winter cover for your hands so you stay warm too.  There are adjustable snaps on the side of the cover so you can adjust the length of the cover as your baby grows. The hood can be tightened to fit your baby's head.

Our Rain Cover is made with water resistant material so you can keep your baby dry in during light showers. There are adjustable snaps on the side so you can adjust the length of the cover as your baby grows.  The hood can be tightened to fit your baby's head.

BINKSTER is a 4 in 1 pacifier clip.  It clips on to a pacifier and there is a built in cover to keep your pacifier clean when not in use.  The pacifier cover is also a sensory toy and the silicon bead strap is a teether for baby's sore gums.

story:
Craftsmanship X Technology

Being in touch with traditional shoe-making industry for a period of time, we strongly believe that there should be a LINK connecting Craftsmanship and Technology together.  And this breakthrough for high quality European handcrafted shoes have been achieved by Animas Code.

 

The State-of-the-Art User Interface

Get Inspired - Lookbook (Want to be a Designer? We will select some of your Masterpieces putting in here )

We do not post a lot of pictures because it would be easier for you to surf our Get Inspired - Lookbook (Click here to access), where you can complete an Inspirational Journey before you start moving on to the next step —— 3D - Configurator

3D - Configurator​ (Click here to access)

From here you can start personalizing the shoes of your own with a Mix and Match for particular outfit or specific theme.  For those who like playing LEGOs, there is a great FUN here!

 

Heritage Craftsmanship

Animas, from the Spanish, SOULS. Animas Code factory ancestors souls have remained with us, preserving the essence of traditional, artisan work and guiding us throughout the different production processes.

Code, technology code. The latest technology and innovation are applied to the production processes and are made available to our customers, which transforms the Animas Code Experience into more than just choosing a pair of shoes.

100% Handcrafted in Spain

Traditional Manufacturing Process

 

Comfort Guarantee

To set your mind at ease when buying shoes online, we offer this superb guarantee for customers. The reason why we can do it is because we are confident about the standard of our Craftsmanship. Customers just need to follow the diagram below to get the Length and Width of their feet, then they will have a perfect size fit. (In Hong Kong, we have run  over 5 months and this size-fitting system has been proven to be perfectly good for Asians as well)

* If accessories, like orthopedic insoles are being used, please contact us for an advice on the appropriate size.

How to measure your foot

Scientific Size Measurement (Length & Width)

For customers in Hong Kong, if they really find the fit not alright, they can just come to our Showroom in Downtown Causeway Bay and we will adjust it for them or get a new pair of suitable size (Provided a correct measurement are being input for Recommended Size). For customers overseas, please contact us individually so that we will coordinate to resolve it at their most convenience.

 

Size Range

EU 39 - EU 50

UK 5 - UK 16

US 6 - US 17

JP 23.5 - JP 34.5

 

Timeline

The lead time after closing should be 5 - 6  weeks and so the expected delivery time would be on or before end of JUL. Please kindly get back to us with your measurements once receiving our email so that we can deliver the shoes to you soonest.   

 

Delivery 

FREE Shipping for all shipments to Hong Kong and Macau.

Other Countries include: China, Indonesia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Taiwan, Vietnam, USA and Canada

However, if any exchange of size arises, overseas customers will need to bear the shipping cost to send back to our Asian logistics hub in Hong Kong.

* Duties and local taxes are charged by the appropriate authority at destination countries.

 

Social Media

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/animascodemto/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/animascodemto/

 

Showroom in Hong Kong

As a startup that embraces the Internet+ Concept, we don't have a spacious and elegant showroom in a Shopping Mall, but we are conveniently located next to Causeway Bay MTR Station (Exit B). For customers would like to pay a visit and have a physical touch of our Spanish handcrafted shoes, feel free to come!  To ensure we have someone ready to serve you, please contact us for appointment via m.me/animascodemto beforehand.

Address: 12/F, Solo Workshop Radio City, 505 Hennessy Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. [Above Bank of China (HK)]

 

Not just selling a nice pair of handcrafted shoes！

But making everyone can afford a nice pair of shoes

This campaign not only gives a chance for you to try out our quality handcrafted shoes at an affordable price, but also let us have a solid financial support to create a BuynShare platform which will make our future Crowd-Order process more efficient.  We are applying for a Hong Kong Gov't funding - Technology Voucher Programme to speed up the whole development and your support is also critical for us to bring this revolutionary New Retail concept to live in the near future!

CEO of Xiaomi Leijun has said: Great company makes good products with best value for money!  This critical statement is also our MOTTO to thrive and grow.  

雷軍：全球偉大企業的好產品都是越來越便宜​

 

The NEW RETAIL and NEW PRODUCTION concept brought up by Jack Ma of Alibaba last year.  He predicted that e-commerce (B2B2C) will gradually fade out and this new form of retail with ZERO Inventory and high degree of personalization will soon be the mainstream.

先知馬雲預測：電商將會消失，而且這「五個新」還會衝擊很多行業！

Source: buzzorange.com/techorange/2016/12/13/stockfeel-jack-ma/

 

How personalized can the shoes be?

Over billions of combinations for you to IMAGINE!

Hand Painted Patina - A piece of ART!

With initial on your Cuff, why not on your Heel? Make it PERSONAL!​

 

You can be a Great Designer!

Some of your Masterpieces will be selected to be new additions to our Get Inspired - Lookbook.  Let's define the Fashion Trend  by ourselves!  (Planning to introduce this feature by SEP 2017)

 

Not personalized enough?

How about engraving Red Cedar Shoe Trees?

Leave us the following details in our e-form provided via email and we will tailor-made a pair of signature Shoe Trees exclusively for YOU!

- Age group

- Profession

- Initial or names, title, meaningful date or company name to be shown 

Exclusively for my VIP customer, Alex Lee, Style Advisor

 

Achievement and Crossover Opportunity

Our C2B 2.0 Business Model has just obtained a GOLD award in the 2017 Young Genius (HK) Convention and Competition organized by HK Federation of Invention and Innovation & Chinese Association of Inventions, implemented by Hong Kong Productivity Council.

Indiegogo platform does offer us a valuable chance to get direct feedback from end users.  In addition, we are also interested in looking for B2B partners, like Hotels, Premium F&B Grou​ps and Banks that they are committed to a high level of elegance for their staff being bright from head to toe!  Feel free to drop our Founder an email - twmeric@gmail.com if you have any queries or crossover ideas!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't ask us if we are going to enter into the Ladies segment.  The answer is definitely YES!  We are planning to introduce the Ladies Full Range in the coming 6 months.  Just be patient a bit and do help us share this campaign out and you will be benefited later with our Crowd-Order model! 

  • Donate USD 5 to us so that you would be the 1st to be informed of any of our new launch and, for sure, a special treat will be offered, or/and 
  • Feel free to share this Indiegogo campaign to your social media.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are delivering those custom-made shoes to clients in Hong Kong every week and we don't see any problem in honoring the perks. There could be a possible delay of a week or so, in case any production issues arise.

 

Acknowledgements

Highly appreciate the help from my VVIP Dr. Nickel Leung (梁迦傑博士) in preparation of our campaign video. Being the founder of Charmant Consulting Ltd expert in Corporate Consulting, Body Language Communication & NLP and International Etiquette, Dr. L has always been interviewed by different well-known local and regional media, like Hong Kong Economic Times「經濟日報」、Macau Daily「澳門日報」、Guangzhou Daily「廣州日報」、Apple Daily「蘋果日報」、「AM730」、The Sun (Hong Kong) 「太陽報」、Economic Digest 「經濟一週」、East Week「東週刊」、晴報TVB， CNN, China Daily, Phoenix Chinese Channel「鳳凰衛視中文台[」、RTHK「香港電台」、Teledifusão de Macau「澳門電視台」等等.  Clients include HSBC、CLP、JP Morgan 、Exxon Mobil 、CSL、MTR、Fuji Xerox、Gammon and so on.

 

An important inspiration to us

The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do. - Steve Jobs

We all want to change the World, let's start from your Shoes!!!

雷軍：全球偉大企業的好產品都是越來越便宜​

 
The NEW RETAIL and NEW PRODUCTION concept brought up by Jack Ma of Alibaba last year.  He predicted that e-commerce (B2B2C) will gradually fade out and this new form of retail with ZERO Inventory and high degree of personalization will soon be the mainstream.
先知馬雲預測：電商將會消失，而且這「五個新」還會衝擊很多行業！

Source: buzzorange.com/techorange/2016/12/13/stockfeel-jack-ma/
 
How personalized can the shoes be?

Over billions of combinations for you to IMAGINE!

Hand Painted Patina - A piece of ART!

With initial on your Cuff, why not on your Heel? Make it PERSONAL!​
 
You can be a Great Designer!
Some of your Masterpieces will be selected to be new additions to our Get Inspired - Lookbook.  Let's define the Fashion Trend  by ourselves!  (Planning to introduce this feature by SEP 2017)

 
Not personalized enough?
How about engraving Red Cedar Shoe Trees?
Leave us the following details in our e-form provided via email and we will tailor-made a pair of signature Shoe Trees exclusively for YOU!
- Age group
- Profession
- Initial or names, title, meaningful date or company name to be shown 
Exclusively for my VIP customer, Alex Lee, Style Advisor

 
Achievement and Crossover Opportunity
Our C2B 2.0 Business Model has just obtained a GOLD award in the 2017 Young Genius (HK) Convention and Competition organized by HK Federation of Invention and Innovation & Chinese Association of Inventions, implemented by Hong Kong Productivity Council.
Indiegogo platform does offer us a valuable chance to get direct feedback from end users.  In addition, we are also interested in looking for B2B partners, like Hotels, Premium F&B Grou​ps and Banks that they are committed to a high level of elegance for their staff being bright from head to toe!  Feel free to drop our Founder an email - twmeric@gmail.com if you have any queries or crossover ideas!
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Don't ask us if we are going to enter into the Ladies segment.  The answer is definitely YES!  We are planning to introduce the Ladies Full Range in the coming 6 months.  Just be patient a bit and do help us share this campaign out and you will be benefited later with our Crowd-Order model! 

Donate USD 5 to us so that you would be the 1st to be informed of any of our new launch and, for sure, a special treat will be offered, or/and 
Feel free to share this Indiegogo campaign to your social media.

 

Risks & Challenges
We are delivering those custom-made shoes to clients in Hong Kong every week and we don't see any problem in honoring the perks. There could be a possible delay of a week or so, in case any production issues arise.
 
Acknowledgements

Highly appreciate the help from my VVIP Dr. Nickel Leung (梁迦傑博士) in preparation of our campaign video. Being the founder of Charmant Consulting Ltd expert in Corporate Consulting, Body Language Communication & NLP and International Etiquette, Dr. L has always been interviewed by different well-known local and regional media, like Hong Kong Economic Times「經濟日報」、Macau Daily「澳門日報」、Guangzhou Daily「廣州日報」、Apple Daily「蘋果日報」、「AM730」、The Sun (Hong Kong) 「太陽報」、Economic Digest 「經濟一週」、East Week「東週刊」、晴報TVB， CNN, China Daily, Phoenix Chinese Channel「鳳凰衛視中文台[」、RTHK「香港電台」、Teledifusão de Macau「澳門電視台」等等.  Clients include HSBC、CLP、JP Morgan 、Exxon Mobil 、CSL、MTR、Fuji Xerox、Gammon and so on.
 

An important inspiration to us
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do. - Steve Jobs
We all want to change the World, let's start from your Shoes!!!

story:
Thanks to all our #TAGSupporters, TAG was 111% funded by our campaign end date! Find out more about the small solution that was supported by over 100 backers:



TAG – THE SMALL SOLUTION TO YOUR BIG WORLD

TAG is a Global Real-Time Location Identification device – all that means is that it keeps an eye on what matters most to you. From your little ones after school, your elderly parents alone in retirement, to your suitcase whilst traveling. Look after them with TAG – from anywhere, at any time!



Watch how a busy working mom looks after her kids with TAG:


Or how a pet owner finds her lost dog:



YOU CARE DON’T YOU?

There are many things that matter to you – your family, your personal treasures, your business trip, your summer getaway… And let’s not forget - you.


In today’s big busy world, with so many things to care about, all you want more than ever is something that helps you – helps you care about everything that matters.

And here’s the answer – just TAG!






 



THE TAG SOLUTION




Ain’t No Distance Far Enough

TAG is fully-equipped with 3G HSPA Technology, Global GPS, and Overseas Roaming. That’s why, unlike traditional tracking devices and beacons that rely on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, TAG can be located with infinite range anywhere around the world.


When You're Down and Troubled

TAG’s advanced motion sensors immediately react to sudden movements. This means TAG quickly detects falls and is the first to notify you and any other user of what’s happened.


On Full Alert

The well-being of you and your loved ones is of the utmost importance. That’s why we’ve integrated a Panic Button into TAG. At a gentle push of the button, a notification or SMS will be sent to the app or to a pre-registered phone number.


On the Fence

Sometimes you just don’t have the time to keep checking your phone for updates. Did you know that TAG allows you to simply set Geo-Fences on the app? Geo-Fences are boundaries you can set so that when TAG enters or leaves those boundaries, you’ll be notified that very moment.


Designed for Function & Style

We know both functionality and design matter to you. So unlike other traditional GPS trackers, TAG has unique designs with a range of color options. Our chief designer also came up with stylish accessories that are not only functional, but also lets you to add a personal touch.


Share the Care

TAG not only shares its information just to you but also to anyone else you authorize through the TAG app. 

   


Lighten Up

TAG’s functional design extends subtly to a battery-indicating LED at the tip of the device. At a change in color you’ll know straight away when TAG requires charging.


Always in the Know

TAG syncs seamlessly with our free iOS and Android app. With it, you can locate the TAG device at your convenience. You could also set yourself reminders and receive notifications through the app for when a Geo-Fence or the Panic Button is triggered. Of course, this is only the beginning and there will be more app features coming to you soon!


Hassle-Free

Each TAG comes with a SIM card and one year’s subscription fee inclusive of global roaming. This means you don’t need to worry about buying a SIM card separately or paying troublesome monthly fees - it’s on us!


Accessories In Planning

We have just started to work on our accessories roadmap and have a couple in mind. Throughout our campaign we would love to get your feedback on the the ones you see here as well as ideas for some that you would like to see us develop! Just leave your thoughts in our comments section!



WHAT’S IN THE BOX?

Each box comes with a TAG device, a basic accessory, and a built-in SIM card. The SIM card includes a 1-year data plan with global roaming service. We are also throwing in a detachable accessory for another way for you to carry along your TAG.



TECH SPECS


  • 600mAH rechargeable lithium battery

  • A-GPS (Assisted GPS) - enhances accuracy and faster time to first fix when in poor satellite conditions

  • GPS and GLONASS support - offers coverage from a larger number of satellites

  • Low noise amplifier integration - provides equivalent performance to an active antenna

  • 3G HSPA cellular module - 5.76 Mbps uplink, 7.2 Mbps downlink



#TAGCARE REFERRAL PROGRAM



WHERE WE’RE AT



Our first TAG prototype has been developed and our engineers have used this phase to connect external peripheral devices to complete the testing, debugging, and power consumption measurements. We have also finished developing the module firmware.


SCHEDULE


HOW WE’LL USE THE MONEY RAISED


OUR VISION

We envision a future where TAG helps your everyday life, not only helping ease your mind when it comes to your family, but also protecting a variety of other valuables. With your help, we aspire to get TAG into the hands of everyone who cares.



OUR TEAM



OUR STORY

A working mother, a frequent traveler, an outdoor adventurer and an elderly caretaker – that’s the TAG Team at our office in the bustling city of Hong Kong. In today’s big and busy world, we are constantly being reminded that it doesn’t get any easier to keep an eye on the people and things that matter to each of us. The list of to-do’s seems endless, time seems short, yet what we care for and about more often than not keeps adding up. How can we take care of everything and everyone, and do it with style (because style matters)? Our solution became TAG. And why stop with us? We all share this problem and TAG can be our common solution. As a TAG owner, you become one of us – a person who cares!

 


OUR PARTNERS

         


MEDIA COVERAGE

                 



WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!

For any questions, comments or suggestions, feel free to contact us! We will get back to you in no time.

Questions and comments: hello@tag.care

Distribution, retail and partnership enquiries: partners@tag.care

Press enquiries: press@tag.care

And stay connected!

     


FAQ

How does TAG work worldwide?

Each TAG device is shipped with a pre-installed cellular SIM card. TAG signed an agreement with its communication provider to service TAG in most of the major cities around the world.


Can I set the app to locate the device at set locations and times?

Yes, TAG has options for on-demand location updates and scheduled locating frequencies (e.g. every 10 minutes, 20 minutes etc.). Note that depending on the set update frequency, battery consumption will also be affected.


How long will the battery last for?

The battery will last for 7-10 days depending on usage.


Is there any additional subscription or fee required to use the tracking function?

No, all communication expenses are included in the one-time fee with the purchase of the TAG device for one-year. After this period, there will be a small monthly subscription fee.


What is the subscription fee for TAG after the first year?

After the first year, the subscription fee will be between $3 to $5 USD per month per device.


How much is the shipping cost?

We charge an $18 USD fee for International Shipping. We do not cover taxes that may be imposed on different countries.


What is the warranty for TAG?

We offer a 1 year warranty.


Is there a way to attach TAG to something or someone?

Yes, you can attach TAG to clothing or to your bags using our different accessories. We will have a clip accessory as well as one for you to wear over your neck. 


What colors does TAG come in?

For our initial units, you can order TAG in black, white or red.

For more information, please feel free to email us and we will get in touch!


Find This Campaign On

story:
Shooz are highly innovative patented footwear that are made for traveling and allow you to mix-and-match your favorite designs, customizing your shoes for any occasion.

Shooz are made of a "Skin" and a "Sole which are detachable and interchangeable and allow you to create a style that’s perfect for you and perfect for any occasion. Whether you’re traveling, biking, running, working or just going out for a night on the town, you can carry around your flat-packed skins and customize Shooz to fit any occasion. Just choose your styles of Skin and Sole, zip them together and get going!

Shooz are made up of two different, interchangeable parts: a Shooz Skin and a Shooz Sole. Connect the ends of the skin and the sole special waterproof zipper, just like you would with a jacket. Once the zippers are linked, close the snap fastener on the heel and your Shooz are ready to go! You can customize and get creative just by choosing from the variety of skins and soles, giving you tons of footwear options for any occasion. 


You can finally stop settling on which shoes to take on a trip when there’s no more room in your suitcase. Make more space for clothes and souvenirs and still have a variety of different footwear with Shooz! Just lay the Shooz Skins flat in your luggage or backpack - EACH PAIR WILL TAKE UP THE SPACE OF A T-SHIRT.

Just unzip the skin from the sole, throw it in the wash - you’ll get a deeper cleaning and faster drying than you ever would with a regular pair of shoes. Our leathers are processed with a special waxing treatment that allows for water resistance and washing.

A nice pair of running shoes can cost over $100 a pair, and don’t even get us started on dress shoes. Stop spending a fortune and start saving with Shooz. Once you get your first pair of soles, you can create new combinations by getting new Shooz Skins at $75 and, as you increase your collection, you decrease your cost per shoe!

Research shows that the manufacturing process used to make the sole of a normal shoe is what leaves the largest carbon footprint. Luckily, by sharing one sole with different skins Shooz provides a solution to drastically decrease the number of soles produced.

 Don't worry about guessing your shoe size, we’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to get your size right with our smart app ShoeSize.Me. Based on a shoe which you currently own and fits perfectly our app will find your ideal fit for Shooz. The results are created through a data-driven algorithm that is based on the previous experiences of other customers. Our size recommendation draws on a database of millions of data points and includes over 1,000 brands and 20,000 shoe models.

Edoardo | Founder of Shooz

Edoardo has worked as an industrial designer in studios between New York and Milan. He has successfully designed, launched and managed Veeshoo footwear brand (www.veeshoo.com), a patented flat-packable shoe that constitutes a first step to the conception of Shooz’s idea. From 2011 to 2015 he has developed his brand in the European and Asian markets and has since licensed it so he can dedicate all of his energies on Shooz. Has been assigned the Vogue Accessory Award, for innovation in footwear design in 2012.

Flavia | Designer

Flavia, launched her own label in 2012 after apprenticing with some of the biggest names in the fashion world, including Valentino, Prada, and Vivienne Westwood. Interchangeable – Customizable – Feminine - Sustainable - are the key words of her innovative designs that match perfectly with Shooz’s philosophy. So who would better than her to design two special edition skins for the Kickstarter collection?

Giorgio | Manager

Giorgio, finance professional at a global investment firm, is the manager mind behind the Shooz project. He takes care of finance, logistics and legal issues. Without him, we would probably be bankrupt!

Risks and challenges

Risks and Challenges are a part of every business, but we’ve done our best to keep them minimal when it comes to our product. Shooz are made from some of the highest quality materials which means that we’ve got to make sure our manufacturing is done right. There is always a risk of delays when it comes to manufacturing, but we’re committed to working with the best manufacturers and product designers to bring you the best quality products. We’re dedicated to getting Shooz created and into the hands (or should we say feet) of our backers in a timely manner, which is why we strategically set our shipping dates to be realistic in order to minimize any setbacks.


Explore Shooz lifestyle https://www.instagram.com/shoozmadeinitaly/

story:
ETA - 2824-2 Elabore / Top grade finish

 

Ascent Matte Black

 

Ascent Brushed Rose Gold​

 

Ascent Chrome

 

Ascent Brushed Gold

 

New Ascent Gunmetal

 

 

https://www.ablogtowatch.com/carpathia-watch-co-ascent-watch/

https://monochrome-watches.com/the-carpathia-ascent-now-launching-on-kickstarter/

https://www.fratellowatches.com/carpathia-chicago-watches-rooted-in-swiss-tradition-kickstarter-launch-on-february-15th/

https://zegarkiipasja.pl/artykul/16424-carpathia-watch-co

Radnom Rob - https://youtu.be/yylDJ05hAmc

 

At Carpathia Watch Company we relish the hands-on experience of creating something personal and designing a watch that outlives trends, one that can be handed down. We are an independent watch brand committed to the art of horology, hoping to bring our taste in timepieces to other passionate collectors.

With high quality materials, an authentic Swiss movement and hand assembly in Switzerland, you’ll be investing in a watch worth passing on. This is a Swiss made, automatic timepiece, influenced by our Polish-American heritage. 

 

 

 

 

At the onset of design, we knew we wanted our watch to feel traditional but to reflect modern trends. Having collected watches my whole life, I knew what I normally look for; an excellent movement, a distinguishing factor, an interesting backstory. I loved traveling to Poland with my family, and bringing a rare watch back to Chicago, knowing no one else would have one quite like it. I wanted to convey that sense of rarity through my own watches as well. 

I drew influences from those little known European watch brands I always collected, as well as high-end luxury watches. I worked together with my wife to pick finishes that reflected modern trends, and stood out. For our first model, we wanted to celebrate our hometown of Chicago, a diverse city that was built by immigrants, adorned with art deco details. 

 

 

The Ascent is Carpathia's flagship model. We wanted to celebrate both our European and American backgrounds. My wife and I are both Polish-American, and we grew up in Chicago which has had a vast immigrant population since the late 19th century. Every culture has left its mark on this city. Even the art deco style that Chicago is known for actually originates in Europe. So while our company name comes from the Carpathian Mountains that traverse our back yard in Poland, our first watch is dedicated to the city that raised us. 

For over a century, people have come to Chicago hoping to do better, to achieve more, and elevate their lives. In fact the premise behind art deco is power and progress; it is about making culture and high society accessible. To symbolize what we and other Chicagoans aspire to in life, we named our watch The Ascent.

 

Brushed gold Ascent on a suede oxblood strap

 

Ascent chrome and matte black on mesh bracelets

 

Ascent matte black on concrete suede strap

 

Changing tools, stork pins and Ascent rose gold on indigo suede strap

 

Ascent Brushed Gold on a racing green suede strap

 

 

ETA - 2824-2 Elabore / Top grade finish

 

The most important element to us is a high quality movement. We opted to use an ETA 2824-2 elabore with top grade finishes. Top grade finish means our movement is fully decorated with an engraved rotor, blued screws, and Geneva stripes. Our movement is beautifully displayed in an exhibition case back. The sapphire glass on both sides is anti-reflective coated. Cases are made of a 316L stainless steel plated in their respective finishes. The watch has a standard 5 atm water resistance. 

Meant to be a versatile dress watch, the case is 42mm in diameter. The art deco influence can be seen in the exaggerated, curved case lugs as well as the oversized onion crown. The oversized logo and styling of the numerals and markers are also reminiscent of the art deco era. Our name, logo, and the Chicago inscription can be found on the dial. The case back will be engraved with the production number; a feature limited to our Kickstarter backers. (Our production models will read Swiss Made on the dial as well as on the case back as opposed to Swiss mvmt) 

 

 

Unique curved art deco inspired lugs

 

Subtle sunburst pattern

 

Lume hands and second markers​

 

 

Ascent Rose Gold comes with a deep blue sunburst dial. The numerals and hour markers are matched to the case color while the second markers and hands are white lume. It is pictured here with a black genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign. 

 

 

Ascent Matte Black comes with an ivory sunburst dial. The numerals and hour markers are matched to the case color while the second markers and hands are white lume. It is pictured here with a black genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign. 

 

 

Ascent Chrome comes with a rose gold sunburst dial. The numerals and hour markers are matched to the case color while the second markers and hands are white lume. It is pictured here with a navy genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign. 

 

 

Ascent Brushed Gold comes with a black sunburst dial. The numerals and hour markers are matched to the case color while the second markers and hands are white lume. It is pictured here with a whiskey genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign. 

 

 

 

We began with just an idea and a few sketches. I had a lifelong passion for horology and a talent in design but no idea where to begin in building Carpathia. 

Sourcing manufacturers and obtaining prototypes was a long process. To ensure the highest quality materials were being used, we traveled to Switzerland to meet our manufacturers and movement suppliers. Countless samples of cases, dials and hands were produced until the exact vision and quality were achieved. 

While prototypes were hand assembled by me in Chicago, final production will be assembled by a highly qualified team in Switzerland. The watches will then be personally inspected in Chicago before being sent to you. 

 

 

 

Dial and hand quality control check​

 

ETA - 2824-2 Elabore fitting​

 

Mark Para, Carpathia Founder

 

 

In order to make time for production and quality control, we estimate The Ascent to be ready by November 2019. We want to make sure you are getting the best possible watch. Should production move quicker or hit a roadblock, you will always be informed!

Carpathia watches offer a two year limited warranty which covers faulty workmanship under normal use of the product. In case of defects covered by the warranty, all components will be repaired or the watch will be replaced. Warranty pertains to watch function and components and does not extend to strap or buckle. 

 

 

 

Carpathia watches can be shipped to all participating countries outlined in the selection options through kickstarter. 

Please note that you are responsible for potential customs duties or other applicable taxes for your region, we will include an invoice with your item.

We hope to deliver all watches by November 2019. Be aware that this is an estimated delivery period which will depend on speed of manufacturing and potential setbacks. Actual delivery may be expedited or delayed, we will always be in touch regarding the process. 

 

Burl wood case

 

Blue suede lined

 

 

Risks and challenges

Sourcing elements from many manufacturers from abroad is alway a challenge, as is meeting minimum order requirements. Since this is a high quality watch with a reputable movement, it is quite expensive to produce. Being a regular working class couple, we do not have the funds necessary to purchase a large quantity of materials in order to launch our brand. Funding through a campaign such as Indiegogo allows us to share our journey, involve you in the process of building Carpathia and to to provide funds that will allow us to make it all happen.

Finally, we are not immune to production setbacks and can not promise our manufacturers will adhere to our timeline. We can, however, assure you that we will be open and communicative about the development process so that you know where in production your watch is. Please always feel free to contact us directly. We deeply value your support!
story_txt:
ETA - 2824-2 Elabore / Top grade finish
 

Ascent Matte Black
 

Ascent Brushed Rose Gold​
 

Ascent Chrome
 

Ascent Brushed Gold
 

New Ascent Gunmetal
 

 

https://www.ablogtowatch.com/carpathia-watch-co-ascent-watch/
https://monochrome-watches.com/the-carpathia-ascent-now-launching-on-kickstarter/
https://www.fratellowatches.com/carpathia-chicago-watches-rooted-in-swiss-tradition-kickstarter-launch-on-february-15th/
https://zegarkiipasja.pl/artykul/16424-carpathia-watch-co
Radnom Rob - https://youtu.be/yylDJ05hAmc
 
At Carpathia Watch Company we relish the hands-on experience of creating something personal and designing a watch that outlives trends, one that can be handed down. We are an independent watch brand committed to the art of horology, hoping to bring our taste in timepieces to other passionate collectors.
With high quality materials, an authentic Swiss movement and hand assembly in Switzerland, you’ll be investing in a watch worth passing on. This is a Swiss made, automatic timepiece, influenced by our Polish-American heritage. 
 

 

 

 
At the onset of design, we knew we wanted our watch to feel traditional but to reflect modern trends. Having collected watches my whole life, I knew what I normally look for; an excellent movement, a distinguishing factor, an interesting backstory. I loved traveling to Poland with my family, and bringing a rare watch back to Chicago, knowing no one else would have one quite like it. I wanted to convey that sense of rarity through my own watches as well. 
I drew influences from those little known European watch brands I always collected, as well as high-end luxury watches. I worked together with my wife to pick finishes that reflected modern trends, and stood out. For our first model, we wanted to celebrate our hometown of Chicago, a diverse city that was built by immigrants, adorned with art deco details. 
 

 
The Ascent is Carpathia's flagship model. We wanted to celebrate both our European and American backgrounds. My wife and I are both Polish-American, and we grew up in Chicago which has had a vast immigrant population since the late 19th century. Every culture has left its mark on this city. Even the art deco style that Chicago is known for actually originates in Europe. So while our company name comes from the Carpathian Mountains that traverse our back yard in Poland, our first watch is dedicated to the city that raised us. 
For over a century, people have come to Chicago hoping to do better, to achieve more, and elevate their lives. In fact the premise behind art deco is power and progress; it is about making culture and high society accessible. To symbolize what we and other Chicagoans aspire to in life, we named our watch The Ascent.
 

Brushed gold Ascent on a suede oxblood strap
 

Ascent chrome and matte black on mesh bracelets
 

Ascent matte black on concrete suede strap
 

Changing tools, stork pins and Ascent rose gold on indigo suede strap
 

Ascent Brushed Gold on a racing green suede strap
 

 

ETA - 2824-2 Elabore / Top grade finish
 

The most important element to us is a high quality movement. We opted to use an ETA 2824-2 elabore with top grade finishes. Top grade finish means our movement is fully decorated with an engraved rotor, blued screws, and Geneva stripes. Our movement is beautifully displayed in an exhibition case back. The sapphire glass on both sides is anti-reflective coated. Cases are made of a 316L stainless steel plated in their respective finishes. The watch has a standard 5 atm water resistance. 
Meant to be a versatile dress watch, the case is 42mm in diameter. The art deco influence can be seen in the exaggerated, curved case lugs as well as the oversized onion crown. The oversized logo and styling of the numerals and markers are also reminiscent of the art deco era. Our name, logo, and the Chicago inscription can be found on the dial. The case back will be engraved with the production number; a feature limited to our Kickstarter backers. (Our production models will read Swiss Made on the dial as well as on the case back as opposed to Swiss mvmt) 
 

 

Unique curved art deco inspired lugs
 

Subtle sunburst pattern
 

Lume hands and second markers​

It is pictured here with a black genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign.

It is pictured here with a whiskey genuine leather strap; you will be able to select your preferred strap after the conclusion of the campaign.

In case of defects covered by the warranty, all components will be repaired or the watch will be replaced. Warranty pertains to watch function and components and does not extend to strap or buckle.

Please note that you are responsible for potential customs duties or other applicable taxes for your region, we will include an invoice with your item.

Blue suede lined

Since this is a high quality watch with a reputable movement, it is quite expensive to produce. Being a regular working class couple, we do not have the funds necessary to purchase a large quantity of materials in order to launch our brand. story:
LOOK WHO'S DOING HIS JOB!

The eye-rolling debacle playing out in Rowan County, KY, as its County Clerk has decided that Jesus elected her - and not taxpaying citizens - has put enormous stress on everyone .. but especially Brian Mason, her dedicated Deputy Clerk who wants to perform the duties of his job description and issue marriage licenses to ALL ELIGIBLE COUPLES.

He has vowed to continue to do so in spite of directives made by his Christofascist boss, who martyred herself by spending five long days behind bars, for her savior (but couldn't last a sixth). 

Let's show Clerk/Sister Wife Davis and her BFF Mike Huckabee (who doesn't understand how jail works) that people who serve the public equally are rewarded. Pitch in a bit and maybe he can take a fun vacation, or pay off some bills. The one thing he won't need to do is cough up lawyer fees. That's the upside of being on the right side of law.

story:
We nurture & cultivate innovative ideas through design & function. Not only do we thrive on solving daily problems with simple solutions, but we also aspire to provide life experiences with a sense of style and uniqueness.

Whether you are giving us a virtual fist bump, sharing our product through your social media or pledging, your support is critical to Dango Products' success. Thank you for joining us in our mission of bringing quality products to the market, fitting an active lifestyle with industrial design.

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the Dango P01 Pioneer Wallet, we saw an opportunity to design something that we would like to use everyday. We used top quality materials, cutting edge design, added functionality and blended materials to elevate the bifold wallet as you know it. Each wallet is made and assembled in the USA, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail. The fine, genuine Italian vegetable tanned leather leather is cut, then sewn together with only the finest materials possible. The wallet has RFID blocking material laminated to it to keep your information safe. The silicone band's durable and elastic properties give you flexibility on how you use your wallet (banding both pockets together, banding one side or band-less). By blending these high quality materials, Dango P01 Pioneer Wallets offer a balanced feeling of old school manufacturing methods with modern design and functionality.

Dango P01 Pioneer Wallet Features:

  • Handcrafted and assembled in the USA 
  • Vegetable tanned Italian leather 
  • Designed to hold up to 20 cards (business or credit cards) 
  • RFID blocking to keep your information safe and secure
  • Designed to work with our MT02 Multi-Tool (available separately).
  • 24 Page Dango Notebook (included with the Dango P01 Pioneer Wallet + Pen)

Not only did we want to bring you an awesome wallet, we designed a custom pen to go along with it.  We CNC each pen in the USA from 6061 aerospace grade aluminum and anodize each pen to provide a durable finish. For the ink, we use the highly regarded Schmidt 4889M pressurized ink refill allowing you to write in the most difficult situations, always giving you the ability to write your thoughts, ideas and expressions at a moment's notice.  We thought of everything and really did our best to bring you a pen that works with you, fitting your needs and lifestyle.

Dango Pen Features:

  • CNC'd 6061 aerospace grade aluminum 
  • Anodized finish for a long lasting, durable coating
  • Schmidt 4889M black ink refill (Made in Germany).  
    Compatible with Fisher space ink refills as well.  
  • Slotted end, allowing attach points for keyrings, lanyards, etc.  
  • Silicone o-rings for grip 

 

 

 

Standard ballpoint pens rely on gravity to dispense ink, which is why they can only write at specific angles. This may be fine for writing on horizontal surfaces, but not for writing upside down or on vertical surfaces. Space ink cartridges use compressed air to dispense ink, allowing users to write on surfaces at any angle.

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

We feature RFID protection in all of our wallets to help insulate our customers from "RFID skimming" - a type of electronic pickpocketing. Many credit cards, drivers' licenses, and passports now come with embedded radio frequency identification chips. When activated by an RFID reader, these chips transmit certain types of information wirelessly, so that you can verify your identity or even make a purchase without swiping your card. Our wallets are built to protect you from these hackers.

 

  

Included with all our P01 Wallet + Pen combos, is a compact notebook that fits neatly in the P01 wallet.

  • Hand stitched in the US
  • 24 page notebook

 

 

 

 

 

We chose to make the Dango P01 Pioneer Wallet in the US to keep American quality at the forefront, supporting our local communities, vendors and fellow business owners. 

 

 

 

 

Italian Vegetable Tanned Leather is highly regarded as top quality due to several reasons:

  • Craftsmanship: It's produced by hand by craftsmen with natural and plant-based extracts, not mass-produced in factories like other leathers.
  • Uniqueness: Vegetable-tanned leather is a unique process which produces a superior product. The end result is  a symbol of quality from the natural tanning process. Every wallet we produce has a unique look.
  • Durability: Only the best quality hides are used to ensure maximum durability and strength. In fact, most light scratches and nicks can be wiped away.  Only 10% of the world's leather is made with the vegetable tanning process.  
  • Beauty with Age: Wear and tear of Italian leather adds to its beauty and character. Unlike other leathers, it rarely needs to be cleaned. Wiping with a damp cloth every few weeks is the most that's ever expected.
  • Eco-friendly:  Rather than coloring leather with chromium sulfate and acids, vegetable tanned leather is tanned using tree bark.  

We use leather which is assembled and cut in San Francisco in a factory that is part of the SFMade Organization. SFMade’s mission is to support vibrant, domestic manufacturing for locally-made products, encouraging entrepreneurship and creating employment opportunities for a diverse local workforce.

 

Our pens are also made right here in the USA. We craft our pens from 6061 aerospace grade aluminum. CNC'd to perfection, we then anodize and finish our aluminum parts with local vendors who really care and take pride in good design.

 How does it work?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

       

 

 

       

 

    

 

     

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

    

  

 

 

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

Charlie has traveled extensively throughout the world for the past 5 years, learning about design, development and production. He has gained an understanding of what it takes to design, manufacture and ship good quality product, all while being on a tight schedule and meeting critical deadlines. He is passionate about product and functional design. He has always wanted to make "cool" products that people can relate to and see value in.

Thuan’s goal is to build and cultivate a progressive world where art and design matter in people's lives. Working for companies like Element Case, Focus Design and Speck Design, he has experience in both a hands on and advisory roles of design: everything from ideation and sketching through 3D CAD and product CMF (colors, materials and finishes). Over the years, Thuan has developed a keen eye for superior aesthetics and an in-depth understanding of how design can not only build a creative culture, but also inspire a creative lifestyle.
