story:
Independent of the crowdfunding results these watches will be manufactured!

 

 

The Ligure Watches story is all about friendship and the passion for watchmaking

 

 

It all started after we met again in the harbor of Portofino in Ligure this spring and decided to make our dream come true. We share a common passion for the sea, scuba diving, and la dolce vita. Together we opened the window of new opportunities and went on an exciting new path. An adventure of trust, reliability, joy, and the beauty of the deep sea. We stimulated each other to make our shared dream come true by creating our ultimate scuba dive watch.

Jannieke, Loek, Rob and Pieter

The watches are created out of passion for the Italian Ligure, Scuba Diving, a love for luxury watches, and our wish to develop high-quality watches with a Swiss movement for an outstanding price-value proposition. We are proud to present to you the first collection of Ligure Watches, the Tartaruga series.

 

 

Turtles are one of the most diverse animal species in the world. There are roughly 7 different types of turtles, two of them are aquatic water turtles. There are a lot of them in de Mediterranean Sea and on the coastline of the Italian Ligure. They inspired us during the process of designing the case for the first series of the Ligure watches. That is why we used the Italian name for turtle: The Tartaruga Series

The case is made of 316L stainless steel with a brushed effect on the top surfaces and a polished effect on the side and bottom surfaces. The case is a cushion style case which is the defining element of the retro theme and mimics the general shape of a tartaruga shell. Due to this shape and the crown placed on the 4, our watches have a very pleasant wearing comfort!

The case diameter measures a burly 43 mm and has a thickness of 1.1 cm.

We designed from an aesthetic point of view; the top edge of the case is extended over the 22 mm lugs. The strap is attached under this ‘roof’ so the space between strap and case is concealed and fits nicely.

 

 

The 316L stainless steel bezel is slightly descending and has an improved coin edge for an excellent grip. The insert is covered with Sapphire glass for a beautiful appearance, durability, and won't scratch!

Our watches meet the ISO 6425 criteria which are: a minimum depth-rating of 200 meters, a unidirectional bezel with markings at least every five minutes, a dial visible in total darkness, and an indication in the darkness that the watch is running. The watches are also anti-magnetic and shock-resistant, as well as resistant to corrosion in seawater. Our timepieces are rugged, reliable, and legible.

 

 

 

 

Top-rated dive watches offer functionality, style, and quality, a combination that you find particularly among the more luxurious brands. With the Ligure Tartaruga Series we offer a trilogy of timepieces of the highest quality possible, but yet affordable for all watch lovers and adventure seekers whether in the water, in the sky, or on land.

 

 

 
Our BLUE Automatic GMT has a Swiss Sellita SW330 movement. 
 
 
A Sellita SW330 movement is a clone of the ETA 2893-2. As Sellita matured over the years, it perfected production and both the quality and reliability of its movements are generally considered to be comparable to ETA.
 

Our Blue watch is equipped with a vulcanized blue/red rubber strap. It is waterproof and long-lasting and has excellent resistance to UV rays, excessive heat, and cold, stretching, tearing, dirt and dust, abrasion, chemicals, and staining. The rubber is incredibly soft but miraculously durable. Our rubber straps are designed to breathe! We created a profile on the inside of the strap to make it less sweaty during a hot summer day or less wet after a good dive!

€ 650 Super Early Bird (only 50 available)
€ 695 (€ 950 Retail price after the campaign)

 

 
 

 

Our WHITE Automatic GMT has a Swiss Sellita SW330 movement

The Sellita SW330-1 is an automatic watch movement with a second-time zone display via a centrally located GMT hand.

We dressed up our white watch with the well known Oyster bracelet. The Oyster bracelet is recognized by its flat three-piece link construction. Made out of 316L and with a screwed link, the Oyster bracelet is considered to be one of the most sportier steel bracelets and we thought very suitably for our 'desk diver'.

€ 695 Super Early Bird (only 50 available)
€ 750 (€ 995 Retail price after the campaign)

 

 

 

 

Our BLACK Automatic has a Swiss Sellita SW200 movement

 

A Sellita SW200 movement is a clone of the ETA 2824-2 – the main difference is that the Sellita caliber has an extra jewel (26 rubies vs. 25 for ETA). As Sellita matured over the years, it perfected production and both the quality and reliability of its movements are generally considered to be comparable to ETA.

As well as the Blue watch, the black watch is equipped with our signature vulcanized rubber two-colored Black/ Red strap. 

€ 495 Super Early Bird (only 50 available )
€ 550 (€ 795 Retail price after the campaign)

 

 

For the best visibility under every circumstance, we added the Super-LumiNova® Grade X1 to the indexes, hands, and bezel insert of all our models. The Swiss Super-LumiNova® Grade X1 shows a performance increase of up to 60% after two hours compared to the standard LumiNova® grade(s). 

Swiss Super-LumiNova® is non-radioactive, REACH compatible, high temperature resistant, and resistant to environmental influences. It works like a light storage battery, where light charges the battery, and afterward, the light is continuously emitted. This activation and subsequent light emission process can be repeated again and again, and the material does not suffer any aging. It is chargeable with sunlight or artificial light. 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
The screw-down case-back is made of solid stainless steel to aid the water-resistance performance and displays the shape of Italy, with embossed the region of Ligure. The coordinates of the Ligurian sea are engraved. 
 

 

 

The rubber strap and the Oyster bracelet are accompanied by a Ratchet Buckle Clasp which is an ideal wetsuit watch band buckle. The ratchet theory extension mechanism is of great importance for both convenience and safety

 

 

Also, our Oyster bracelet and the rubber straps have built-in quick release pins for a speedy attachment to your watch. These tiny steel bars have knobs offering more control, allowing you the ease of pulling back on a steel knob, which in turn pulls the spring pin ends out of the watch face. This is a far easier process for changing watch bands. A process that only has to take a few short seconds.

 

To celebrate the launch of this first Ligure Collection, we decided to make the first 100 sold watches a founders edition. This means the case back will be engraved with: 'FOUNDERS EDITION'. You will also receive a certificate signed by the four friends, the founders of Ligure Watches! 

 

 

A good case, roll, or pouch should keep your watch safe and organized and be compact enough to match the rest of your on-the-go gear.

With these thoughts we have designed a Ligure travel case, especially for our Scuba Divers, ready for your next adventure. The hardshell case features 1680 Denier Ballistic Nylon and has a foam inlay for the perfect protection of your watch. You will receive this travel case for free with your watch. This robust Ligure Travel Case is the perfect home for your Diver!  

 

 

The watches are made with components of the highest quality possible, for that we offer
3-years worldwide warranty!

 

 

For those who can't choose (we can totally understand that!), we made a special reward tier with the whole collection of all three watches. 

Not only do you get a discount on all three watches, but you also get this beautiful watch roll from WOLF 1834 with a retail price of € 200 for free! LIMITED TO ONLY 5 PIECES!

 

 

 

The Ligure watches will be made out of the highest quality components, therefore it will take up to 4 months (after ending the Indiegogo campaign) to produces the parts and assemble your Ligure timepiece. We aim to send out the first orders in April 2021.

 

 

Your watch will be shipped from the Netherlands with tracking and insurance. Backers from out of the European Union may face extra custom processing and taxes due to the regulations of your country. 

 

 

An Entrepreneur with Sales, Marketing, and Management positions in the luxury watch industry for over 25 years, an international designer and a marketing expert with entrepreneurial minds living in Italy, and a Dutch watch specialist and technician who has designed and build thousands of watches over the past two decades make this fantastic team. The friendship and collaboration between us date back over 30 years and we each walked down different paths, only to be reunited by our watch passion. 

 

Pieter, Jannieke and Loek (Rob took the picture) Ligure, spring 2020

 

Here you find an interview with Loek Oprinsen about his role and the other 3 members of the team in this project.

 

Jannieke van Geet de Jong - International Designer, Entrepreneur and founder of The Dutch Card House Company

 

Loek Oprinsen - Entrepreneur, Sales, Marketing, and Management positions in the luxury watch industry for over 25 years

 

Rob van Herpt - Watch technician and Seiko Mod, owner of Monsterwatches

 

Pieter van Geet - Entrepreneur and Marketing expert

story:
NEW TODAY NOW AVAILABLE IN SWEATSHIRTS AND HOODIES. ALL SIZES AND COLOURS AVAILABLE.


The nature of British politics is changing. These shirts are designed to spark debate, enable people to show where they stand, and to inspire others who may be reluctant to do the same. 


I've had more positive political conversations over the last two weeks of wearing this t-shirt than any other period of my life. I hope 1000 other people will be having those same conversations in January. Every time I go into a pub I end up chatting to a random stranger about Corbyn and left wing politics.

Above photo is COPYRIGHT Olivia Farnesy. Please ask for permission to reproduce.

ABOVE IS A VINYL TRANSFER PROTOTYPE. THE FINISHED ARTICLES WILL BE A HIGH QUALITY 4 LAYER SCREEN PRINT ON GILDAN HEAVY GARMENTS.


For anyone who has questions about the colour of the garment I say this: 


"The sky is blue and I don't think about David Cameron every time I look at the sky. If I did then I'd never leave the house."


For anyone who's still not happy, please see the ALTERNATIVE RED DESIGN below.

Multiple Orders:

If you want multiple shirts of the same style and colour then please select the shirt you want and pledge the extra money needed. If you want different sizes and colours then select one, pledge the required additional amount and then please email danieljohnryder@gmail.com with your size and colour requirements. Or you can just go through the payment process multiple times if you have the patience :)


THIS IS NOT FOR PROFIT.

ANY EXTRA MONEY WILL GO TO CHARITY.
There's a pitch video with much more information here: https://youtu.be/u6f3HgKiIZU 
Forever yours,
Angry Dan
www.angrydan.com 
P.S. It's really easy to share. All you have to do is use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Get it at www.dwiss.com

DWISS M2 was funded with more than 410,000 USD on 12th August on Kickstarter. And voted by Bezelous awards as the best kickstarter watch project. 

For the ones who understand and appreciate the art of watchmaking and design and seek an exclusive and innovative Swiss Automatic Watch with the highest degree of craftsmanship. 

DWISS is an independent designer watch company that produces creative, unique, and affordable luxury timepieces since 2011 and unlike the mainstream brands with their extremely high margins, we have a mission to offer a state-of-the-art product for its valuable real price .

SWISS MADE automatic timepiece

ETA 2824-2 ELABORE - SWISS movement

Unique and innovative time reading

Limited edition of 199 per model

Customized rubber strap

Engraved butterfly deployant clasp

Sapphire Crystal with Double Anti Reflective Coating 

Water resistance 10 ATM (100m / 333 ft)

28.800 bph / 25 jewels / 42h power reserve

 

M2 is the third model of our collection, the most innovative watch we ever designed and only with your help we will be able to produce it. A bold and eccentric timepiece with beautiful brushed and polished finishing made in 316L stainless steel. Measuring 43mm diameter, it’s composed of 9 parts fixed trough 23 screws with an exclusive and protected design. It uses a mechanical automatic ETA 2824-2 Swiss Made movement with 28,800 beats per hour, 25 jewels, power reserve approximately 42 hours and water resistance up to 10 ATM (100 meters).

The pioneering and innovative way of reading the time makes this watch a must-have for any serious watch collector, but also for everyone that is original and sophisticated, social active, looks for uniqueness and wants to stand out from the crowd.

 

ETA 2824-2 DWISS edition

DWISS M2-ABY Stainless Steel IP black coating with yellow accents. Yellow or black strap.

DWISS M2-ABO Stainless Steel IP black coating with orange accents. Orange or black strap.

DWISS M2-ABR - Stainless Steel IP black coating with red accents. Red or black strap

DWISS M2-TTR Stainless Steel with IP black coating topring with red accents. Red or black strap

DWISS M2-SSB Stainless Steel with blue accents.Blue or white strap.

DWISS M2-SSW Stainless Steel with black accents.Black or white strap.

Every model is limited edition to 199 pieces. They comes in two diferent straps. 

The dimensions of this incredible timepiece

Exploded view of watch complexity

The innovative time display system - represented in fast forward animation

 

All watches come in a luxury wooden black mat box, with DWISS logo printed in black glossy, protected by a cardboard box. Inside you find the warranty, manual and a travel bag. 

 

Combining Italian DESIGN + SWISS manufacture, DWISS was created in 2011 by Rafael Simoes Miranda, a Brazilian born naturalized Italian designer resident in Geneva. He has been designing watches for over a decade now, with a portfolio of more than 300 different watches designed for 15 different brands, and won important international design awards, like the Red Dot Design Award. DWISS (Design Watch Independent Switzerland) was established in 2011 offering premium watches with a world-class design at reasonable prices – combining Swiss watch engineering, precision and quality. DWISS has been in the market for almost 5 years and has presented in several of the most important watch fairs worldwide such as BaselWorld (2014 and 2015) and Hong Kong watch and clock fair (2014 and 2015), DWISS has won an IDA - International Design Award for producing the very first Niobium (Nb1Zr) watch in the world (a rare and strategic metal), exclusively for the Brazilian mining company CBMM. 

DWISS @ BaselWorld 2015 and Hong Kong watch fair 2015

We've had many customers along the way but most importantly, these people became our friends. Here are some of the wrist shots they've taken which are uploaded on our Instagram page. These photos mostly reflect the real look of the watch, posted as they came to us, also here we are real. We want you to become a part of the DWISS community. Order your DWISS watch now and share your experience with the M2 in the future! Here are some photos from our previous models.

Our friends on instagram

We have been working on this model for over one year. We have invested in the development phase from the first sketches to the final design, engineering the products, and developing the prototypes, the tooling and technical designs. Our models are already tested using the most accurate Swiss-standard quality control. We have also prepared our market and competitor analysis, gathered all other necessary information from the market and developed our go-to-market strategy on this basis and are now ready to go. We got funded on kickstarter and already started the production. We expect to ship the first watches to our backers in December 2016. Here are some pictures of the dials in production and the blank molds of the watch cases (in factory pictures).

 

THE REAL DEAL! 

CAN YOU HELP US? PLEASE SHARE :)

FOLLOW DWISS on: Instagram Facebook Twitter Pinterest

story:
I, Mindy Fradkin-Mousaa, (aka) Princess WOW! am a multi talented artist who makes hats, sings, (often with my husband, Roland Mousaa),enlightens and entertains  with my hats at an event I created years ago called a Hat Happening. I have sold through Hat Happenings and top stores like Henri Bendel's, Nordstroms, and also

through custom orders. I need to pay for a high end craft show in Westchester

in May, need to do a new spring line, and pay for craft shows in Martha's Vineyard this summer.

From an article called The Importance of Hats, about hats and my hats,

"Mindy's creations are magnificent, in terms of quality and chic, in a word...incomparible. Each one is tenderly made with devotion and care and she believes that donning this last piece of an outfit crowns the person with a true sense of charm, individuality, and refinement."

"With her indelible manner, she does a personalized showing for gatherings of people in which she entertains and delights customers with her unique brand of wit and charm and shows them the true significance of wearing hats again."

"Her hats aren't just pleasing fashions, but origination's of love, art, and inspiration, each one a spiritual gift from an artist that expresses infinity's creative possibilities and a diadem of glory for each wearer." Jan Kitchin

There is a very good write up about my work at www.ladyviolette.com as well.

What I need and what you get  

I need to purchase straw bodies, fabric, and need to have hats blocked at a factory in New York City. I live a little over an hour from there, and the transportation to get there and back is about $45 with subways and trains.

I need to do about 20 hats for the collection. Blocking costs $12 per hat for straws, but some hats cost more since they are sewn and can cost $35 and up with a different type of straw called Paglalina, starbright and more.

Panama straws cost $15-23 and up for an 8" large brim.

Parasisol straws are $18-27

Trims: Flowers, ribbons, veiling and vintage trim can be costly as well. They vary depending if they are vintage or new, and how much trim per hat.

Hat boxes, and tissue for wrapping. I need fabric paint since I do hand painting on hats and clothing.

The craft show that I committed to costs $755 for the booth fee, plus transportation to get there and back. It's about an hour away from myhouse.

I  need to get a refurbished smartphone so I can charge my orders, and only use it for my shows, paying for data with a prepaid service per month only.

I will  need lodging since it will be too far to drive an hour each way after working the show, and transportation/living costs to get to Martha's Vineyard.

You will get recognition that you helped me.

I can make you my famous cookies, jewelry for kids and adults, my hats for men/women, a Hat Happening!,  and my hand painting on your choice of garments!

If you can add shipping costs to your contribution, that would be wonderful since there are several fees associated with doing this campaign from paying for indiegogo, credit card, paypal, New York sales tax( if you live in New York State, I must pay sales tax) plus material and blocking costs in making items for you if that is your reward. Thanks for understanding.

The Impact

Hats are really coming back and you will be helping a lot of hat wearers happy!

From The Importance of Hats article" We love them again. Perhaps it was the enchanting display of distinctive hats worn by a spectacular princess in a fairy tale wedding in England that stirred our hearts and sould towards these representations of style. good taste. and artistry. Or maybe it was just the simple yearning of a tired turbulent world for more dignity and grace in our lives. But they have made a solid reappearance and have a deeper meaning than just a pretty ornament of fashion."

Other ways you can help

If you are not able to help financially, you can join my team and help promote and get the word out with your FB and Twitter friends, or word of mouth with your family/friends offline. Or if you have any other ideas how you can help me. I will do whatever I can to thank you for your generosity!

 You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

 

 

 

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.

story:
Thanks for checking out Camino Wear! As you've seen from our video, we're Evi and Heli and we're looking for YOUR help to launch our first line of Camino Wear; clothing and accessories that celebrate and are inspired by walking, travel and adventure!

Why Camino Wear:

We believe that walking, travel and adventure are some of the most important things in life.

Walking, because (in our humble opinion) slow travel is best. To be outdoors, to be active, to be in one's environment = a happier, healthier life full of beautiful, small moments.

Travel, because this world is incredible and so very diverse. Meeting new people and experiencing new things allows us to grow; both in our compassion for others and also for ourselves.

Adventure, because life is too short to become complacent.

Because purposeful wandering is the opposite of being lost.

Camino Wear is just one small way of celebrating these values, and our little part in furthering conversations about them!

Our first line:

Our first line is heavily inspired by, and focused on the Camino de Santiago (as you've seen in the video), but we believe that a number of the designs are universally appealing and hope that you do too!

The details:

For the initial line we are going with American Apparel products - great quality, and ethics that we can stand behind.

The designs will be printed using water-based ink which is not only better for the environment than plastisol but is also much softer to the touch and nicer to wear.

Why we need you:

Getting clothes printed is no cheap endeavour - especially picking textiles and ink that are of high quality, knowing that the people who are making them recieve a fair wage, and knowing that the environment is being taken into consideration.

We have everything lined up, we're just lacking the cash to get us there.

We really believe in our little line, and want to get it out in the world - we just need your help to get it there!

And although we put 2500 as our goal, we're hoping to raise even more! With more money we can order more pieces, set up our online shop and create even more designs!

By contribuing to our campaign you will:

  • Become part of the Camino Wear story - you will be a part of making this awesome clothing line come to life, and making a small dream come true (and what's better than that, right?!)
  • Recieve some AWESOME perks - things that you will treasure for years to come! (See further below)
  • Our eternal love and gratitude. For serious.

We have chosen the flexible funding model because (insert sad face) if we don't reach our goal, we would still like to use any money that we recieve and although we won't be able to produce as much as planned, we can still get Camino Wear out into the world (even if only into a few hands!)

What if I can't afford to contribute:

You can still get involved, and be of immense help!

  • Tell everyone you know, especially those who you think would really dig Camino Wear
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and post our link on facebook, on twitter...anywhere you can think of!

The perks! 

Each of our T shirts, for the first line will be printed on American Apparel Unisex Fine Jersey T's, with a choice of V-neck or Crew neck. They're super soft, super comfy and a superb fit for all shapes and sizes. However, ladies, you may want to order a size down from what you normally do, as AA unisex shirts are a little bigger than the average women's sizing.

The first two t shirt designs we are going to print are:

'Don't Stop Walking' - inspired by the numerous stop signs that have been 'enhanced' along the Camino. A constant reminder to never stop walking, wandering, or moving forward.

'Vino Camino' - celebrating the comradery and connections that develop while walking and traveling. Choice of side or centre placement.

We will also be printing our cheeky, charming and comfy, affectionatly dubbed 'Pilgrims Panties' that feature the quintesential arrow and shell from the Camino - and what better place to wear them than on your undergarments - we're particularily fond of these designs and hope you dig them too!

If we surpass our goal, we will also be printing our next two t shirt designs

'My Map' - What's better than a map of the Camino wrapped around your body? Not much, we say! A reminder of all the places you walked through, and a great conversation starter about long-distance walking. We're excited about printing other maps in the future to celebrate other long distance walks!

'Side Shell' - a quintesential Camino symbol, wrapped around you.

The Camino Goodie Bag:

This is just a mock-up, the actual pieces in reality will be WAY more AWESOME!

  • 1" buttons with the 'Don't Stop Walking' symbol on it!
  • Stickers that say 'wandering, not lost'!
  • 10% off certificate for your first purchase! 
  • A hand written THANK YOU from us!

 

 

THANK YOU:

Again, thank you, thank you, thank you! We are super stoked about Camino Wear and hope that you are too. Every little bit helps - if you can contribute funds, if you can contribute your time and energy spreading the word...we will be so very thankful!

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us - we look forward to hearing from you!

*** All images on here are mockups, and the final products may vary slightly in tone, positioning, etc.

 

FAQ's:

Where did the awesome music in the video come from?

Epifolium, aka Iisak Andreller. Check out www.epifolium.com for more amazing music! Extra special thanks to him for also taking our video and making the sound actually audible, and all his other input!

How do I pick the size/style and design I want for my perk?

Once you've contributed we will send you an email to get all your details and answer any additional questions you have.

Why are you shipping things from Austria? I thought you were in the UK?

Camino Wear is a UK based company, but our first line is being developed in Austria because that is where we are at the moment. That's why!

The perks only list the 'Don't Stop Walking' and the 'Vino Camino' t shirts as options. What's up with that?

Because we have chosen the 'flexible funding' model we want to make sure that we keep our committment to all our wonderful contributers. So, to start we will FOR SURE print those two t shirts and the undies. As more contirbutions are made, we will make more designs available.

Do I have to contribute the exact amount listed?

Nope! You can contribute even more! Excited about the 125 perk but want to contribute 250? No problem. That's why all our perk levels say "this amount or more"! 

Pounds? But I live in Canada/Australia/Spain/Somewhere else?

No problem. You will be charged the equivelant in your own currency. Nifty, huh?
For more answers about how contributing works, check here:

http://support.indiegogo.com/entries/20494567-How-to-Contribute-to-a-Campaign

Again, thank you, thank you, thank you! We are super stoked about Camino Wear and hope that you are too. Every little bit helps - if you can contribute funds, if you can contribute your time and energy spreading the word...we will be so very thankful!
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us - we look forward to hearing from you!
*** All images on here are mockups, and the final products may vary slightly in tone, positioning, etc.
 
FAQ's:
Where did the awesome music in the video come from?
Epifolium, aka Iisak Andreller. Check out www.epifolium.com for more amazing music! Extra special thanks to him for also taking our video and making the sound actually audible, and all his other input!
How do I pick the size/style and design I want for my perk?
Once you've contributed we will send you an email to get all your details and answer any additional questions you have.
Why are you shipping things from Austria? I thought you were in the UK?
Camino Wear is a UK based company, but our first line is being developed in Austria because that is where we are at the moment. That's why!
The perks only list the 'Don't Stop Walking' and the 'Vino Camino' t shirts as options. What's up with that?
Because we have chosen the 'flexible funding' model we want to make sure that we keep our committment to all our wonderful contributers. So, to start we will FOR SURE print those two t shirts and the undies. As more contirbutions are made, we will make more designs available.
Do I have to contribute the exact amount listed?
Nope! You can contribute even more! Excited about the 125 perk but want to contribute 250? No problem. That's why all our perk levels say "this amount or more"!  
Pounds? But I live in Canada/Australia/Spain/Somewhere else?
No problem. You will be charged the equivelant in your own currency. Nifty, huh? For more answers about how contributing works, check here:
http://support.indiegogo.com/entries/20494567-How-to-Contribute-to-a-Campaign

story:
We know the existence of GPS trackers, but we miss at least a modular, open hardware with an affordable design, which can be acquired by amateur developers, professional or non-technical people who need it. From this initial idea was born CUSTODIUM tracker, after a year of work, we can present the result.

CUSTODIUM tracker is the first miniature, open hardware, modular, gps tracker that provides all documentation, examples and support, the end user can thus adapt to their specific needs, making them communicate with other devices, placing sensors etc. Our idea is that the user must have total freedom to select the gprs data provider, web application, maps etc.  Feel free to create your firmware, web application or accessories.

Due to its modular design we are working on some modules:

  • USB host
  • Power from 7 ~ 14 VDC
  • Solar Panel
  • SD storage
  • Wireless (Wifi, bluetooth, xbee ...)
  • Expansion board with more I/O ports


The programmed version, with CUSTODIUM firmware, unlike other gps trackers does not use SMS technology, it sends the data to a server, with a web application like Google Maps™; with which the end user can see the position of several trackers, see routes that have been made and export data to other applications.

Webapp screenshot (click to enlarge).


If you are interested in a sim M2M, contact us, we can offer global roaming sim cards at very good prices.


Examples of use:

  • People:
    • Healthcare & disease: diabetes, hypertension, alzheimer,etc
    • Security: tracking people, mass control, emergency teams, etc
  • Animals & Pets:
    • Tracking Pets.
    • Wildlife surveillance.
    • Flock Control.
  • Technical:
    • Reference & measure.
    • Pollution maps.
  • Goods:
    • Real time tracking of shipments and receipts.
    • Distribution control.


Are you interested in one or more of this examples? Do you think on any other?
Let us know!

First prototype.


Technical data:

  • Atmel328P 16 mhz microcontroller (with Arduino IDE bootloader support)
  • SIM908 GPS / GPRS module
  • 850mAh Battery
  • RTC with battery backup and alarms
  • 4 I/O analog pins
  • Serial port
  • PCB dimmensions: 21.5mm x 54 mm


Just because you can not contribute financially, does not mean that you can not help! You can help spread the word to your friends as well as follow us on twitter and retweet our news.

story:
Hello Supporters,

Let me start by saying thank you for taking time to come and read this. An african designer is something that almost holds no bearing and taking a leap into this profession has not been easy. My main aim going into product design was to create innovation through craft and culture. Often i think to myself about morphing the Nigerian Aesthetic and all that comes to mind is the Practical Tribal Representations as opposed to the uncomfortable western ideals that have turned into cliches. Fusionkelvar has one primary goal in mind, and that is to unite Africans through creativity, craft and job creation. 

Sometime last year, My associates and I spoke about creating proper hand crafted goods with Engineered African Wax Prints that wouldn’t be a cliche piece of clothing. We settled on a five panel for the first product, as some know is tough to make, which is why it took nearly a year to realize.

After working closely with one very skilled Nigerian menswear tailor here in Lagos, it was realized gloriously in 2 weeks. We plan to keep pushing Quality Dry Goods that stem from Innovation, Function and Culture. This is the first set of prototypes, which clearly need more careful attention to detail provided there are better tools to work with and more hands on deck.

The name, Kalakuta, was chosen from the communal compound created by Fela Kuti which housed his family, band members and recording studio. It was destroyed at a point by the Nigeria Army because his music tried to bring common sense into west africa and the Nigerian Goverment would have none of that. He fought through a lot of hardships with only his music as a weapon and companion. Above all he gave many a reason to see hope. 

These hats dont only symbolize an art form but give power to many who see success and economical growth lost to a corrupt system. Nigeria has been listed as the worst place to be born in this generation, sadly there are happy people here who find joy in seeing other shine brightly in wax print garments. Buying a kalakuta hat wont only spread the love but lift the mental burden of perpetual hopelessness. 

Every kalakuta hat is not perfect but is differnt in its own way. All profits are used to buy better equipment, create a packing sytem, improve the state of our studio so we can keep supplying jobs and encourgaing globalization of the Made in Africa slogan. Note that all manufacturing is done primarly by hand and materials are sourced directly from Nigeria.

Each kalakuta hat costs 30 dollars to make but with shipping, supply of Electricity and man power the total price will be 50 dollars for the buyers. To get the online store and small scale factory running we will need 10, 000 dollars in total. 8, 000 dollars will be used for machinery and materials while 2, 000 will go to packaging and shipping logistics. The secondary incentive of this project is to provide the first ever 5 panel made in west africa completely by hand with materials picked in the country.

Every buyer will recieve a good of quality craft along with a piece of history from a continent and country that has been pushed into a negative light. The wearer will not only support job creation but talent exhibition. Thank you for reading. Please stay inspired and be blessed.

story:
ByThomas Collection no.5

The ByThomas fashion line, started in designer Natasha Thomas's living room, has quickly positioned itself as one of the most visible, up and coming fashion houses of the Montreal design scene. 

Constantly seeking new avenues to explore, By Thomas is collaborating this season with British Artist and Designer Jonathan Haydock in the development of Collection no.5. 

Collection no.5 is defined by pure aesthetic; impeccable cuts mixed with high quality materials and refined, sophisticated designs. ByThomas seeks to evolve the everyday look in stylish simplicity. This collection will be showcasing both women's apparel, and menswear by Jonathan Haydock. A contemporary look focusing on creating a unique wardrobe of nonchalant sophistication, these pieces will be complimented by a fun and bold reinterpretation of traditional leather handbags.

Where your Money Goes

To officially launch Collection no.5, we are asking for $5,000.

This money will allow us to bring by Thomas collection no.5 to the runway in time for Montreal Fashion Week, Sept.4-7th 2012, funding materials production and our fashion show venue. 

We encourage any and all donations, keeping in mind that little goes a long way, and that we can't make something from nothing! If you have any questions, feel free to email us at natasha@bythomas.ws. 

The Impact

This project is valuable to sustaining the Montreal fashion and garment industry.As a devoted Montreal brand, and in support of the Montreal fashion industry, all of our materials and production will be local. As a local inhouse brand, our suppliers, materials and production are local which helps to keep the garment and fabric suppliers in business.

As a participant in Montreal's Fashion Week, we are doing our part to promote Montreal's reputation as a the design hub of Canada.

story:
My Story

My name is Karina Copado ~ Designer of Couture Swim, 

Poolside Collection ~ For the Women that DON'T get wet...

I am a self taught INDEPENDANT designer with only 1 yr 1/2 in the industry,  I have  established a highly INNOVATIVE product in Hollywood fashion.

I create luxury, hand beaded, one of a kind swimwear.

In my short time of design I have created for some of the biggest names in Hollywood, including Jennifer Lopez.

I was recently nominated for Designer of the Year by Bizness Magazine. Have headlined L A Fashion Week. Been featured in numerous articles and editorial spreads inlcuding GQ South Africa, Umm Canadian Magazine, Regard Mag, Hollywood Weekly, Emerging Global Designers and even featured in  Fat Joe/ Chris Brown most recent video, just to name a few.

I have also contributed to raising funds for Benefit Shows, Latinos Con Corazon at Beverly Hilton, and Finding Freedom International.


I am a very DRIVEN person, I come from a small town named DEL RIO, Texas. 

I've had a big dream since I was 4.

I am NOW a mother of 4 children UNDER 4 years old FULFILLING my dream...


The Impact

At this point, I have brought Poolside Collection as far as I can on my own... I have created MAJOR buzz, built high DEMAND, but have not been able to fulfill supply.

I have sacrificed alot to bring my brand this far...

I am not opposed to investors, however I have not met the "right" ones.

Therefore I have created this FUNDRAISING campaign to help me take my brand to the next level.

Your contributions would help put my product into factory production.



What We Need & What You Get

In order to get my brand to the NEXT level I need SUPPLIES!!!

Fabric, THREAD, needles, beads, crystals.... PRODUCTION!! 

Production costs are not HIGH, but it does take alot to get it kick started.

I am currently caught in this stage.

Right now I make pieces per order and buy supplies to continue with every bit of profit!!

I need the extra funding to get the line Delivered to stores nationwide.

I have set up small perks I can send in exchange for your contribution, ex. autographed posters of Poolside Collection DOLLS, discounts on swim, name a suit after you or credits on my site!

I am also open to consider investment



Other Ways You Can Help

I need CAMPAIGNERS to help me reach my goal!!! If you can kindly share my link and for those who know me on a personal level, share "my story" It would GREATLY be appreciated!!!

Thank you for your time! Any amount is greatly appreciated!- Karina

story:
*This is a Pre-Order Project*

Who are we?

We are Redd Robot a company manufacturimg products using the Tosco character and Eeks a hot artist on the scene. As a company we want to employ as many robots as possible. It's a nice design and something you won't see other people wearing.

Mongo

Mongo is destined to be the best, heavy handedly fighting the forces of evil & mishap daily, you’ll never know that he saved your planet. Mongo is a bouncer of universal justice, a wrecking ball , smashing corruption & shady syndicates while you sleep. Your life will never be complete without the beastly bruiser, Mongo.
 
Mongo utlizes the Tosco platform.  The Tosco platform is a blank robot canvas.
 

The Impact

In addition to looking cool, by wearing this shirt you are letting people know not to mess with you, there's a beast inside.
 

What We Need and What You Get

Pre-Ordering allows us to know exactly how many t-shirts to make in each size. We will have a total of 120 Mongo t-shirts for sell. If one color sells better than another color then we will adjust the quantities for each color. Our money is not wasted by ordering the wrong color or sizes.
 
Professionally printed, by the best in the game. Softwear tees with water based inks for a super light feel & super comfy fit. (Print size and location may vary slightly from picture.)
 
We offer t-shirts in men's sizes M, L, XL, 2X and 3X.
 

Shipping

 
The t-shirts will be shipped out to customers 2 weeks after this project ends. Shipping is scheduled for October 23rd. In the US we offer free shipping. International orders should add in an additional $5.

story:
Hi everyone,

let us introduce ourselves. WTFJeans is a small business located in Serbia - Europe with a team of three - Pedja Puselja, Anamaria Ursa and Dejan Puselja. The WTFJeans story has started purely out of our personal needs. At first, we wanted to make some jeans with special pockets for our smartphones, and later also shirts. So we did! All of our friends (and our friends’ friends) loved the idea and wanted to wear our designs. At that point, our biggest adventure started.

We were not fashion designers, but only geeks wanting something cool and practical, so we found an awesome team of designers who helped us make our ideas come true. Now that we have already designed jeans it is time to make a cool shirt. The first prototype is ready, the only thing we need is your help to start this project.

WTFShirt will have two pockets in the front, specially designed for smartphones. They will be iPhone 5 compatible, but any smartphone up to 4.87" x 2.31" x 0.30" will fit perfectly. On the inside of the pockets there will be a little gap adjusted for a headphone cable and the holder inside the collar will serve to hold it.

The cool thing about this shirt lies in the bottom right corner of the shirt. It is a small cloth, hidden on the inner side, which is perfect for cleaning smartphone screens and glass.

WTFShirt is going to be made in Kragujevac, Serbia - Europe. For the production of it we have chosen the family manufactory named Breeches, since we have already worked with them and their designers have met all of our requirements. There is no doubt this product will be expertly manufactured.

There is always the question of "Why?" Why are we doing all this?. The answer couldn’t be simpler. All of us have smartphones these days and some of us are really attached to them. Girls got it easy, they all carry bags around with them. But us guys, we always struggle with our tech pets and we need a pocket to carry our phones without stressing about losing it or damaging it. And we like to look good, too.

Sizes

We worked really hard and we did our best to make your online shopping as easiest as possible, so we made a Size Guide with exact dimensions of every WTFShirt we made. If you still manage to order a wrong number, don't worry, the super WTFTeam is here to save the day and exchange your shirt for the right size :)

Update 02/25/2013

At the end of our campaign, before we ship your order, we are going to contact you to get your size. Until then, check our Size Guide to make sure you get the right size. :)

Size

M

L

XL

XXL
Neck (cm) 38 39 41 42
Chest (cm) 104 109 114 119
Waist (cm) 93 97 101 105
Hip (cm) 98 103 109 113
Back Length (cm) 75 76 77 78


we want to let you know that all the shirts that you have contributed to will be shipped without any extra charge, no matter where you are. That's right, we are providing worldwide free shipping. ;)

story:
Note:  For Updates and New Videos - Please scroll near the bottom of this page

Welcome to Our Crowdfunding Page!

What is so special about the RocketBuddha Tee Shirt?

Each image in this line of designs was started with graphite sketches in a journal  then advanced through multiple stages until camera ready for the printing process.  Truly becoming an old world craftsmen tradition this hands on approach gives a very distinctive result you will be proud to wear.  

Offering six designs printed on your choice of American Apparel shirt style, with ink/shirt color choices, we bring you over  5,000 choices!!  Companies outside this gift economy can not match what we are able to bring you with this Crowdfunding Campaign!

Our price is below competitive designs, and during this campaign, we are able to offer  no shipping charges or taxes added to your total at checkout  - promise!

We will use ALL your funds in local economies, printing, sourcing all materials, silk screening.  Most importantly our vendors offer healthcare and living wages to their employees.






Selecting Other Gifts






Where is your money going?

We’ve invested over $2,000 of our personal funds and untold hours up to this point for product development and printing three batches of shirts.  These shirts help us refine our drawings for the next printing and are used in market surveys.  Our next steps are to move to final art production, refining lines and contours to maximize the printing process, and purchase bulk quantity of shirts and a roll of thick, soft fine art paper then move to the manufacturing phase.

If we hit our fundraising goal we can smoothly get these Tee Shirts into production and into your hands, and continue to evolve this series of drawings for future designs as we officially launch RocketBuddha the company!  

Shipping/Delivery Schedule

We realize that December is a busy month and estimates are often optimistic yet our #1 goal is to ship all the tee shirts too you before Christmas!  

Risks and Challenges

The team has spent a lot of time building relationships with our vendors to ensure as few risks as possible. Even so, the unexpected can happen. We believe in transparency and clear communication, if anything changes you’ll be informed immediately.

Other Ways you can Help

So you love what we are doing, but aren't in a position to give monetarily - we get that. We're struggling substitute school teachers, after all.


 There are a few ways you can help:

 Share this campaign with your friends, family and co-workers to help get the word out using:

  *   The plethora of sharing tools here at Indiogogo to help spread the word about this campaign

*   The website RocketBuddha.com, head to that site and use the share tools and, if you haven't picked up a perk, you can fill in the form to get on our mailing list for campaign updates:

RocketBuddha Web Site

Facebook:
RocketBuddha Facebook Page

or Twitter

RocketBuddha Twitter Feed


FAQ


                                       How do I order my size?

We have found the sizing charts (found in the gallery) to be quite accurate except for the 3/4 sleeve Girly Raglan.  If you order to the sizing chart, and one size up for the 3/4 sleeve, your tee shirt should fit perfect. 

How much is shipping?

If in the US shipping is included. If outside of the US please add $30 to your order during the checkout process. This is a flat fee for international shipping.

Do you do international shipping?

Yes we ship internationally. Please add $30 to your order during the checkout process. This is a flat fee for international shipping.

If my size doesn’t fit can I get a refund or exchange?

Yes, of course. We are all about keeping our customer happy! If you follow the fit guide you really should not have a problem, but just in case, please let us know quickly so that we can make sure you are the next in line for the correct size or are given an immediate refund.

Can I contribute a larger amount?

Of course you can and we encourage you to do so. That is the beauty of Indiegogo. We may even throw in something special for you.

Where can we buy your product when the campaign ends?

When the campaign ends you can purchase our products on www.rocketbuddha.com. 

    Thank you for your help and  support 


Below is a Video that describes one Vipassana technique that can be used to complete the Theravada Buddhist Four Path Model

Vipassana Community Sites

Dharma Overground Website

http://www.dharmaoverground.org

Hamilton Project Website

http://thehamiltonproject.blogspot.com/

Kenneth Folk Dharma

http://kennethfolkdharma.com/forum/

A Link cautioning on some of the Risks with Vipassana Meditation

Dr. Willoughby Britton interviews Leigh Brasington

Researcher Willoughby Britton of the Cheetah House interviews concentration and Jhana teacher Leigh Brasington on the Dark Night and psychological difficulties that can arise during concentration practice. At a few points in here he gives some very sound practice advice.

http://vimeo.com/61893225
story_txt:
Note:  For Updates and New Videos - Please scroll near the bottom of this page
Welcome to Our Crowdfunding Page!What is so special about the RocketBuddha Tee Shirt?Each image in this line of designs was started with graphite sketches in a journal  then advanced through multiple stages until camera ready for the printing process.  Truly becoming an old world craftsmen tradition this hands on approach gives a very distinctive result you will be proud to wear.  Offering six designs printed on your choice of American Apparel shirt style, with ink/shirt color choices, we bring you over  5,000 choices!!  Companies outside this gift economy can not match what we are able to bring you with this Crowdfunding Campaign!Our price is below competitive designs, and during this campaign, we are able to offer  no shipping charges or taxes added to your total at checkout  - promise!We will use ALL your funds in local economies, printing, sourcing all materials, silk screening.  Most importantly our vendors offer healthcare and living wages to their employees.

Selecting Other GiftsWhere is your money going?
We’ve invested over $2,000 of our personal funds and untold hours up to this point for product development and printing three batches of shirts.  These shirts help us refine our drawings for the next printing and are used in market surveys.  Our next steps are to move to final art production, refining lines and contours to maximize the printing process, and purchase bulk quantity of shirts and a roll of thick, soft fine art paper then move to the manufacturing phase.
If we hit our fundraising goal we can smoothly get these Tee Shirts into production and into your hands, and continue to evolve this series of drawings for future designs as we officially launch RocketBuddha the company!  
Shipping/Delivery Schedule
We realize that December is a busy month and estimates are often optimistic yet our #1 goal is to ship all the tee shirts too you before Christmas!

story:
Accident Causing Damage - Video Link


Save the John Allen Special

A few years ago 5 car guys decided they wanted to go racing. In their garages the John Allen Special was conceived, purchased and built. None of us had racing experience. Some of us did have track experience. None of us knew how to run a race team:

  • We are the John Allen Special BMW E30 Race Team. 5 Car Guys running in the ChumpCar World Series.
  • We received body damage to our car outside of our control and need help fixing it and getting it back up and running.
  • This is our 'fun time' that we have as a team. It has brought friends closer together and it is something we want to continue.

We need funding for body shop work and parts

Details:

  • We need 1500 dollars to handle getting the body work pulled, fixed and put back together. This car is special to us and has a lot of our time(and blood) and we would like to continue to campaign this chassis.
  • Get your name on a racecar! Calendar featuring the John Allen Special in action! Poster prints! DRIVE the car in a race with the team! Lots of awesome rewards for helping us realize our goals!
  • If we do not meet and surpass we will still put the funds towards the repairs.

Be part of history with the John Allen Special

After our recent on-track transgressions, The John Allen Special is in a state of disrepair. While it is the intention of the USFail1 team to continue on with our current ChumpCar program, this is a major setback.

With your help USFail1 will be able to return the John Allen Special to the track in time for February's Road Atlanta event, but you'll also have the opportunity to support much needed repairs, upgrades, and a new 2014 livery update. Yes, it's time for a new look and we promise it'll be classy!

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps us reach our goal. We however know that not everyone can donate. You might wonder "The John Allen Special sure is an awesome car and those guys that run the team are some of the nicest and most helpful car guys I know. What can I do to help?":

  • Share this page and maybe your friends/family would like to donate.
  • Parts or time donations. We can always use extra hands on work days. We can always use shop time. Or maybe you are in the Atlanta area and own a body shop. Who knows. Drop us a line and let us know - johnallenspecial@gmail.com
  • And lastly share away. Indiegogo have easy to use share tools!

Bring on 2014! Thanks to everyone that has gotten us to this point and all those that will help us return!

story:
Lights – Camera – Action – I'MPOSSIBLE!

Announcement. Applause. And then pin drop silence.

I was going to be the next one on the romp right in front of those peering critical eyes and judgmental looks which were going to  shred me to pieces. I took a long breath to hold some air in my lungs which felt so punctured.

My heart was pounding in my chest. And I must be sweating.

I just have to stand tall and strut my stuff. Well, much taller from my 5’11 frame. In fact, it was not even physical but I had to break away from the fear sitting so deep inside my head.

’Josefine, you are not good enough. You can’t do it. You can’t do anything. You ain’t pretty. You would screw it up’. So many sounds howling in my head. So many different voices. And I had to shut them up all of them.

’The only thing I have to fear is fear itself’. I murmured to myself and the girl next to me lookes back at me. Perhaps she had overheard me.

1,2,3,....I took a deep breath and took my first step on the romp. Just like Neil Armstrong’s first step on the moon.  A small step but a giant leap. I looked poker faced, determined and was almost swimming in the air. Every step, I took, I was stepping onto all those rejections, fears, funny names and taunts and I felt growing taller with each stride. These were just the waves of huge applause which brought me back to reality.

I had done it. The 21 years old scared girl who was signed up by a friend for a competition called Top Model Worldwide, stood among the finalists out of 10,000 contestants. That day, I won two out of five awards- a 3rd place in Top Model Worldwide and the Winner of Skin Beauty Award! The little girl under the kitchen table cried out of joy deep down in my heart, I actually accomplished something breaking away from those chains which kept me tied up for the last so many years! I was ALIVE!

My name is Josefine. I am a dreamer, a believer and most of all- an achiever. 

During my childhood, every day when I came home from school, I used to sit under the kitchen table and look into the fashion magazines. I pushed my glasses up on my freckled nose and hugged the magazine, dreaming that one day I could be one of those pretty girls.    

The years went by and my dream never faded. The dream of succeeding and looking confident and and beautiful. The dream of being able to transform and rise above my fears. The dream of being a role model for other girls & boys in this world who have been told by others that they wern’t good enough and they might not amount to anything.

Yes, finally I did it. I was able to take the first step and then never looked back.

One thing led to the other, and today I stand in front of an even bigger challenge, which is representing Sweden in Miss Global 2014! Today I feel stronger than ever, and I really believe in myself! I am very nervous, off course. But I don't want to live my life being scared. This time, I have so many people believing in me, and I won't stop until I've realised my dreams. 

This is my story about how I went from being a dreamer, to a believer, to an achiever. To achieve my next goal, I need your support because when I win, you win as well. I am looking for those friends of mine who believe in my dreams and help me raise funds so I could contest in Ms Global 2014 to be held in December, 2014.

My victory in Ms Global 2014 will be the victory for all those girls and boys who were yelled at, laughed at and taunted at being not ’good enough’ but they went on to follow their dreams believing that IMPOSSIBLE could be turned into I'MPOSSIBLE.

In words of Shel Silverstein:

“Listen to the mustn'ts, child.

Listen to the don'ts.

Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts.

Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me..

Anything can happen, child. Anything can be.”

story:
Hello, I'm Karen Griffin, and I am a budding jewelry designer.

I say "budding" because, even though I have been making and selling jewelry for 10 or so years, I am only now beginning to get serious about turning it into a business.  Also - those pictures you see in the collage?  They are only the beginning of what I want to learn to do.  I want to be more professional, more prolific, and ultimately more of an artist, one who provides true things of beauty that ease a troubled world.

Beads and jewelry have been passions of mine ever since I was a very young child.  I knew when I was nine that I wanted to make and sell art of some sort for a living.  I'm on a fixed income now, and need to create a home-based job.  This is it.  This is what I've decided to become.

What this means to me - everything.  I am looking to launch an online business, and not only find joy in my work, but create joy for others.  Jewelry helps self-esteem.  It's a natural fact.  If you believe in the metaphysics of rocks and gems, it can even give you a spiritual edge.   I have seen the light in someone's eyes when I have created something for them that they love.  With this store, I will be fulfilling a long-held dream... one that many people seem to think is not possible.

I am out to prove them wrong, with your help.

In our economy and financial climate, the importance of handmade and of created jobs is growing.  You would be helping one person to be not only self-supporting, but self-fulfilled... and the joy of that has a ripple effect.  My joy and delight will bring joy and delight to others.  The smiles will be spread around, as will my story.  And it is my hope that this will empower other artists and craftspeople whose beautiful work is waiting to be born.

I am asking for $1959, enough to finance my work in a very humble way for one year.  Here is how it will be spent:

  • $1000 will be spent on supplies.  Sound like a lot?  It's not.  It would allow me to create and introduce one new piece a week for about 10 months.  Many of these would be auctioned off on Facebook, where there are many, many jewelry artists like myself, as well as other interested parties.   This would help me to make a name for myself. The remainder would go on my web site, once I get it up and running, and from there I will do business in the future.
  • $144.50 would be spent on a new Canon PowerShot SX130 camera.  The  importance of good photography when selling jewelry online cannot be underestimated.  I have researched cameras and have decided this is the one with the features I need to achieve the quality I want.
  • $143.13 will go for a printer, so that I can print mailing labels and receipts from home.
  • $86.91 will pay for a postal scale to help me calculate shipping costs.
  • $79.00 will buy a six-foot folding table, which I will need to take my jewelry to shows.  This is an important way of supplementing income for hand-created items.
  • $300 would be spent on a class or two to help me gain new skills.  The classes are fairly inexpensive, but the lists of supplies can be long and pricey.  I have rounded this number off as listing each item would make this document wearisome to read.
  • $200 will go for business cards and other office supplies.
So there you have it!  
My perks?  Here is where it gets exciting.  Everyone who contributes $25 or more gets 25% off my jewelry for a year.  Contribute $100 or more, and you will receive a custom piece designed to your specifications (within the limits of what I have to work with money-wise).  And I will be opening a savings account where I will save the payment from one piece of jewelry a month, and the resulting sum at the end of ten months will be given to charities.  So you will be indirectly contributing to those as well.
If I don't realize my whole campaign goal, the funds will be used to do what I can - say, purchase just a few things on my wish list - perhaps just the camera and the classes, or something else important to my goal.
But what if the business doesn't take off?  I will be a year smarter, and I will continue to make jewelry.  That won't change.  I will still be committed to bringing happiness to the world with my work.  Your support and what I have learned will be the education that I carry with me as I continue to find venues in which to succeed.
I am resilient.  Years of making something out of nothing have taught me that.  I deserve a chance to make a living at what truly fulfills me.  I am worth that.   You are, too!
Thank you so much for reading, and for your time.  Please, won't you join me in realizing this venture?

story:
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!

Welcome to the future of street wear fashion! Welcome to Freek Inc. You are about to witness a brand new clothing line both thrilling and dangerous to the eyes! Never before has such tremendous talent teamed up to leave you in awe. Exciting, terrifying, and fantastic art work all on display for your very eyes and at lost costs. Welcome to the Freek Show!

WHAT IS FREEK INC?

My friends, Freek Inc is about acceptance and everyone is welcome to this Freek Show. If you have tattoos, crazy hair styles, ripped up clothing, piercings, or other body modifications and you are looked down in society this company is for you. I am here to let you know it's okay to be yourself. Be free and forever a Freek!

WHY DOES FREEK INC NEED YOUR HELP

The attractions in the show will be apart of a limited edition runs before the big launch in 2015. This is your chance to get Freek Inc before anyone else. 
If you decide to pledge to this campaign you are GUARANTEED your perks! 

What are the Challenges?

Ha! We laugh in the face of challenges. The only really real obstacles here is if you're willing to take that extra step on becoming a true carny! If you choose not to contribute we might just have to throw you in the lion den...


Come one, Come all!

The show can not go on without your help. Share amongst your fellow carnies! We are on all main social media platforms such as;

  • Instagram - @freekincclothing
  • Facebook - www.facebook.com/atrociousworks
  • Twitter - @FreekInc
story_txt:
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN!
Welcome to the future of street wear fashion! Welcome to Freek Inc. You are about to witness a brand new clothing line both thrilling and dangerous to the eyes! Never before has such tremendous talent teamed up to leave you in awe. Exciting, terrifying, and fantastic art work all on display for your very eyes and at lost costs. Welcome to the Freek Show!

WHAT IS FREEK INC?
My friends, Freek Inc is about acceptance and everyone is welcome to this Freek Show. If you have tattoos, crazy hair styles, ripped up clothing, piercings, or other body modifications and you are looked down in society this company is for you. I am here to let you know it's okay to be yourself. Be free and forever a Freek!



WHY DOES FREEK INC NEED YOUR HELP
The attractions in the show will be apart of a limited edition runs before the big launch in 2015. This is your chance to get Freek Inc before anyone else. 
If you decide to pledge to this campaign you are GUARANTEED your perks! 





What are the Challenges?


Ha! We laugh in the face of challenges. The only really real obstacles here is if you're willing to take that extra step on becoming a true carny! If you choose not to contribute we might just have to throw you in the lion den...

story:
My Name is Kristin Costa. I'm a fashion, bridal and costume designer as well as a painter. I focus on making wearable art, and on creating garments that have powerful concepts as well as beauty and wearability. I am inspired by psychological themes as well as colors, shapes and textiles, and hence, my greatest enjoyment comes from creating fashion performances.

I have done many fashion shows over the years, at conventions, NYC nightlife events, Toronto Alternative Fashion week, and even an independently produced show during NY fashion week. However, most of those shows had audiences that were either small, unaware of my involvement, or devoid of fashion industry professionals. And the most important thing in art, fashion, and anything creative, is for the right people to see one's work.

I now have an opportunity to show to an audience of buyers, press, stylists, celebrities and others who are directly relevant to my artistic career goals. 

Couture Fashion Week.com states:

"Couture Fashion Week is one of many events that are held in New York City twice a year as part of New York Fashion Week. It is one of the most prestigious events, and the only major fashion week event that actively encourages fashion consumers to attend along with trade buyer and press. Most other events show ready-to-wear designs, CFW shows couture, luxury and high-end fashion."

 

What We Need & What You Get

The money being raised is to pay the cost of being on the runway of Couture Fashion Week, NY. I will be creating my new collection no matter what. However, 8,000 dollars would ensure that I can show to an audience of important people who have never seen my work before. And the reason it costs so much is because everything is included, and would cost a lot more if I had to hire everyone myself. Upon being accepted I was informed that:

"All shows include models, makeup, hair styling, dressers, backstage racks, hangers, steamers, press release distribution, audience, press, buyer invites, photography, photos post on CFW web site, a number of complementary seats for your VIP guests, red carpet photo op, interviews, show promotion, show production, professional light and sound, and raw non-edited video with at least 2 camera angles."

In order to help me reach this goal, I'm offering a lot of really great perks for the same or similar price points as I would sell my work in any other avenue. It makes this a perfect opportunity to obtain pieces of my work, and give them as holiday gifts.

Since many of the smaller items are things I either have made in excess, or can produce easily, I'm open to giving multiples for higher donation amounts. For instance, If you wanted to donate $100, but instead of a pair of wings, you wanted two bullet shell accessories to give as presents, just let me know! I'm also open to customization of perks, so if you have any questions or requests, please drop me a line!

Any amount that I raise will help. Since I am using Indiegogo's "flexible funding" option, I will be able to receive it, even if I don't reach my goal, and it will go straight to paying the fees for fashion week. I have set the amount for exactly enough to pay for the cheapest option in Couture Fashion Week NY, enabling me to have 15 models, and 15 outfits. 

If I make more than my goal, I will be putting it into an account to fund my fashion week endeavors for next season!

The Impact

I have always fantasized that my creative work will eventually financially support me. I feel that this opportunity will enable my work to be seen by people who have the power to make that dream a reality. Also just as important is the fact that if this fundraiser is successful, it means that everyone who donates will now own a piece of my work. And the more people who have my designs in their lives, the better!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute financially, there are still lots of ways you can help! The most important is to share this link. Share with friends, family, and anyone who seems particularly influential in art and fashion. Getting my work out there is just as important as being backed financially. 

Donations of things other than money would also be appreciated. Email me if you have any fabric or sewing supplies, or high heeled shoes (5 inches or higher) that you would like to get rid of, and see used in my collections.

I am extremely thankful to everyone who has been supportive of my work! I would not be where I am right now without you, and I thank you for helping me to further my art and my career!

kcosta13(at)gmail(dot)com

story:
Watch the video above and learn more about our Shop by Lifestyle concept!

Who we are

Cheap Tribus by Urban Tribus is a discount online retail brand that sells the best in brand name fashion and alternative apparel.

What sets us apart is Shop by Lifestyle, a new concept that will redefine how you buy clothes.

After you select your lifestyle on our website, you can choose from a carefully-curated selection of attire and accessories that suits you. Shop by Lifestyle enables you to quickly find what you are looking for and see other pieces that you want to wear.

Our Shop by Lifestyle concept is already up and running on www.cheaptribus.com, where we already have a selection of clothing and accessories for men and women.

We are bringing high-end fashions and the products of small designers to those who may not have access to them, such as individuals who lead busy lives and do not have the time to shop for them or people who live in small towns and rural areas.

This value is a core tenet of our brand and we are excited about the impact to communities outside of major metropolitan areas.

What we need

We know that Shop by Lifestyle is going to revolutionize the industry, and we want you on board. If you want a better store that works the way you need it to, support our vision.

The funding we are seeking here will be used to improve our catalog and offer a wider variety of products, including those of local designers and alternative brands. The more we raise, the more we can stock; and that means more designers and more choices for you.

Your support shows alternative brands that Cheap Tribus is the right place for them. Without that support it will take months or even years to add their fashions to the catalog.


What You Get

Every contribution you make returns to you with more value! We are offering gift cards and discounts on our already discounted prices! As soon as you receive them, you can use them to make purchases on our website.

You will receive these perks in time for the holidays, so you can pass along gift cards as presents or use them to buy stylish gifts for your loved ones.

We are adding inventory constantly, and we will update you on that progress. We expect to have a wider selection of brands within three months of this campaign's successful conclusion.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out! Share our campaign on your favorite social media platforms. The more we raise, the more we will have for you to choose from, so tell everybody you know. Also, you can sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive deals in your inbox.

FAQs

Why don't you need my address to fulfill the perks?

You will receive digital gift cards.

How can I contact you if I have any questions?

If you have any questions, suggestions or comments about our brand, website or crowdfunding campaign, please contact us through our Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or Pinterest accounts. We are glad to hear your input.

What is Shop By Lifestyle?
