story:
Wallets – we all have them – they are one of our most indispensable accessories.  Our credit cards, ID’s and other electronically accessible information – all tucked away in our wallets - travel with us wherever we go. Today’s cards make it super easy to pay for things – simply wave your card and voila- purchase completed. This convenience is great, but it puts us at risk of ID theft and fraud. This is a real danger - and a growing problem.


Introducing The Pagalli Project

Pagalli is one of the few brands in the world to use technology that completely eliminates current RFID/NFC threats. And, we do it in a stylish, hand crafted, environmentally friendly, built to last fashion. Pagalli wallets bring timeless design, innovation and quality – at a fair, honest price. There’s an old saying that “they don’t make things like they used to” – and we’re here to change that. We’re bringing traditional values and thoughtful, artisan craftsmanship to the modern world – and putting them within reach of anyone who appreciates the finer things in life.

We define quality as the combination of an artisanal touch together with just the right technology. Pagalli wallets are made from carefully selected, sustainable, consciously sourced materials – including our own vegetable-tanned leather developed with a local tannery and the finest Surin Thai silk – and include industry-leading data theft protection.  The 100 percent certified worldwide RFID / NFC theft protection for all cards and frequencies is built right into each Pagalli wallet’s beautiful silk lining – to keep your personal information safe from high tech thieves.

The Doers (from top): Tintin, Mauro, Pakorn, Jakkraphan,  Tha-Panan, Arthorn

“I love stories about people who aren’t afraid to take a chance and give of themselves. I share with you the story of Vincente Pagalli, the name behind our project whose skills and generosity of spirit inspires us to make beautiful quality leather products that you can use.
It’s your journey too, enjoy it!” - Mauro Beck

The inspiration behind the Pagalli Project- Vincente Pagalli – was an Italian leather craftsman who emigrated from Italy to South East Asia in order to find his calling. An adventurer and entrepreneur, Pagalli had a genuine passion to create high quality leather accessories that were beautiful, functional and made with consciously sourced materials. He possessed real skill and talent, along with the drive and courage to share these gifts and help others. His unwavering dedication to producing quality products empowered him to go from rags to riches – while positively impacting the lives of those he met along the way. Inspired by Pagalli, we too are driven by a love for the things we create – and the people they will touch.

Click the button below to learn more about the Journey of Vincente Pagalli.



Genuine craftsmanship is in ever increasing demand by consumers who are tired of sub-standard quality products. With that in mind, we are a group of motivated professionals that have taken upon us to create true value. With passion for quality, innovation and material selection, we want to offer customers honest products that hold what they promise, honoring the Vincente Pagalli legacy.

Great Price for Great Quality

We’re nostalgic for the times when it was possible to buy an exceptionally well made product at a fair price. To prove that timeless design, innovation and functionality doesn’t have to cost more, all of the materials we use are directly sourced and carefully planned to achieve the best cost efficiencies. We maintain a direct manufacturing environment and operate our own production lines. We work directly with our suppliers and partners, removing any unnecessary middle-men or distributors.

Because great value is about the entire purchasing experience and not just the product itself, we’re offering FREE SHIPPING on all purchases during our campaign.

Industry Leading Data Theft Protection

The easy pay ability we enjoy today is made possible by RF (radio-frequency) enabled chips, which contain encoded personal information, such as your name, address, Social Security number, phone number, bank account details and more.  If your wallet doesn’t contain RFID blocking, you are vulnerable to skimming – a form of electronic pick pocketing. RFID blocking technology is not a new concept, however – most of the RFID/NFC blocking material and products currently available are only able to reduce ‘data leakage’ – not completely block it.  

“An estimated 17,6 million Americans—about 7% of U.S. residents age 16 or older—were victims of identity theft in 2014. Most victims (86%) experienced the misuse of an existing credit card or bank account.”

Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, US Department of Justice (NCJ 248991, Sep 2015)


Victims of ID theft have been estimated to have risen from 3,6 - 17,6 million in the US alone. "Most identity theft victims did not know how the offender obtained their information, and almost all (9 in 10) did not know anything about the offender".

Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, US Department of Justice (NCJ 236245 Nov 2011, NCJ 243779 Dec 2013, NCJ 248991 Sep 2015).

That’s why Pagalli leather wallets have the industry’s leading data theft security foil – CRYPTALLOY- built right in. CRYPTALLOY is one of the few blocking foils in the world that is TÜV and ASTM certified, and that blocks 100% of all known frequencies. The integration of CRYPTALLOY into our wallets makes Pagalli one of the very few brands in the world to have been certified by an independent body for data theft protection.



Elegantly Engineered Design

Slim is in. We’ve designed Pagalli wallets to securely hold all of the cards, cash, keys – everything you need -  all in a slim form factor that conveniently fits right into your life.

Marchesa Premium Leather

There are many different leather types and grades out there to choose from, but none comes close to meeting our exacting requirements. So we made our own. It’s called Marchesa Premium leather, and it’s made exclusively for Pagalli in collaboration with Thailand’s VKA tannery.

Marchesa Premium leather is a vegetable-tanned leather that combines tradition with technology in a unique way. Vegetable tanning is a truly ancient craft that requires skill and time - time that is not available to the mass produced, chemically-processed leathers so often used today.


We developed the Marchesa Premium to safeguard the art of vegetable-tanning methods and to create a premium, superior product. The Marchesa process starts with carefully selected raw cow hides. These are then processed with our special mix of natural tanning substances, including Quebracho extract. The exact mixture is our secret, and is the result of year-long trials and tests to achieve the best possible results. Under the skilled hands of the tanner, using pure water and a large helping of patience, the raw hide is transformed into high-quality leather. Soluble dyes give the leather its color and surface structure. Marchesa Premium is a semi-aniline leather, which means that it maintains the leather’s characteristic grain and adds a protective top coat for additional resistance to wear.

Marchesa Premium leather is distinguished by its unique warmth, soft yet tough texture, and distinctive fragrance that invokes a feeling of luxury.

Handcrafted lining with Surin Thai Silk

We went on a journey to find the best possible lining that we could for our wallets. This journey led us to the Thai province of Surin, where some of the most exclusive silk in the world is being made. With took this exquisite Surin Thai silk and created a beautifully crafted, quality lining that accentuates the sleek silhouette of our products.

Sustainable Packaging

Our commitment to quality is apparent from the moment your Pagalli wallet arrives. Pagalli's packaging perfectly embodies the value and identity of our brand. All packaging is made from up-cycled leather fibers, hand stitched and closed with a wax seal.

Fair & Conscious Manufacturing

The Pagalli Project is dedicated to creating not only premium, handcrafted goods, but also to a manufacturing community that thrives through excellence of craft and pride of work. We work hand in hand with direct suppliers and partners, removing all middle-men and distributors.

We have manufacturing capacity in place with Krusell Thailand Co., Ltd, an OEM project manufacturing company with over 20 years of experience in manufacturing and supply chain solutions. Assigned production capacity means that we are in control. Krusell Thailand Co., Ltd is internationally recognized for its proactive policies and fair working conditions, and is part of the UN Global Compact initiative.

Lifetime Warranty

We take pride in creating our products honestly and under fair conditions – and we stand behind them. All Pagalli wallets come with a lifetime warranty.


As seen on

We need your support to secure our first commercial production run. Your contributions will directly help us with funding the booked production capacity at our partner’s factory, material costs, supply chain and logistics.

Thank you for taking time to check out The Pagalli Project!

//Pagalli Team

we could for our wallets. This journey led us to the Thai province of Surin,
where some of the most exclusive silk in the world is being made. With took
this exquisite Surin Thai silk and created a beautifully crafted, quality
lining that accentuates the sleek silhouette of our products.


Silk lining from Surin, beatifully crafted


Sustainable Packaging

Our commitment to quality is apparent from the moment your
Pagalli wallet arrives. Pagalli's packaging perfectly embodies the value and
identity of our brand. All packaging is
made from up-cycled leather fibers, hand stitched and closed with a wax seal.



Upcycled packaging that is closed with a wax seal.

Fair & Conscious Manufacturing

The Pagalli Project is dedicated to creating not only
premium, handcrafted goods, but also to a manufacturing community that thrives
through excellence of craft and pride of work. We work hand in hand with direct
suppliers and partners, removing all middle-men and distributors. 
We have manufacturing capacity in place with Krusell
Thailand Co., Ltd, an OEM project manufacturing company with over 20 years of
experience in manufacturing and supply chain solutions. Assigned production
capacity means that we are in control. Krusell Thailand Co., Ltd is
internationally recognized for its proactive policies and fair working
conditions, and is part of the UN Global Compact initiative.




Lifetime Warranty
We take pride in creating our products honestly and under fair conditions – and we stand behind them. All Pagalli wallets come with a lifetime warranty.



As seen on









We need your support to secure our first commercial
production run. Your contributions will directly help us with funding the
booked production capacity at our partner’s factory, material costs, supply
chain and logistics.

Thank you for taking time to check out The Pagalli Project!

//Pagalli Team

story:
DID YOU KNOW?! 

There are approximately 29 Million slaves world wide? Between 14,500 and 17, 500 people are trafficked into the U.S. each year. Human trafficking is the 3rd largest international crime industry (behind illegal drugs and arms trafficking). What are we doing about it? What CAN we do about it? 

BanAnna Beauty Bands has started a movement and we want YOU to be a part of it! Our headbands have a unique story and a unique purpose! Each time you purchase a band, a portion of the funds goes to help in a combined effort with Fahodie for Friends, to STOP HUMAN TRAFFICKING in Africa! 

http://www.fahodieforfriends.org/

THINK ABOUT IT! BANDS FOR A CAUSE!:



Additional Information:

Other organizations have jumped on board to "band for a cause" with BanAnna Beauty including the Alzheimer's Association and Black Girls Run, a running group for African women to encourage healthy living. When you purchase a BanAnna Beauty band, you give just to GET BACK! 

What NEXT? 

 The next BIG project we hope to fulfill is earning enough funds to travel to Africa to visit a Fahodie for Friends-Freedom safe house. We plan to bring with us a few sewing machine. While there we will teach those struggling to get back on their feet from their abused life, how to sew the bands so they can sale them and start a new life. Education is a huge leap to changing your life. We will help those who were victims of human trafficking, start their life again, by teaching them marketable skills that will bless their life. WE NEED YOUR HELP to accomplish our goal! We hope you will "band" with us!

story:
Meet Sense by Silk Labs


TechCrunch /  CNET /  Fast Company /  The Verge /  Engadget /  Forbes /  IoT Podcast

Make your home more intelligent using sound and vision

Sense is the beautiful connected camera and smart home hub we've all been waiting for! At home or away, Sense is there to help you keep tabs on the things that matter most: your home and your family.

See your home from anywhere, securely 

Watch a live feed or recorded video of your home and know that it’s completely secure. Utilizing the Sense app and a unique encrypted connection to your smartphone, no one else will be able to access your video. Sense keeps your moments safe and within the family. 

 
 

Sense’s camera recognizes specific people in your home as well as their comings and goings. When Sense sees someone it does not recognize, it will ask you if you’d like to identify them via the Sense app. Sense can tell you when your daughter comes home from school, if she is running late, or if she comes home with a friend. Sense brings peace of mind to your daily routine. 

 

Get meaningful notifications

Sense looks after your home and notifies you of unusual behavior, like odd sounds and motion, or an unrecognized person walking around. Because Sense knows about your family and pets, and learns from you what is unusual, you are only alerted to things that matter most to you. No more needless notifications!

Make your home more responsive 

Sense knows who is home and learns what they like over time. Sense can automatically turn on the lights, music, and set the temperature to their preference, all without fumbling with a smartphone. Sense will turn things on when they arrive and off again when they step out. Want to change settings or preferences? Train Sense easily to get things just right.

Do more with Silk apps!

Sense grows with you over time. You can discover and install new interactions and behaviors to personalize Sense for you and your family. Imagine an app to track your pet’s activity or to tell you how well your baby is sleeping…the sky’s the limit with the Silk app ecosystem and open platform for developers.

Features and benefits

Plug it in, set it up with a single tap, and let Sense start to make your home more intelligent with the following features:

When you are at home

Connects with smart home devices - Sense works with a wide range of connected devices, including lighting solutions such as Philips Hue and LIFX, sound systems including Sonos, home systems like the Nest thermostat, and many more to come...

Interact through voice and gestures - Sense uses powerful onboard processing to support simple voice and gesture interaction.

Learns and adapts - Sense recognizes patterns and adapts to your needs through simple interactions. No programming, no setup, no nonsense.

When you are away

Know who's home - Sense can distinguish people apart and can detect who is home at all times. Using computer vision for facial recognition and Bluetooth LE for proximity, Sense is always aware of who is home.

Keep tabs on your pet - Sense can detect animals from humans and can keep track of their movements and routines.

Get meaningful notifications - Sense isn't triggered by simple motion, light changes, or even pets -- it's triggered by people, events and relevant context. Sense considers who, what, and when in order to send you more thoughtful notifications.

See your home, securely - Sense brings a secure remote feed for recorded and live video of your home. With our secure setup and hardware based encryption, only trusted smartphones can access your video remotely.

Setup and security

One-touch secure setup - Setting up Sense could not be any easier. Just plug it in, launch the app, and tap Sense with your smartphone. Within a few seconds, Sense will be up and running and paired with your handset. Your video will be fully encrypted for your eyes only.

Extensibility

Add apps for new experiences - Easily discover and install Silk apps that run on Sense to add new capabilities and experiences, including those created by third party developers.

About the Silk Connected Device Platform

Sense is the first product running Silk, a powerful new platform for connected devices that utilizes local processing and deep learning to bring a new age of responsiveness to the connected devices all around us.

Powered by Silk, Sense can detect your presence, recognize your voice and gestures, learn your preferences, and choreograph your connected devices to respond to you appropriately. Sense can act as the eyes, ears, and brain of your connected home! 

What makes Sense different from other "smart" products?

Local vs Cloud Computing: Why does it matter?

Today’s "smart" connected devices really aren’t smart at all. In fact, most of what we call “smart” or "connected" products are really just sensors that you remotely control with your Smartphone through the cloud. Adding connectivity doesn't make them intelligent, and because your personal data is being processed remotely in the cloud, it's not very secure.

Sense runs applications locally on the device itself, and utilizes machine learning to create more intelligent, meaningful, and useful experiences with all of your connected devices.

Seriously serious privacy

Sense and future Silk products will always have privacy measures built into the core of the architecture. We take privacy even more seriously than "seriously." While others may promise you a secure cloud with bank-level encryption and ethical employees, we make it impossible for anyone not in possession of your smartphone, or Sense, to view your private moments.

One-touch setup leverages proximity and Bluetooth LE to securely exchange secret keys between Sense and your Smartphone to enable end-to-end encryption. No one -- not us, not a hacker, not the NSA -- no one but you can access your family's private moments.  

Designed with your life in mind

We've seen connected devices. They're black, white, or grey plastic. They're cold, unforgiving, and just not very appealing.

Given the experience we are building, we needed something that was unlike anything seen before. We wanted a unique design aesthetic, something that could live among our favorite things, something made of meaningful materials. Something beautiful!

                                                                            Materials study

We brought in designer Elliott Koehler on the product design for Sense and we couldn't be more pleased with his warm and thoughtful design.

                                                               Camera housing study

The gentle sloping design of Sense is a reflection of the founders' belief that human experiences, beautiful materials, and elegant design soften technology, welcoming it into your life more organically.

Camera field of view and articulation

Elliott designed a product worthy of the Silk Labs name. We can't wait to see Sense living among us in your homes, making technology work the way we know it can!

NEW DEMO! One touch set-up

Silk Labs team members Andrea and Philipp demonstrate how simple it is to pair your smartphone to the Sense device. Through a one touch process, the Sense device can securely connect with your smartphone.

 
 

Silk is developer friendly 

Silk was designed from the ground up to be extensible for developers like you. Developers have made millions of innovative apps that make smartphones more useful; with Silk you will have the tools to create apps that run locally on Sense to make your home much more intelligent and personal.

Silk is built by the same team that created Firefox OS, so we know how to build great platforms for developers. We understand the importance of simple tools and APIs that give power to developers without compromising user privacy. We know how to foster an ecosystem of developers, and we are excited to do this again with Silk (and Sense) for the home.

If you know JavaScript then you already know how to write Silk apps. That's because Silk is built on Node.js, and yes, your favorite JavaScript tools and npm modules will work just fine. We took great care to abstract out the complexities of computer vision, advanced hearing, and deep learning, so you can get going very quickly with simple yet powerful APIs.

And when you are done with your app, just press a button to share with the community, or just your friends and family. We are excited to have you along for this journey and can’t wait to see what amazing new experiences you build using the Silk platform!

SPECIFICATIONS 

Who is Silk Labs?

Founded by Andreas Gal, Chris Jones (both formerly of Mozilla) and Michael Vines (formerly of Qualcomm), Silk Labs' mission is to create thoughtful experiences with connected devices by enabling them to understand, respond to, and adapt to our daily human needs. Their creation, Silk, is the first platform for IoT that goes beyond being a “connected” or “smart” remote sensor system and aims to be intelligent, powerful, and secure via local application processing. Sense is the first product that runs Silk and will be available in late 2016. 

Manufacturing timeline

We've started tooling, but now we need your help for engineering, design verification, user testing, and completion of the app and platform.

story:
La Vie Chère is a social enterprise that converts refuse into functional fashion. The company was founded in Burkina Faso, West Africa by Gomsa, a local artisan, and a Peace Corps volunteer as a way to accelerate positive change in the community. Through the transformative power of business, La Vie Chère provides employment at a living wage and invests in children’s education while removing trash from the environment.

Our Impact

La Vie Chère has already made a meaningful impact in our home city, Banfora:

  • Environment: We’ve turned hundreds of old tires into flip flops and innertubes into bags. Everything we create removes waste from the streets and most of our products are 100% recycled. 
  • Employment & Training: We’ve hired and trained women and high school interns to provide meaningful work at a wage to support their education and families.
  • Children’s Education: A portion of each sale is given as scholarships to children at risk of dropping out of school. We’ve already helped several girls continue their education and as the business grows, we can ensure even more students stay in school.

With your help we can do even more!

In Burkina, a little bit goes a long way. Every donation changes the lives of Gomsa, women and students in the community. With your help, we can bring more amazing recycled products to the world and increase our community impact. We’ll use $800 to purchase a permanent workspace and boutique with electricity, $400 for a new sewing machine and $300 for a smartphone to quickly process orders. The remaining funds will be used for designing new products, increasing capacity and improving manufacturing processes. 


By donating, you’ll receive our amazing recycled products and become a part of this unique, impactful organization. If you can’t donate, please do us a favor and share this campaign with your friends and on social media. We need your help to spread the word on this awesome social enterprise!

Thank you!

Moussa Gô + La Vie Chère

www.laviechere.org

Check out our awesome recycled Perks!


Wanna learn more? See below for the full story and additional photos.

Our Story

Moussa Gô, or “Gomsa” as he is called by friends, was born in Dedougou, Burkina Faso. While growing up, he worked with his parents and siblings on their small farm. The family was very poor and Gomsa never had the opportunity to attend school but taught himself to read and write basic French (the official language of Burkina Faso) while spending time with literate friends. In 1998, Gomsa started a small business in Dedougou with his brother sewing cotton mattresses. When cotton prices plummeted in 2008, Gomsa was forced to leave his home in search of work. 


He moved to Banfora in southern Burkina where he found employment at SN SOSUCO, a sugar factory. He worked 8-hour days loading trucks but the $3/day income was barely enough to live, so he began making sandals from discarded tires in his spare time. In 2010, his business had grown large enough to leave the sugar factory and he started working full-time making and repairing sandals on the roadside.


La Vie Chère launches

In 2010, Gomsa met James, a Peace Corps volunteer who saw his incredible potential. They began working together to develop new products and expand the business to international markets. La Vie Chère was born in 2011 and the duo started selling messenger bags to tourists and exporting to the United States.


As the business grew, La Vie Chère moved from the roadside to a boutique outside a popular hotel. The boutique has electricity and Gomsa used a microloan to purchase his first sewing machine. 



Product quality improved, production accelerated and sales increased. He hired and trained local women and high school interns from the community to meet increased demand from overseas customers. 


Gomsa is committed to giving back to the community and wants children to have the chance at education he never had. La Vie Chère has partnered with the Banfora public schools and a portion of each sale is given as a scholarship to a child (especially girls!) to help them pay for tuition and school fees.

story:
Dear YOU,
Our project is not about innovative technology or revolutionary invention, it is simply about people. Open you eyes, you don't need a new gadget to help you go faster nowhere. You need to slow down NOW and look around you... Did you notice how beautiful the sound of the wind in the trees is? Did you notice the inner beauty of the people around you? Did you notice how unique YOU are? 



KOSHA CREATES EXCLUSIVE AND INSPIRING EXPERIENCES,
NOT INDUSTRIAL OBJECTS.

At KOSHA we believe that happiness is made of little moments of joy. This is why we want our objects to be much more than attractive and functional. We want them to tell a story and to elevate ordinary gestures to moments of joy and poetry.

Joy is contagious single smile could contribute to make this world happier ;-)




THE MESSENGER OF GOOD NEWS

Today a new opus joins the KOSHA family, the LAZA letter opener. It elevates the ordinary - the mail opening - to an exclusive experience. Its shape is inspired by the Swallow, with its long and slender tail. The Swallow is a good omen worldwide, symbolizing freedom, happiness, & luck. The Swallow is also known as "the messenger of good news".



We have at heart to create objects that are much more than functional. We want to bring a contribution to this world by inspiring the individuals and by supporting people in need through special editions created in favor of charities.


CONSIDER THE PERSON WHO HAS EVERYTHING,
AND THEN CONSIDER KOSHA.

At KOSHA we want to make each day a celebration, because each day is an occasion to tell someone special you care. The LAZA letter opener is packed in an elegant gift box that tells a story. All you have to do is add these little words that make your present unique.



TALENTED CRAFTSMEN SUPPORTED BY MACHINERY

The LAZA Letter Opener was meticulously designed in Switzerland with a special attention to details. This refined object is manufactured in Italy and made of high grade stainless steel. Both Switzerland and Italy share a historical reputation for high quality standards and exquisite design.




The HERITAGE bookmark is the first inspiring object launched by KOSHA. It is a tribute to the history of books. It flattens out when placed in a book and returns to its harmonious curved shape once removed.

- High quality stainless steel combining resistance and flexibility.

- Dimensions: 172 x 43 x 0.3mm.

- The quote "A room without books is like a body without a soul. Cicero" is engraved behind each piece


 «The impassioned lift up the world; sceptics let it fall.» [Albert Guinon]

KOSHA is a Swiss brand founded in 2010 by the designer Claudio D’Amore with the aim to create meaningful work that combines his passion for design and high-quality craftsmanship with a desire to inspire and enrich people lives.
story_txt:
Dear YOU,Our project is not about innovative technology or revolutionary invention, it is simply about people. Open you eyes, you don't need a new gadget to help you go faster nowhere. You need to slow down NOW and look around you... Did you notice how beautiful the sound of the wind in the trees is? Did you notice the inner beauty of the people around you? Did you notice how unique YOU are? KOSHA CREATES EXCLUSIVE AND INSPIRING EXPERIENCES,NOT INDUSTRIAL OBJECTS.At
 KOSHA we believe that happiness is made of little moments of joy. This 
is why we want our objects to be much more than attractive and 
functional. We want them to tell a story and to elevate ordinary 
gestures to moments of joy and poetry.Joy is contagious single smile could contribute to make this world happier ;-)THE MESSENGER OF GOOD NEWSToday a new opus joins the 
KOSHA family, the LAZA letter opener. It elevates the ordinary - the 
mail opening - to an exclusive experience. Its shape is inspired by the 
Swallow, with its long and slender tail. The Swallow is a good omen 
worldwide, symbolizing freedom, happiness, & luck. The Swallow
 is also known as "the messenger of good news".We have at heart to create objects that are much more than functional. 
We want to bring a contribution to this world by inspiring the 
individuals and by supporting people in need through special editions 
created in favor of charities.Special edition of our Heritage bookmark in support of the Theodora FoundationCONSIDER THE PERSON WHO HAS EVERYTHING,AND THEN CONSIDER KOSHA.At
 KOSHA we want to make each day a celebration, because each day is an 
occasion to tell someone special you care. The LAZA letter opener is 
packed in an elegant gift box that tells a story. All you have to do is 
add these little words that make your present unique. 

TALENTED CRAFTSMEN SUPPORTED BY MACHINERY
The LAZA 
Letter Opener was meticulously designed in Switzerland with a special 
attention to details. This refined object is manufactured in Italy and 
made of high grade stainless steel. Both Switzerland and Italy share a 
historical reputation for high quality standards and exquisite design.





The LAZA Letter Opener is made of high grade stainless steel.


The HERITAGE bookmark is the first inspiring object launched by KOSHA. It is a tribute to the history of books. It flattens out when placed in a book and returns to its harmonious curved shape once removed.- High quality stainless steel combining resistance and flexibility.- Dimensions: 172 x 43 x 0.3mm.- The quote "A room without books is like a body without a soul. Cicero" is engraved behind each piece
 «The impassioned lift up the world; sceptics let it fall.» [Albert Guinon]
KOSHA
 is a Swiss brand founded in 2010 by the designer Claudio D’Amore with 
the aim to create meaningful work that combines his passion for design 
and high-quality craftsmanship with a desire to inspire and enrich 
people lives.

story:
Summary

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We're excited to share this incredible opportunity with you!

  • Chive Minnesota is a collection of incredible people dedicated to making the world 10% happier
  • The LoveYourMelon organization donates 50% of their profits to The Giving Back Fund (part of your contribution will help LYM donate even more!)
  • In contributing to this campaign, you will be contributing to both LoveYourMelon, and to the Northern Lights Foundation!

The Details:

Here are the details of the campaign:

  • In order to place the order, we need to sell a minimum of 200 units, which is why we are here - in the event we don't hit the mark, your contribution will be completely refunded.
  • With a contribution of $35.00, you'll receive one of these beanies. This is a one time opportunity.
  • If we don't reach our goal, your money will be refunded.

The Impact

Your contributions, in addition to securing you one of these AMAZING beanies, will benefit The Giving Back Fund, as well as Northern Lights Foundation. Each $35 contribution includes:

  • The first EVER Chive inspired Love Your Melon beanie
  • Love Your Melon will donate 50% of the profit to The Giving Back Fund
  • Shipping and handling
  • An $8 donation to Northern Lights Foundation

Risks & Challenges

An apparel order like this is new for us, as we need to hit a minimum quantity, and if we don't we won't be able to place the order. This is the reason for this campaign running through IndieGogo, if the goal isn't met, contributions will be refunded.

  • We don't think this is going to be an issue though, because Chivers and Chivettes are the best people out there - and they know how to Hulk smash some goals.
  • We'll be making these beanies available to any and all of Chive Nation's finest.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't get in on this offer, please help spread the word, share it on social media:

  • Make some noise about this campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Would you like to read this in your language? We've created translations in Español, Italiano, فارسی and العَرَبِيَّة! 

 

“I want to live my dream!”

How often have you heard this? Perhaps countless times. That’s why we’ve redefined the cliché for you. You’re going to live your dreams like the way you want without any interference. It’s time to fulfill your wildest fantasies.

The movie, “Inception” was the first major sci-fi attempt in unearthing the world of lucid dreaming, but we’ve made it a reality with LucidCatcher. Living your dreams isn’t science fiction anymore!

We’ve made the remote that would let you control your dreams. It’s as simple as wearing a device on your forehead and taking charge. By taking charge, you'll be controlling other characters, their behavior and the setting of your dream as well. You control everything.

Neuromodulation wearable on your head, while you sleep, is all you need to have that control. It doesn’t get easier than that! Does it?

 

 

LucidCatcher

LucidCatcher is a wearable device integrated with advanced sensor technology that was only used in sleep labs to track and examine brainwaves in real-time, until now.  

The device uses neuromodulation (stimulators) at various sleep cycles that makes you aware that you’re dreaming.

“I tried to run, turn around, and I felt my body reacting in the dream. I remember it extremely clearly, everything was under my control.”

The dry electrodes are made of conductive fabric-like mesh, through which the pulses are delivered. 

LucidCatcher tunes your mind during REM phase of sleep by using brain wave sync setups. When this happens, you’ll get aware that you’re dreaming.

Although lucid dreaming is a hard nut to crack and takes years of meditation, LucidCatcher doesn’t require any particular skill as our experiments go on to show.

The device is made of soft hypoallergenic materials to ensure maximum ergonomic comfort during sleep.

 

Tech Specifications

  • Power: Switch on/off button
  • Connectivity: Wi-Fi button
  • Sensors: 7 dry, skin-adaptable sensors
  • Data Memory: 7 nights of statistics save
  • Battery Timing: 7 nights of dreams without charging
  • Charger: Micro USB
  • Battery: 1000 mA Li-ion
  • Stimuli: 200 uA (Attunes to your skin moisture)

  • 2 channel EEG
  • Sleep phases recognition
  • Brainwave sync programs

 

 

VR Integration

This is as interesting as it gets. You must have explored the Seven Wonders of the World or places you’ve always fantasized through VR. Interestingly, now you can do the same in your dreams and also choose the people you want to be with in that place. The VR integration lets you control the surroundings of your dreams.

 


 

With LucidCatcher, your brain frequency changes to higher attention, this means that you’re highly alert to the memories just before you fell asleep. Just as the events of a hectic or an emotional day make their way in your dreams, the VR experiences can be recreated too.

“It’s a very unusual feeling like I am wearing VR glasses, but I can control it.”

We discovered during the experiments that demos provided to stimulate the imagination through VR are recurring into the dreams.

 

 

 

Become a Dream Hacker

Your level of lucidity is integral in lucid dreaming. We’ll first give you a boost of lucidity, which will put you in the driving seat, and you’ll operate like a DREAM hacker. 

“By studying lucid dreams, we can understand the reality. It is like learning a new language.”

~ Dr. Stephen LaBerge, an acclaimed authority on lucid dreaming

 

 

LuCiD Scale (Research)

LuCiD Scale (the Lucidity and Consciousness in Dreams Scale) is a scientific way to measure your skill of Lucid Dreaming. Researchers developed the scale after analyzing 300+ lucid dreams in the laboratory.  

“The moment I remembered in the dream that I sleep with the device, my dream became lucid.”

After calculating the metrics, we’ve added it in the Dream Journey so you can track your progress, it’s as easy as sharing your dream.

Get ready to welcome the new undiscovered world!

http://bit.ly/lucidcatcher_specs - Read LucidCatcher specifications PDF, and research data.

You’re not alone

You’re part of the Dream Journey

You’re not alone in the dreaming world. You’ll become part of a dreaming community around the world. The Journeys inside the app include guided experiences by other lucid dreamers. They’ll take you to the places you’ve never been before, help you master new skills and even new languages.

“I managed to alter the time and the subjects of the dream. I could even breathe under water. I woke up totally impressed with all that happened to me, and that my dreams were now truly limitless!”


 

The Journeys are categorized, and also has a discovery mode in which we recommend the best dreams according to your interests.

You’ll unlock the undiscovered world and get new achievements in the dreaming world, whether it be predicting the future, uncovering the secrets, or eventually realizing that everything is a dream.

LucidCatcher isn’t restricted to your own dreams. Everyone shares the dream reality. Have you ever wondered whether someone else in the world is having the same dream as you?

 

 

You can stop wondering now! While you’re part of the community, you’re sharing your dreams, and if someone else has had the same dream as you, we’ll notify you. Along with finding your dream pals, you can also:

  • See what other people are dreaming about in your area, state, country, or even a different part of the world.
  • Take the inspiration from someone else’s dream and try to recreate the same dream journey.
  • Share your dreams by writing them down or using hashtags to let the community know what you’ve been dreaming about.

 

Progress Tracker

You can pair your smartphone with LucidCatcher via Wi-Fi.

The Dream Journey App allows you to see the statistics, battery level, electrodes connection status, and firmware updates.

You can also get to know the right quality of your sleep. The accelerometer used by fitness and sleep trackers is not enough to accurately measure the sleep cycles. LucidCatcher uses brain waves to give the most accurate measurements of sleep cycles: deep, fast, and REM.

 

 

Get the Boost

The experiment results revealed a +40% LuCiD boost in a novice Lucid Dreaming practitioner (having no previous Lucid Dreaming practice/ only had a couple of experiences before). This boost can be equated to at least three months of regular meditation.

The results show the impact of LucidCatcher on three essential aspects of lucid dreaming; insight, dissociation, and control.

The level of lucidity produced by LucidCatcher (without any other technique) for an experienced lucid dreamer is the same as the use of SSILD + FILD (lucid dreams induction methods used globally in labs to train lucid dreaming techniques).

 

 

How it works – Three Steps

Here’s a simple three step process for using LucidCatcher:

  1. You can select the plot of your dream before going to sleep. You can use Dream Journey app or VR experience to find the inspiration.
  2. You’ll soon be engrossed in the dreaming world, and in control of your dreams (this happens when you’re in the REM phase).
  3. After you wake up, turn the LucidCatcher’s wifi on with a single button, get into the app, and you’re all set to view your progress.

You can track your dream journeys, quality of your sleep, the count and length of dream experiences, and much more.

LucidCatcher has different modes that can be used during the day as well. After choosing these modes from the app, you can study, meditate, or take a nap while entertaining your brain at the same time.

 

 

You need a breakthrough

You can’t turn a blind eye to your dreams anymore. They have a far important message that you can’t afford to forget. With LucidCatcher, you wouldn’t only get that message but also explore things that are limitless.

“I’m very happy I experienced lucid dreaming. It was such a breakthrough for me”.

story:
When it comes to design there is nothing quite like an exotic sports car, not only do they look stunning with their gorgeous shapes but they’re also built to perform as awesome as they look. This was our inspiration for our newest bag; KP Duffle. We wanted to make a bag that not only had a stunning appearance but offered functionality/performance that was second to none.

The Kickstarter community pledged over $600K to help us get this project off the ground. We want to extend pre-order savings to the IndieGogo community!

Most duffle bags on the market either have a square or cylinder shape but for the KP Duffle we wanted to create something that has never been seen before in travel bags. We wanted the shape of the bag to evoke the same feelings you get when you see a Ferrari speeding down the highway.

However we also paid as much attention to how the bag functions as we did how it looks. With custom features like a ventilated shoe compartment, utility hatch, internal mesh pockets, etc. this bag is chocked full of awesomeness. Plus we used super high-quality materials so it will last you a really long time.

Dimensions: 9"L x 21.5"W x 10.5"D (Inches) / 23L x 55W x 27D (CM)

Weight: 3 lb / 1.36 kg

Capacity: 24 liter

  • Exterior: High Quality Scratch Proof PU
  • Interior: Custom InfiWave Interior
  • Zamak 5 Zinc Alloy Hardwares
  • 100% Water-resistant
  • Water-resistant Zippers
  • 16 Unique Storage Compartments
  • Ventilated Shoe Pocket (Fits up to size 13 Mens)
  • iPhone Sized Pocket (Fits iPhone 6 & 6 Plus)
  • Hidden Water Bottle Compartment
  • Utility Hatch (Designed for Chargers & Cables)
  • Pen Loop & Removable Key Fob
  • Interior Mesh Pockets
  • Concealed Wallet Pocket
  • Extra-Wide Shoulder Strap with Shoulder Pad
  • Optional Dopp Kit
  • Meets Airline Carry-on Dimensions

 The Secret Compartment

We've designed a passport sized secret compartment somewhere in the Duffle to store your important belongings. This compartment is so hidden that it's virtually invisible. We can't release the location of the secret compartment here, because then it wouldn’t be a secret anymore. Detail information can be found on our update #8 (Backers Only).

The KP Dopp Kit was designed to perfectly fit inside the KP Duffle. This sleek bathroom bag is made of a high-quality PU leather exterior and has a bright interior featuring multiple mesh pockets. Keep your gels, pastes and everything else you need to get ready for the day neatly organized, while also keeping everything outside of the Dopp Kit protected from potential leaks.

KP is all about good design that makes your life easier. Our new MultiPen combines a ballpoint pen, tablet stylus, laser pointer and flashlight; all the essential tools in one elegantly designed pen. With the KP MultiPen you'll never need to fumble around for the tool that you need.

  • A durable rubber tip that won’t scratch the screen of your device and allows the user to type accurately
  • Black ink rollerball pen for smooth, crisp & clear writing
  • A laser pointer that projects up to 500 yd / 457 m
  • Ultra bright LED flashlight
  • Body made of solid copper with matte finishing
  • Weighted and balanced for a smooth and delicate feel

KEEP PURSUING is a small design start-up based in Los Angeles, CA. Our motto is "Outfitters of the Modern Adventurer" as we strive to create quality bags and gear specifically designed for people who live, work and play in urban environments. We truly love what we do and put that passion into every project/product.

 

A special thanks to all the people who helped put this project together. 

Film Production: Ben Meredith and Aaron Salcido

Music Composer: John Capo

Actor: Drew Smith and Brenden Carney

Special thanks to Stone Yeh, Doreen Ke and Spencer Chang

story:
About NextVPU

NextVPU is a start-up in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision domain. NextVPU refers to "Next Vision Processing Unit", which means the vision chips in future. The goal of the company is to bring vision capability to all robots, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV), unmanned ground vehicles(UGV) and other smart devices, to create a new era of AI. The company, founded by industry veterans, now is focusing on the R&D of some interesting products. The first product is AngelEye smart glasses, the world's 1st smart glasses to assist visually impaired to perceive the world conveniently and enjoy a safer exploration in an indoor/outdoor environment.

Why we work on designing “AngelEye”

Do you have any friend or friend of friend with visual disabilities? Have you seen the challenges that he/she is facing during his/her daily life? If “Yes”, we guess you can quickly know why NextVPU get started on our first product - “AngelEye”, the world's 1st smart glasses to assist visually impaired to perceive the world conveniently and enjoy a safer exploration in an indoor/outdoor environment.

AngelEye Smart Glasses are designed to facilitate visually impaired people’s daily life. Working with an smartphone, it captures visual information, analyzes and communicates the result in audio for visually impaired to perceive the world. AngelEye Smart Glasses are a powerful intelligent device with stylish industrial design. It’s slim, portable, and reliable, powered by NextVPU’s Technology (NextVPU’s Intellectual Property)

  • Advanced Visual Geometry Perception Technology
  • Advanced Visual Recognition Technology
 

                                                       

Running test of one blind volunteer with AngelEye       Obstacle avoidance test

According to the report of World Health Organization, there are ~285 million visually impaired people including 40 million blind among the world. Walking in an outdoor/indoor environment is one of people’s basic needs, but the blind people takes more safety risks. It’s not safe enough for the blind people going out only by holding the canes, as there are many kinds of obstacles outdoor that are hard to be detected by canes, such as low hanging tree branches, back of a truck, pits, unexpected downstairs etc. Many blind people have experiences of fall, collision and scratches. These challenges have been influencing blind people’s daily life for a long time. To recognize what’s ahead, or to find a remote-control from a desk, or to find a door from the room, is another typical challenge for blind people, who have suffered a lot from these inconveniences.

AngelEye smart glasses' features

Virtual Cane:

The glasses will detect any obstacle that you may hit into, including obstacles higher than road surface and lower than your height, and pits that are deep from the road, then communicate to the user through audio. When the user is approaching the obstacles, the music voice from glass becomes more and more urgent, so that it becomes a kind of warning to the user.

Advanced Recognition:

The glasses will recognize kinds of object categories, that are related with visually impaired people’s daily life, including traffic light, crosswalk, stairs, door, exit, cash note, color, text, people, etc, and tell the user through voice.

Location Reporting:

With a simple push-button, it reports user’s location information, e.g. street name, next cross’ name, distance to the next cross, heading direction, nearby ROIs etc.

Bone Conduction Headphone:

The glasses can perform as a fashion bone conduction headphone for music, phone calls, etc.

Button Control:

The user could switch and control the device’s function conveniently via buttons on the glass.

How it works

AngelEye smart glasses, working with an smartphone, it captures visual information, analyzes and communicates the result in audio for visually impaired to perceive the world.

The user could switch and control the device’s function conveniently via AngelEye APP or the buttons on the glasses.

The user will be easy to download the APP named "AngelEye" from "Google Play".

Product Timeline

2015.10    Got the idea

2016.01    Set up the founder team

2016.03    Locked down the key features 

2016.05    NextVPU enterprise founded

2016.09    Created and tested the 1st prototype models

2016.10    Created and tested the 2nd prototype models

2016.11    Created and tested the 3rd prototype models

2016.12    Created and tested the 4th prototype models

2017.01    Published the latest prototype on CES2017 in Las Vegas

2017.03    Initial production

2017.05    Mass production

2017.06    Shipping

What You Get

Packaging contains:   AngelEye smart glasses

   USB Micro-B to USB Type-C converter

   User manual

The warranty period:  1-Year Limited Warranty

Phones that are supported (More smartphone models are being certified):

Android3.0 and later phones are supported, including:

  • Samsung
    • Galaxy S6+
    • Galaxy S6
    • Galaxy S4
    • Galaxy Note4
    • SM-C7000
  • Oneplus3
  • LG Nexus 5
  • HTC One-M8
  • ZTE B2015-36428
  • Lenovo ZUK_Z2Pro
  • Lephone 2
  • Lephone 1
  • Redmi Note4

Product parameter

Weight                                     - 45 grams (0.1lb)

Size                                           - 172*165*42 (mm)

Connection                             - USB2.0 OTG

Power consumption            - Under full load conditions: 1.2watt at room temperature (25°c)

                                                    - Standby mode: 0.15watt

Working temperature         - 40 °C +70°c (-40°f to 158°f)

    Warning

    It is to be noted that, AngelEye can only work when connected with smartphone through USB cable. Also, AngelEye is to simulate the functionality of the human eyes, and has similar requirement of the luminance. Strong light or darkness would reduce the sight of the device, and the device would report the “seen” results more conservatively due to the consideration of user’s safety. Therefore, we solemnly remind consumers that the device is to assist people to perceive the surroundings but cannot replace the user to make the judge of actions. Visually impaired still need make their own judgment of the surroundings and take the appropriate action, based on all the information perceived.

    FAQs

    Q: DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?

    A: Yes, we do!!

    For international fans: free shipment for most countries (international shipping cost is covered in the listed price for most countries). However, due to different countries may have different import tax/policy, you may need to interact with the custom and pay the tax if needed.

    Q: CAN I USE THE GLASSES IN THE DARK?

    A: Yes, in the dark environment you would need to hold a flashlight to lighten the area that you want to perceive, so the glasses can see the area clearly.

    Q: DO THE GLASSES HAVE THEIR OWN BATTERY?

    A: No, the glasses is charged by the smartphone through the attached USB cable.

    Q. WHERE TO DOWNLOAD THE APP?

    A: Google Play, and all other popular on-line APP stores

    Q. RETAIL PRICE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN?

    A: $1199 USD

    Q. WHERE TO BUY AFTER THE COMPAIGN?

    A: You can buy AngelEye smart glasses at en.nextvpu.com
story_txt:
About NextVPU
NextVPU is a start-up in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision domain. NextVPU refers to "Next Vision Processing Unit", which means the vision chips in future. The goal of the company is to bring vision capability to all robots, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV), unmanned ground vehicles(UGV) and other smart devices, to create a new era of AI. The company, founded by industry veterans, now is focusing on the R&D of some interesting products. The first product is AngelEye smart glasses, the world's 1st smart glasses to assist visually impaired to perceive the world conveniently and enjoy a safer exploration in an indoor/outdoor environment.

Why we work on designing “AngelEye”
Do you have any friend or friend of friend with visual disabilities? Have you seen the challenges that he/she is facing during his/her daily life? If “Yes”, we guess you can quickly know why NextVPU get started on our first product - “AngelEye”, the world's 1st smart glasses to assist visually impaired to perceive the world conveniently and enjoy a safer exploration in an indoor/outdoor environment.
AngelEye Smart Glasses are designed to facilitate visually impaired people’s daily life. Working with an smartphone, it captures visual information, analyzes and communicates the result in audio for visually impaired to perceive the world. AngelEye Smart Glasses are a powerful intelligent device with stylish industrial design. It’s slim, portable, and reliable, powered by NextVPU’s Technology (NextVPU’s Intellectual Property)

Advanced Visual Geometry Perception Technology
Advanced Visual Recognition Technology


 

                                                        
Running test of one blind volunteer with AngelEye       Obstacle avoidance test 
According to the report of World Health Organization, there are ~285 million visually impaired people including 40 million blind among the world. Walking in an outdoor/indoor environment is one of people’s basic needs, but the blind people takes more safety risks. It’s not safe enough for the blind people going out only by holding the canes, as there are many kinds of obstacles outdoor that are hard to be detected by canes, such as low hanging tree branches, back of a truck, pits, unexpected downstairs etc. Many blind people have experiences of fall, collision and scratches. These challenges have been influencing blind people’s daily life for a long time. To recognize what’s ahead, or to find a remote-control from a desk, or to find a door from the room, is another typical challenge for blind people, who have suffered a lot from these inconveniences.


AngelEye smart glasses' features
Virtual Cane: 
The glasses will detect any obstacle that you may hit into, including obstacles higher than road surface and lower than your height, and pits that are deep from the road, then communicate to the user through audio. When the user is approaching the obstacles, the music voice from glass becomes more and more urgent, so that it becomes a kind of warning to the user.
Advanced Recognition:
The glasses will recognize kinds of object categories, that are related with visually impaired people’s daily life, including traffic light, crosswalk, stairs, door, exit, cash note, color, text, people, etc, and tell the user through voice.
Location Reporting:
With a simple push-button, it reports user’s location information, e.g. street name, next cross’ name, distance to the next cross, heading direction, nearby ROIs etc.
Bone Conduction Headphone:
The glasses can perform as a fashion bone conduction headphone for music, phone calls, etc.
Button Control:
The user could switch and control the device’s function conveniently via buttons on the glass.

How it works
AngelEye smart glasses, working with an smartphone, it captures visual information, analyzes and communicates the result in audio for visually impaired to perceive the world.
The user could switch and control the device’s function conveniently via AngelEye APP or the buttons on the glasses.
The user will be easy to download the APP named "AngelEye" from "Google Play".

Product Timeline

2016.01    Set up the founder team
2016.03    Locked down the key features 
2016.05    NextVPU enterprise founded
2016.09    Created and tested the 1st prototype models
2016.10    Created and tested the 2nd prototype models
2016.11    Created and tested the 3rd prototype models
2016.12    Created and tested the 4th prototype models

2017.03    Initial production
2017.05    Mass production
2017.06    Shipping

   USB Micro-B to USB Type-C converter
   User manual

story:
What is Queen's Addiction?

Queen's Addiction is a company meant for people who want to look as fabulous as they feel at an affordable price. It is a company that will grow to supply clothing and accessories across all genders and expressions, insuring confidence though hand made products with a seamster with over 5 years of experience.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to make this company a reality, we need money. Hopefully yours! Here's where your money will go:

  • All contributed money will go towards supplies: nail bases, polish, dress forms, machinery, etc.

If we don't reach our goal, we won't be able to start this with the bang it deserves and will cause the rollout of product to slow down! Make sure to check out the perks!

 

The Impact

This company came from a few frustrations, largely current retail prices vs. quality. There are plenty of stores out there, but how many have a price-point that really justifies the quality you're getting? Moreover, how many are both affordable and durable?​

Risks & Challenges

Starting a new business is difficult for anyone, especially in a heavily saturated market of consumers who prefer cost value to quality; however, when marketing online through social media as well as consistently appearing in public with my own product, one can truly impress quality standards in a way that cannot be said through major marketed brands.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot afford to contribute, we understand; however, you can still help greatly! SHARE this on social media and make sure to hashtag away and make sure to tag @QueensaddictionNYC

story:
Infinite Future Gear (@ifgclothing)

The Future of Street Wear



The Denim Oblivion Jacket

Infinite Future Gear, customizable street wear inspired by video games, sci-fi, and electronic music.

Streamline design and bold details are the style of the Future.

Our mission is to create the most innovative street wear apparel that inspires others to Seize the Future.

Infinite Future Gear is here to disrupt the apparel industry with custom hand made in the USA garments inspired by our passions.

Our products are inspired from our favorite forms of digital art such as video games, sci-fi, and electronic music. These artistic mediums are our source of imagination and creativity that empower us to chase our dreams and pursue IFG.

See our profiles for more content:

Our website : www.ifgclothing.com

Instagram: @ifgclothing

Facebook: @ifgclothing

Youtube: ifgclothing


Heroic Styling



Tripher shirt and Gunslinger Pants in grey

Our favorite digital characters are intricately designed with details that compliment figure while telling a story of their personality. Armor panels that defend the wearer while presenting strength and the silhouette of a warrior are details that empower us. Our gear features not only everyday utility such as functional pockets and adjustable, modular components; but also bold details, powerful silhouettes, and interchangeable patches to express your personal style. Action isn’t just something you do; it’s something you wear.

Applicable Functionality



Superior style and function


In outfitting the Future we will need functionality and utility to match the progression of our digitally inspired style. Our gear takes your daily needs and activities into consideration with bold details that are innovative to street wear. Our functional designs include pockets specific for your mobile devices, wallets, and keys. We also incorporate adjustable and modular components that change the fit and profile of a garment. Furthermore, we utilize the hook and loop Velcro platform to give our wearers an opportunity to personalize their gear with morale patches that represent the wearer’s own unique style.



Gunslinger Pants have holsters made just for your devices

The distinct combination of our heroic styling with applicable functionality enables and empowers our wearers to have the confidence to accomplish their daily goals; in pursuit of their Future aspirations.

Creativity and Imagination


Infinite Sagas Vol. 1 & 2 Graphic T-shirts


As our favorite forms of digital media culture have inspired us to create, we strive to inspire others to do the same. The progression of the arts is the progression of our culture and society. With that in mind we take responsibility in creating art that has a positive empowering message. "Seize the Future" is the baseline for this campaign as our creations remind us to reach for the future we want for ourselves and others.

Giving Back


 Infinite Future Gear strives to create an Infinite Future for others


Infinite Future Gear was created as a message of empowerment. To serve as a reminder that our Future is Infinite in its possibilities. We take ownership of our name and we are giving back to our community to ensure a bright future for all of us and for the generations to come.
This Kickstart the Future campaign not only brings the future of street wear, but also gives back to our local children, veterans and service members, as well as to newborns in need. For most of the rewards backed, we are donating supplies and materials that enrich the quality of life for those who have not had the same opportunities as we have. To our servicemen and servicewomen we are donating one for one of our Infinite Caps. To those overseas, or to our domestic retired veterans, and their families we offer these caps as a small token of our gratitude for your service. We hope these caps will shield you from the sun and keep you inspired of the Infinite Future. To the children who may not have the means to create art, we offer art supplies through our Infinite Sagas items so that they may continue to dream of the Future. To the newborns of the Future who are in need, we create blankets from our unused materials to ensure that every newborn has the basic necessity of keeping warm. Make sure to check each reward description to see what items are being donated to the Future.

Rewards

Close up of our USA flag patch & IFG logo patch

USA flag patch shown in gold


 

Ice Cream Pop patch shown in red
 

Ice Cream Pop patch shown in purple

Ice Cream Pop patch shown in blue



 

Infinite Cap shown with interchangeable patch
 



 
 


 
 

 White Infinite Future Long Sleeve Shirt

Infinite Future Long Sleeve in White

Our White Infinite Future Long sleeve features a long back curved hem

Organization Long Sleeve in black features top stitch details and logo embroidery

Organization Long Sleeve in black


Learn more about the Infinite Sagas on our website
 

The Infinite Sagas: Our own original sci-fi story

Infinite Sagas Vol. 2 & 1

Infinite Sagas Vol. 1

Back view of Infinite Sagas Vol. 1

Infinite Sagas Vol. 2

Back view of Infinite Sagas Vol. 2

Infinite Sagas Vol. 3
 
 
 

Infinite Cloak prototype

 

Features of the Infinite Hoodie

Infinite Hoodie shown in green

Infinite Hoodie shown in blue

Infinite Hoodie shown in black

Bold details of the Infinite Hoodie

 

Detailed view of the Gunslinger Pants

Streamline design with function in mind

Bold details

Tailored tapered fit with adjustable ankle openings

Smartphone holster

Back view of Gunslinger Pants

Read the Infinite Sagas mini comic here

The Infinite Sagas Part 2 Cover

Infinite Sagas Part 2 Redemption: Raptoria Wars Scene 1 "Make Raptoria Great Again"


Infinite Sagas Part 2 , Scene 2  "The Wall"

Infinite Sagas Part 2, Scene 3 "Crash Land on Bellatringhorn"

Infinite Sagas Vol. 1 & 2

Infinite Sagas Vol. 1, 2, & 3

Infinite Sagas Vol. 1 "MRGA"

Infinite Sagas Vol. 2 "The Wall"

Infinite Sagas Vol. 3 "Crash Land "

Back view of Infinite Sagas Vol. 3


 

 

Items included in Organization Starter Pack

Organization Long sleeve in Black

Infinite Hoodie shown in Blue

Gunslinger Pants shown in Black

Gunslinger Pants shown in Navy
 
 

Items included in Silver Trophy package

The style of the Future

Go for Gold


 

 

About me

Hi!

I am Dayne Nastri, the founder of Infinite Future Gear.

 

Hi that me @Magic Apparel Trade show Las Vegas 2018 Infinite Future Gear booth

  • Hello! My name is Dayne Nastri. I am a 25 year old designer from Orange County, California. I I grew up playing iconic video games like Starfox 64, The Legend of Zelda, and Kingdom Hearts. I played these games with my family and friends and was captivated by the creativity of these fantasy characters and their worlds. From battling colossi, to slaying nightmares, playing these games that presented otherwise insurmountable obstacles gave me a sense of empowerment while enabling me to build friendships with others who shared the same passion for games. In 2015 my friends and I had the idea to create a streetwear clothing line that embodied the same heroic and empowering designs of our favorite games. We started with the Infinite Hoodie, inspired by Kingdom Hearts. The hoodies were a hit and demand for new products increased. Since then Infinite Future Gear has expanded to T-shirts, denim, and accessories all inspired by my favorite digital passions. I look to infinitely expand IFG throughout digital culture as a mainstay apparel brand. I am a former Apple employee and have over 5 years of retail and customer service experience.
  • With your contribution we will build the Future with the innovative style and functionality necessary to advance out culture and society.

What We Need & What You Get

Building the Future

  • Infinite Future Gear had a goal of $10,000 to go into our first full production run of our line. With this quantity of sales we can produce our items at a lower cost, allowing us to sell our items at a lower cost. We have already exceeded our first goal, and for every additional $1,000 we exceed our goal by, I will release a a new digitally inspired design.
  • Perks! Our perks include our one of a kind hand made items, as well as limited bundles available only on our crowdfunding platforms. All of our perks are about 20% off or more of our full retail price. Along with our limited discounted items, look out for the higher tier bundles to include items made just for you!
  • We have already reached our goal and have begun production on many items, so you are guaranteed to receive your Infinite Future Gear.

The Impact

Seize the Future

  • Infinite Future Gear was created to inspire others , and give hope to an Infinite Future. In an industry full of deconstructed trends and status symbols, Infinite Future Gear was created to battle those messages with empowering garment design. With your contribution we can spread our positive message and build an empowering community for others to seize the Future.
  • When supporting our campaign, you are also supporting small businesses, giving work to local artists, models, photographers, sewers and more. All our our apparel is made in Orange County and Los Angeles California
  • Infinite Future Gear Kickstarter campaign was fully funded on May 27th.
  • We will be opening our warehouse in Orange County CA. August 25th and product will be shipping out by then.

Risks & Challenges

What's Stopping Us?

The Hard parts already over!

Before our first crowd funding campaign, we were limited to creating our products made to order. It was a lengthy process for both the customer and our manufacturers.

Now that we have enough funding from our Kickstarter campaign we are able to go into full production of our clothing line and we can properly stock our shop with inventory.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the message of the Future

Contributions can come in other ways, like sharing our campaign with your family and friends.

Help us spread our message of an empowering Future.

Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for checking out our campaign.

 

Seize the Future,

Dayne Nastri.

With this quantity of sales we can produce our items at a lower cost, allowing us to sell our items at a lower cost. We have already exceeded our first goal, and for every additional $1,000 we exceed our goal by, I will release a a new digitally inspired design.
Perks! Our perks include our one of a kind hand made items, as well as limited bundles available only on our crowdfunding platforms. All of our perks are about 20% off or more of our full retail price. Along with our limited discounted items, look out for the higher tier bundles to include items made just for you!
We have already reached our goal and have begun production on many items, so you are guaranteed to receive your Infinite Future Gear.


The Impact
Seize the Future

Infinite Future Gear was created to inspire others , and give hope to an Infinite Future. In an industry full of deconstructed trends and status symbols, Infinite Future Gear was created to battle those messages with empowering garment design. With your contribution we can spread our positive message and build an empowering community for others to seize the Future.
When supporting our campaign, you are also supporting small businesses, giving work to local artists, models, photographers, sewers and more. All our our apparel is made in Orange County and Los Angeles California
Infinite Future Gear Kickstarter campaign was fully funded on May 27th.
We will be opening our warehouse in Orange County CA. August 25th and product will be shipping out by then.


Risks & Challenges
What's Stopping Us?
The Hard parts already over!
Before our first crowd funding campaign, we were limited to creating our products made to order. It was a lengthy process for both the customer and our manufacturers.
Now that we have enough funding from our Kickstarter campaign we are able to go into full production of our clothing line and we can properly stock our shop with inventory.
Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the message of the Future
Contributions can come in other ways, like sharing our campaign with your family and friends.
Help us spread our message of an empowering Future.
Make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Thanks for checking out our campaign. Seize the Future,Dayne Nastri.

story:
From dawn to dusk, carry just ONE bag with adjustable straps. Transform it instantly into THREE absolutely distinct styles – hand bag, backpack or shoulder bag based on your purpose.

Pack your whole world inside the bag, literally!

Never again find yourself digging around in your bag. Our 13 thoughtful compartments & pockets organize your entire day’s essentials in an accessible way.

You will find a padded laptop compartment, a sleek iPad/Notebook compartment, 5 pockets to keep your sunglasses, cosmetics, charging cables or power bank, 1 large zipped pocket, water bottle sleeve & key leash. Oh by the way, for your peace of mind, our premium lining is waterproof too!

 

Slip in a 13” laptop in laptop compartment or comfortably slide in a 15” in the central compartment.

Double Security: the main compartment is zipped to secure your prized possessions. The magnet closure adds another layer minus any hassle.

Without exposing your main gadgets or opening the whole bag to get your things, we have one easy-access pocket to stash your metro cards, pen slot, keys, lipstick, air pod and especially a passport for easy flight check-in.

We have included a luggage sleeve on the back so you can slide it through the suitcase handle and keep your bag in place during the check-in-and-out process. It fits tight and lets you travel light.

Zip off the luggage sleeve to turn it into a small pocket at the back.

Crafted from high quality genuine structured saffiano (black & red) and soft pebbled grain leather (brown) that will stand the test of time through coarse seasons and rough travels.

The waterproof lining is another added protection to give you peace of mind.

Adjustable straps are double-layered with soft leather on the rear side for more comfort.

Created with the same compulsive obsession for quality and organizing genius, this belt bag can be a fun companion. Look inside to find a thoughtful zip pocket, four card slots and a key clip.

Wear it 5-ways – like a belt bag, a sling bag, a cross body, a clutch or a shoulder bag. 

AGIKI is my vision. I am Sarrie Bui, a busy executive who, like many other women, hops from the office to yoga to social events, blurring the lines of formal and casual fashion.

Like you, I have a busy daily life, leaving home at 8 coming back at 10 or sometimes midnight. I  was hunting for a bag which I could use to carry my laptop during the day but I couldn't find the perfect one. The idea was sparked during my travels around Europe two years ago. It was hard for me to find an affordable bag with an all-day design that could protect my laptop and have enough space for all of my things during a busy day. 

The sweat-and-tear journey as a solo entrepreneur has been challenging but very rewarding. I have had the opportunity to talk to and receive so much help and feedback from hundreds of women from all over the world in order to make it happen. I can't remember how many times I sent emails to my community “Girls, please send help" and received a ton of motivation and encouragement. I can not thank everyone enough for the tremendous support. 

In my quest for the AGIKI work-life bag, I conceptualized a cross between a formal laptop bag, a casual adventure backpack and a fun shoulder bag. I hope the bag will be a helpful companion on your busy everyday journey. 

We have tested multiple different types of materials in order to find the one that will make the bag look great and function well. Over the last 2 years, we have talked with many women to really understand their needs and wants. Our initial prototypes had way more hardware and flaws, but we kept listening and testing and improving our products. In order to make it to the final prototype, we have gone through so many different versions of forms, straps, materials and colours. 

International shipping

We are happy to ship AGIKI bags to any part of the world. The shipping charges will be clearly mentioned on the check-out page with a flat rate. Kindly note that the product price does not include any duty or taxes that may be applicable under import laws of the destination country.

Return/Refund Policy

Kickstarter is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Kickstarter Terms of Use, AGIKI will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at support@agiki.co

Risks and challenges

AGIKI bag comes to you by a global team specializing in design, marketing and customer service. Our team is young but we have many years of expertise and we are obsessed with quality. We have worked with different factories in the last two years to ensure the utmost care of production, design and quality. We also partner up with a global-standard manufacturer and quality control and logistics companies who have been in the industry for decades to ensure the timeline and quality of each product before shipping.

TIMELINE: We have taken reasonable care to give realistic timelines including the year-end holiday. During the pandemic, unexpected issues may arise and cause small delays. In such a scenario, please be assured that we will communicate transparently and make customer satisfaction our priority. In fact, we have even budgeted for unforeseen delays. If things go smoothly you can expect to receive your bag earlier. AGIKI bags that you see in the pictures and videos are the final prototypes. There might be some minor modifications based on customers' feedback.

story:
Short Summary

Let's do a badge for 2020

The sparkles represent separateness, the swirl represents togetherness. The badge alternates between both, activated by motion.

The lettering is reflective, representing you.

What We Need

We need to know how many to get manufactured before putting in a production order, after which we won't be able to get any more. The cost per unit is reduced considerably the more we get.

What You Get

The badge only consumes significant power when activated, and will automatically go into an ultra-low power sleep mode otherwise, and thus does not really need to be turned off.

The Impact

Support Dementha and let's do something together even though we have to be apart.

The Process

The design is initially made in software. Then, we send away to a fabricator to make test boards. These will have to be assembled by hand, and will be used to develop the firmware.

Once the prototypes are working as desired, a contract manufacturer will fabricate the boards as designed, source parts as specified and assemble them onto the boards, through a largely automated process. This takes 2-4 weeks turnaround.

Once we receive the badges from overseas some final bits will need to be done by hand, such as attaching the bar pin, inserting batteries and flashing firmware.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this page and see how much support we can get.
