We succeeded.What's In The Box?The basic HaloSmile Starter Kit contains six treatments. It will take a couple times of applying HaloSmile to get the hang of it.Each HaloSmile Starter Kit comes with 6 Treatments, 1 Bottle of Liquid Activator, 10 Brushes, 1 Mouthpiece, 2 packs of Cotton Rolls, 1 Instruction Card, 1 bottle of Finishing Touch Top Coat and 1 tube of Removal gel.

Liquid Activator - 3 drops is all you need to create our secret formula.

Brushes - Just like a nail polish brush, use it to apply it to your teeth. We include a few extras for practice.

Cotton Rolls - Saliva is not your friend. Keeping your teeth dry is important for a good application.

Mouthpiece - They help you get the hang of applying HaloSmile.

Removal gel - Many people just choose to let the coating naturally fade away in a few days. If you prefer, you can use the removal gel to take it off.
How Do You Apply?HaloSmile provides instant results! You will notice an immediate and dramatic change as you're applying. Pay close attention to how each tooth turns out. You'll only have a small window to retouch or redo each tooth before it sets.These easy how-to-steps are the key to keeping your smile smooth and free of brush strokes.What's In It?Ingredients: Water, Zinc Oxide, Potassium Tripolyphosphate, PAA Hydrochloride Salt, Hydroxyapatite, Aluminum Oxide, Silicon Dioxide, Sodium Chloride, Boron Trioxide, Manganese (II) Oxide, Potassium Chloride, Potassium Oxide, Potassium Phosphate Monobasic, Sodium Oxide, Sodium Phosphate Dibasic, Titanium Dioxide.Covered by 17 U.S. and foreign patents. Intellectual property is very important to HaloSmile and strictly enforced.Please contact support@halosmile.co to discuss HaloSmile’s intellectual property. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, cure, or prevent any disease.Caution: Use only as directed. Do not use if you have any known allergies to any of the ingredients. Discontinue use and ask your dentist or doctor if you experience redness, swelling, or persistent irritation of the gums or mouth. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place.The Development StoryAfter years of relentless improvement, we have finally developed a product we are proud to share with the world!The SafeWhite TeamHaloSmile is the first product from the SafeWhite team.We have a world class team and board of advisors behind our product.Ray Shealy - CEORay Shealy is a successful operator, investor and board member involved with a number of healthcare and technology-based companies. Ray served as President and CEO at HTP Inc., which was acquired by McKesson’s RelayHealth unit in 2008.Carlos E. Martinez - Executive Vice President of R&DCarlos E. Martinez worked at The Procter & Gamble Company (P&G) for over 20 years, eventually leading innovation teams globally as Associate Director, R&D. During his tenure at P&G he contributed to the success of many products, including Crest® toothpastes such as Whitening Plus Scope, Crest Vivid White, Crest ProHealth and Scope mouthwash.Mark Shary - Co-FounderMark is a founder and investor in several other high-growth, technology-based companies, including Updox, InfoMotion Sports, and hc1.com. Mark was the founder of HUBLink, which became the global leader in hospital systems connectivity and is now the healthcare integration division of Information.Gary Musso, PhD - Chief Science OfficerDr. Musso has over 25 years of experience in Research and Development, leading Science and Technology projects into successful clinical and commercial products.Satish Garre, PhD - Principal ScientistDr. Garre has over 11 years of research experience in the design and synthesis of novel small molecules for application in asymmetric synthesis, drug discovery and biochemistry.Scott Bridgeman - Co-FounderScott is a molecular biologist specializing in molecular diagnostic testing, now acting as an executive within the In-Vitro Diagnostic Industry.Phil Messersmith - Active AdvisorDr. Messersmith is one of our active advisors from the University of California Berkeley. He is a world leader in underwater adhesive and binding technologies.Delaney Banda - Marketing CoordinatorDelaney is a graduate of Ohio University with a Bachelors Degree in Communication where she focused on Organizational Communication, received a minor in Marketing and a certificate in Social Media. Delaney has worked with multiple companies and organizations focusing on social media and marketing. Delaney is focused on taking SafeWhite and their products to the top spot in the teeth whitening industry.Alex Sheets - Digital Marketing SpecialistAlex Sheets is a graduate of Ohio State University with a bachelor’s degree in Marketing and a minor in Entrepreneurship. Alex has worked with a number of DTC consumer goods companies, both big and small, to help increase their digital marketing presence. Alex also has solid experience launching products and working on marketing plans to ensure product success. Spread the loveDid you enjoy our campaign? Please take a moment to share on Facebook. One click goes a long way!Follow us on Instagram 
 
Risks and challenges
After years of Research and Development, HaloSmile is now ready for the mass market. Since we produce everything in-house we have the capability to quickly address any concerns or questions. Of course, we promise to communicate promptly and frequently to all of our loyal backers.

story:
We are wanderers

(traduction française à la fin)

Wander. Explore. Travel. Inspire. HUNT. Find beauty in what the Earth is able to bring to us, through the navajo culture.

That's what we try to do now. Two dreamers, explorers, jewelry enthousiasts, and especially world lovers.

Welcome to our dreams, our desert hunt and let's find beauty together !

The project

Jewelry and fashion fans since so long, we are two friends in love with native jewelry, especially navajo jewelry. The navajo culture has something really fascinating and unique you can't find anywhere else.

Turquoise, silver, arrows, buffalos, fringes, dreamcatchers, so many captivating elements we can find in certain american places, especially deserts.

We love turquoise and certain types of turquoise (sleeping beauty, Royston, Carico lake, just to mention some). This project is a human adventure, a way to explore and find earth natural beauty and artists and spread the love with an online boutique made of gorgeous designs.

How ?

Our goal is to explore certain american places in order to find navajo artists who creates authentic handmade indian jewelry : Nevada, New Mexico, Arizona. These places have been chosen because of their turquoise mines but also because general native american jewelry can be found here. Our goal is also to find men jewelry, since the market for men's jewelry is very limited.

That project will raise in a few steps :

  • create an inspiring online shop, designed by talented artists

  • communicate about the launching through different social medias (instagram, facebook)

  • spend a first week in the american desert to meet artists, find beautiful authentic jewelry, create long term partnerships with these talented men and women to be sure we'll always sell handmade and quality jewelry.

  • bring the jewelry to our place (Canada and US) and putting them on the shop

What your help will bring :

With the money we need here, we'll be able to finance several elements :

  • build a beautiful online shop

  • create a society

  • afford two plane tickets of 500$ each

  • a first important jewelry stock to launch the shop

  • shipping packagings, business cards

    What the project can bring to you :


    Each person who helps from 10$ will have a discount for his first order :

    • 10$ to 50$ = 10% discount

    • 50$ to 100$ = 20% discount + goodies (prints / t-shirts with our logo)

    • more than 100$ = 20% discount + t-shirt + jewelry goodies (vintage rings, bangles, etc)

    You can follow our adventure and see the different steps of the project on our blog :

    http://wawproject.blogspot.ca/

    Thanks for reading us and we really hope that project will make you dream like us  !

    Explorer. Voyager. Partir à l'aventure. CHERCHER. Trouver la beauté dans ce que la terre a à nous offrir, à travers la culture amérindienne.

    C'est ce que nous cherchons à faire à présent. Deux rêveuses, voyageuses, passionnées de bijoux et surtout amoureuses du monde.

    Bienvenue dans nos rêves, dans notre quête du désert et allons chercher la beauté ensemble !

    Le projet

    Fascinées bijoux depuis très longtemps, nous sommes deux amies passionnées par les créations amérindiennes. La culture navajo a quelque chose de fascinant et d'unique qu'on ne peut trouver ailleurs.

    Les turquoises, l'argent, les flèches, les bisons, les franges, les capteurs de rêves, tellement d'éléments captivants que nous pouvons trouver dans certains lieux, tels que le désert.

    Nous aimons les pierres de turquoise, en particulier certains types de pierres ( la turquoise de Royston, du lac Carico, la « sleeping beauty », pour n'en citer que quelques unes). Ce projet est une aventure humaine, une manière d'explorer, de découvrir la beauté naturelle de la terre, de rencontrer de réels artistes et de répandre leur travail par l'intermédiaire d'une boutique en ligne faite de magnifiques designs.

    Comment ?

    Notre but est d'explorer certains lieux des Etats-Unis pour y rencontrer des artistes Navajos qui créent des bijoux amérindiens authentiques et faits main grâce aux techniques qu'ils ont apprises de leur ancêtres : le Nevada, le Nouveau-Mexique, l'Arizona. Nous avons choisi ces lieux car ils renferment certaines mines de turquoises que nous recherchons mais aussi car nous pouvons y rencontrer les artistes les plus authentiques. Notre but est également de trouver des bijoux pour hommes. En effet, le marché des pièces pour hommes est assez limité.

    Ce projet se construira en plusieurs étapes :

    • créer une boutique en ligne inspirante, au design d'artistes talentueux

    • communiquer à propos du lancement par l'intermédiaire des réseaux sociaux (instagram, facebook)

    • passer une première semaine dans le désert, rencontrer des artistes, trouver de beaux et authenitques bijoux, créer des partenariats à long terme avec ces hommes et femmes talentueux afin d'être certaines de toujours vendre des pièces uniques et de qualité

    • rapporter les pièces chez nous ( Canada et Etats-Unis), les prendre en photos et les insérer dans la boutique en ligne

    Ce que votre aide peut apporter :

    L'argent dont nous avons besoin nous permettra de financer plusieurs étapes :

    • la création d'un site de qualité

    • la création d'une société et les frais que cela engendre

    • financer deux billets d'avion de 500$ chacun afin de se rendre dans le désert

    • l'hébergement, la location de voiture et la nourriture pendant cette semaine

    • un premier stock conséquent de bijoux à mettre en ligne

    • tous les frais qu'une boutique engendre : cartes de visites, boîtes d'envoi, etc

    Ce que le projet peut vous apporter :

    D'autre part, chaque personne qui contribuera au financement à partir de 10$ aura une réduction sur sa première commande :

    • participation de 10$ à 50$ = 10% de réduction

    • de 50$ à 100$ = 20% de réduction

    • plus de 100$ = la même réduction + des cadeaux (bagues vintage, bracelets, etc)

    Vous pouvez suivre nos aventures et les différentes étapes de la construction du projet à travers notre blog :

    http://wawproject.blogspot.ca/

    Merci de nous avoir lu et nous espérons que ce projet vous fera rêver aussi !!!

story:
Anonymous donors can use: 32wRDBezxnazSBxMrMqLWqD1ajwEqnDnMc

Use the Coinbase link above to claim your perk (follow instructions). Bitcoin raised: 63.25

Video download link: https://darkwallet.unsystem.net/darkwallet.webm

Your keys. Your Privacy. Your Sovereignty.

Dark Wallet is an unSYSTEM project that starts with simple premises: Bitcoin as a web technology and privacy by default.

We love Bitcoin and the way it empowers and reorients individual and community commerce. Dark Wallet as a project will serve as a platform or starting codebase for delivery of a high quality Bitcoin that serves The People over enterprise and government interests.

The Dark Wallet premiere client will work as a light browser extension featuring trustless mixing, multisig, and colored coin support. See more technical info here, a list of our past work, and how we will use the money.

Who's Involved

  • Vitalik Buterin - Author of Pybitcointools and technical writer for Bitcoin Magazine.
  • Janislav Malahov - Bitcoin web developer & enthusiast.
  • Cody Wilson - Director of Defense Distributed and DarkWallet.
  • Pieter Hintjens - Experienced senior dev, community manger for ZeroMQ.
  • Amir Taaki - Developer of Libbitcoin, experienced wallet dev.
  • Pablo Martin - Experienced dev, trustless mixing and network & systems dev. Developing encrypted telephony (PBX).
  • Mihai Alisie - Bitcoin Magazine editor in chief. Director for Egora.
  • Santiago Mendez - Sysop and support for Lorea, PBX telephony and Obelisk Bitcoin servers, and for the CIC (Catalan Integral Cooperativa).
  • Robert Williamson - libbitcoin/Bitcoin API systems dev.

The Impact

Dark Wallet needs $50k to finish its development and testing.

We hope you will elect to support this open source infrastructure now over waiting for the premium, managed clients of tomorrow.

We are interested in scaling up the Bitcoin infrastructure in an intentionally subversive and empowering direction- taking Bitcoin just where it has been threatening to go. Towards an integrity of values, and a neutrality promoted by anonymity and a resistance to censorship. Software can stand for something.

The unSYSTEM team at the CIC's Calafou live frugally and share a common ideal of investing in common infrastructure. Dark Wallet's funds will after 45 days be transmitted to a multisignature Bitcoin address, publicly viewable on the blockchain, for the coming months of project administration. Administration will be publicly accountable. Should we surpass our goal, surplus funds will be deposited to the same account and used to support unplanned and experimental features within the infrastructure.

We are skilled and experienced software developers who live for the freedom of the Internet.

Preserve Privacy and Freedom of Speech

Bitcoin is the next battle ground in the fight against supranational political domination. Nation states harrass their governed populations with parades of open lies, and dedicate their time to the modern statist paradigm: developing emergency powers and containing the growth of new technologies. Digital anonymity and freedom of financial speech are some of the last tools left in the dwindling garrisons of Liberty.

We are by turns threatened and mocked by neoliberal social engineers and their Boomer bagmen. We face an "architecture of oppression."

Worse still, even liberatory technologies like Bitcoin are on the path to self-censorship due to the business interests of a relative few who excerise disproportionate influence within a dangerously monocultural ecosystem. Help us introduce principled diversity with an intelligent and independent implementation.

Other Ways to Help

Some people just cannot contribute, or have not yet decided to engage with Bitcoin as a useful implement for change. But you can still help us:
  • Share this campaign with the share tools at the top of the page
  • Join the unSYSTEM.net mailing list
  • Use our development tools (libbitcoin, sx, Pybtctools) and offer feedback
  • Begin building things. We need less ideas and more work. Start contributing to Electrum or Hive wallets. or packaging/testing/building the tools.
  • Mine with luke-jr's Eligius mining pool.


While hitherto all valuations and ideals have been built on ignorance of Bitcoin or in contradiction to it- therefore long live Bitcoin!


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
The funds raised through this project will be used to produce the CREITA line which includes necklaces, earrings and eyeglasses holders with many different colors and designs. It will help with the costs associated with a large scale production run, including ordering the necessary supplies.


These three necklaces are made from the same piece by simply stretching it or twisting it or both. When I tried on the necklace I couldn’t stop playing with it.

work with your mood..... 39'' gold necklace

Creita is a unique and innovative accessories concept. Creita is the most revolutionary accessory since the creation of the panty hose. 
The Creita assessors is adapted from a flexible metal mesh comprised primarily of copper wire and silver coating that has been lacquered with fabric dye for color in to create a variety of stunning colors. There has never been a more unique spin on a fashion accessory concept. 

CREITA will be ladies new favorite item and a perfect gift for friends, your family and yourself.......  

Lead-free coloring.

Nickel-free.

Water proof.

NO allergy.

Not easy to break

No tarnish

No color change

It can get wet or need to be gently hand washed.

FOR MORE INFORMATION : http://www.guzeljewelry.com/https:

//www.facebook.com/pages/Guzel-Jewelry-Design/115164301848464?ref=hl

or  http://creita.com

HOW TO DESIGN YOUR CREITA NECKLACE 

http://youtu.be/BJ1M9Isq4SA

Look elegant......Balck Long Necklace 39" with small earrings

Giving new life to your favorite pieces..... 24'' black and silver color short necklace

Unique....... 39'' silver Creita necklace and earrings

fun...... gold color earrings

Reasons to Support

First, Creita will be a great Christmas Gift for someone you LOVE or for yourself

  • It is so versatile, use your imagination ( one piece necklace can be many different looks and also including becoming bracelet or hair accessory).
  • Stunning fashion accessory which looks expensive while in fact extremely cost efficient.
  • Creita is a brilliant solution for functional yet elegant accessorizing when traveling for pleasure or business.
  • It is light as a feather and a single piece can adapt itself to many looks.
  • Easy to store, pack and use on the road with a wide variety of looks.
  • Creita is fun and easy to work with.
  • Can be enhanced with pendents and pieces from consumer owned treasures, giving new life to favorite pieces.
  • Creita makes a wonderful gift and is cost efficient to ship.
  • Does not create any skin irritations regardless of sensitivity for those who can not wear costume jewelry.
  • Easy to get past any security line without taking off the jewelry.
  • Creita has a long life.
  • You can adjust how short how long you want with just giving some shape. 24'' Creita necklace if you shape all the way it becomes 12'' choker with same necklace if you just shape from the middle it becomes 20'' necklace or around. With 39'' Creita necklace with out shape you can wear twice around your neck or you can wear a long necklace or you can shape all the way and it becomes 20'' full necklace. Just use your imaginations!!!!

MORE INFORMATION PLEASE GO TO: http://www.guzeljewelry.com/

On air October 13th at 7pm Channel 26 or Cable 8th Beauty Journal Show New York, Seattle, LA, Boston, Sacramento, Bay Area

BAY FASHION MAGAZINE 2012

BAY FASHION MAGAZINE March 2012


THE PLAN

The funds raised through this project will be used to produce the CREITA line which includes necklaces, earrings and eyeglasses holders with many different colors and designs. It will help with the costs associated with a large scale production run, including ordering the necessary supplies.

I have honed the process of making CREITA line for six years, designing them, making them, marketing them, designing the logo and creating packaging & labels, so the process of making a CREITA line has been streamlined.



REWARDS

Bakers will receive their selected rewards by the Christmas once we meet the funding goal $5000. We will email everyone to ask which color you like to receive before Creita ready to ship out.

story_txt:
The funds raised through this project will be used to produce the CREITA line which includes necklaces, earrings and eyeglasses holders with many different colors and designs. It will help with the costs associated with a large scale production run, including ordering the necessary supplies.These three necklaces are made from the same piece by simply stretching it or twisting it or both. When I tried on the necklace I couldn’t stop playing with it.work with your mood..... 39'' gold necklaceCreita is a unique and innovative accessories concept. Creita is the most revolutionary accessory since the creation of the panty hose. The Creita assessors is adapted from a flexible metal mesh comprised primarily of copper wire and silver coating that has been lacquered with fabric dye for color in to create a variety of stunning colors. There has never been a more unique spin on a fashion accessory concept. CREITA will be ladies new favorite item and a perfect gift for friends, your family and yourself.......  Lead-free coloring.Nickel-free.Water proof.NO allergy.Not easy to breakNo tarnishNo color changeIt can get wet or need to be gently hand washed.FOR MORE INFORMATION : http://www.guzeljewelry.com/https://www.facebook.com/pages/Guzel-Jewelry-Design/115164301848464?ref=hlor  http://creita.comHOW TO DESIGN YOUR CREITA NECKLACE http://youtu.be/BJ1M9Isq4SALook elegant......Balck Long Necklace 39" with small earringsGiving new life to your favorite pieces..... 24'' black and silver color short necklaceUnique....... 39'' silver Creita necklace and earringsfun...... gold color earringsReasons to SupportFirst, Creita will be a great Christmas Gift for someone you LOVE or for yourself
It is so versatile, use your imagination ( one piece necklace can be many different looks and also including becoming bracelet or hair accessory).
Stunning fashion accessory which looks expensive while in fact extremely cost efficient.
Creita is a brilliant solution for functional yet elegant accessorizing when traveling for pleasure or business.
It is light as a feather and a single piece can adapt itself to many looks.
Easy to store, pack and use on the road with a wide variety of looks.
Creita is fun and easy to work with.
Can be enhanced with pendents and pieces from consumer owned treasures, giving new life to favorite pieces.
Creita makes a wonderful gift and is cost efficient to ship.
Does not create any skin irritations regardless of sensitivity for those who can not wear costume jewelry.
Easy to get past any security line without taking off the jewelry.
Creita has a long life.
You can adjust how short how long you want with just giving some shape. 24'' Creita necklace if you shape all the way it becomes 12'' choker with same necklace if you just shape from the middle it becomes 20'' necklace or around. With 39'' Creita necklace with out shape you can wear twice around your neck or you can wear a long necklace or you can shape all the way and it becomes 20'' full necklace. Just use your imaginations!!!!
